1111.content:
You wake up with the feeling of someone fuzzy wrapped around your belly, making you blush. You look back at her to find that it's Renamon from the Digimon Tamers anime. You don't really notice much of a difference from her visually, though.

She's still asleep, so you decide to get up and explore. You slowly pull out of her grip and put a large pillow in place of you. You put on a pair of boxers and look around the bedroom to find two wedding rings on the opposite sides of the bed on the dressers, and look out the window to find an endless forest. Looking back at your dresser, you notice a card. You pick it up and read it:

"<Your name> and Renamon's wedding! Save the date: 6/20"

You give a confused look and then look at the calendar... June 21st. You guess that you're on your honeymoon with her... at a log cabin in the woods? You guess that's pretty romantic...

You hear the covers moving from the bed.

112.content:
You aren't really one to startle easily. You pride yourself on your ability to adapt to any situation. So when you wake up in an absurdly opulent bedroom that makes your original look like a box in an alleyway, you don't panic at all.

“Huh,” you said. “I remember going to sleep in my regular bed...”

You stroke your chin thoughtfully. “I wonder what happened.”

“Hrmrm...” said a sleepy voice. You look to the side... and gape. It's only because of your tremendous self-control that you don't scream in startled fright at the sight.

Well, fright's the wrong word, as you're fond of the character in bed with you at the moment. You just never expected to see her like this.

It's Renamon, the famous fox Digimon. Yellow fur, white middle, long, poofy fur collar, fluffy tail, purple leg marks, its all there. Except in this instance, she's become incredibly fat. Five-hundred pounds, if you had to guess. Her belly was a vast, almost rounded mass of softness, a thick apron hanging down over her waist. Her ass was big enough to fill a couch, and her chest now sported a pair of fat, heavy breasts below her fur collar. Her arms and legs were thick with fat, her pudgy footpaws surrounded by thick ankles and her fingers thick and clumsy looking. Finally, her face was chubby cheeked, giving her a very cute look.

You smiled a little. This look actually wasn't unattractive for her. Glancing around the apartment, you spot various pictures on the wall, each labeled with an event name. 'First Date' showed Renamon as you knew her from the show, only clad in an outfit similar to Rika's. 'Discovery of Mutal Desires' showed Renamon rubbing her belly as you fed her a huge, greasy-looking hamburger. 'Commitment' showed Renamon, fatter than she was in the last picture, as the two of you are entering a Tunnel of Love. 'Luck Be A Lady' showed the two of you posing with a Publisher's Clearing House crew, holding a large check. 'Marriage' was just that. Renamon, much fatter than she was in the last picture, clad in a beautiful wedding gown, cuddling up to you happily.

You glance down at your finger, and see a silver ring on it. “Huh...” you said quietly. “Marriage...” Not entirely an unattractive concept, all things considered. You looked up at the last picture, and saw Renamon, as fat as she was now, holding a pregnancy test and looking happy.

The test was positive.

Your jaw drops, and you find yourself at a loss for words.

“Hmmm... Honey?” Renamon said sleepily, starting to awaken.

(Edited on 12/26/2016 by FFtheSnake)

Please honey, tell me what’s hurting you.” Renamon looked down at you with a visible pout and eyes which seemed to gleam with sadness. Your aroused, confused, and now are feeling kinda guilty for making someone who seems to care for you worry.

What do you do?

122.content:
Although you weren't the type to sleep in late to the point where it's already noon, you usually wake up at around 6 in the morning, sometimes even at 5 to 4 in the morning given the chance. However, you couldn't help but getting a feeling that this morning felt...different from the other times when you were the "early bird" in your family.

As the Sun rose upon the horizon, you slowly began to show signs of life, stretching your arms out to the sides, yawning loudly from staying up until midnight. But then, when you tried to get up and out of your bed, you felt something holding you by your waist, pinning you down against your bed. If you had to guess the weight of whatever was pinning you to the bed, it had to weigh at least over several hundred pounds, or to be more specific, about 500 to 600 pounds.

Trying to figure out what exactly was holding you down, you open your eyes, still drowsy from just waking up, and saw a large white lump with some blue in the mix. Still having a pair of sleepy eyes, you rubbed the sand out of your eyes, clearing your vision back to their normal working function, finally able to see what was pinning you to your bed.

"Oh. My. God!" You whispered, eyes wide open, as you just now realized who was actually pinning you to your own bed; it was none other than the energetically playful bluenette catgirl known throughout the world as Felicia from the Darkstalkers series! Out of all the characters that Capcom has made over the years, Felicia happened to be your favorite out of the bunch. It wasn't just that you always played as her whenever she's a playable character, whether said game was one of the Darkstalkers games or a Marvel vs. Capcom game.

Instead, you loved Felicia because of her character, personality, and backstory. This catwoman (not to be confused with DC Comics' titular character) had a very likeable personality. After all, Felicia was energetic, optimistic, and playful, as well as someone who enjoys singing, dancing, and making friends with people. She wasn't that much of a likeable because she wanted to rule the world. Instead, one of the reasons why she had this many fans (you included) was of her dream to have a peaceful coexistence between the humans, and her kind, the Darkstalkers. Not to mention she doesn't resort to fighting others unless she cannot avoid it. Overall, these qualities were what made Felicia both a very likeable character, and able to stand out among the other Darkstalkers, who are mostly anti-heroes at best.

Although you knew that in the Darkstalkers games Felicia had alternate skins, the Felicia you were looking at was most definitely in her original form when she was first introduced; white fur and long flowing blue hair. However, even though your shock of realizing that you were sleeping in bed with your favorite catgirl, you began to notice that something was very different to the Felicia you were so used to seeing; she was much MUCH fatter than her videogame counterpart.

On her face, she had these chubby cheeks and a thick double chin, as Felicia rested her plump head against your stomach, almost as if you're some sort of human teddy near for her to sleep and cuddle with, just as you heard her purring as she slept. Her D-Cup breasts were now a pair of Double-F Cup breasts, as well as now having a fat apron belly, which reached halfway down the bluenette catgirl's fat jiggly thighs.

While you felt both her fatty breasts and apron belly smoosh themselves against your body, you noticed just how big Felicia's rear was underneath the bedsheets. Her waist and hips were about 4 to almost 4 and a half feet in diameter, as each buttcheek was about as big as a yogaball, with her long white cat tail hiding underneath the bedsheets. Other than having a pair of fatty thighs, shins cankles, and a pair of plump feline feet, Felicia also sported a pair of thick fatty arms, along with her large feline-like hands having a bit of flab on them as well, just as you felt the obese Felicia hug you a bit tighter, not wanting to let you go, despite feeling the tips of her sharp pink catgirl claws a bit.

Although you were usually a heavy sleeper, today something was metaphorically gnawing at you for attention. But as the snow blew outside your home in the middle of winter, you slowly began to stir, groggily opening your eyes to reveal something completely out of place.

"What the?" You said, your voice sounding hazy from just waking up. However, it was what you saw laying in bed with you that got your attention. At first, it looked like a big orange lump covering itself up with your bedsheets. But then, you saw the orange lump move, as it shifted it's body to turn itself around on your bed, causing these creaking sounds from it's weight, indicating to you that it was really heavy.

However, when your vision cleared up, you suddenly realized what, or rather who, you were actually sleeping in bed with; the one and only anthropomorphic vixen known as Inspector Carmelita Montonya Fox! Out of all of the video games you played, the Sly Cooper series happened to be your favorite franchise, and out of the large roster of characters in the Sly Cooper series, your favorite character was the very vixen you were sleeping with, despite the handful of actresses that were used to portray as her in each game installment. Overall, you basically had a giant crush on the bluenette vixen, and for you to see her right in front of you and not on a TV screen could only be summed up as a freaking dream come true.

Though, as the completely surprised reaction slowly died down, you began to notice one key difference to the original Carmelita Fox that you fantasized over; the Carmelita sleeping in front of you was much much fatter, compared to her Shock Pistol-wielding video game counterpart. She had these large G-Cup breasts, as these large mammaries of hers, nestled inside a massive blue bra. Below her breasts laid Carmelita's large apron belly, reaching halfway the bluenette vixen's thick juicy thighs, where they touched one another, along with having a pair of plump shins, cankles, and feet.

Balancing out her large fat melons, Carmelita also sported a fat waist, hips, and butt. Her hips were about 3 and a half to 4 feet in diameter, as each buttcheek was around the same size as a yogaball, where she wore these large blue silk panties, just as you saw Carmelita's notoriously long and fluffy orange fox tail stick out from underneath the bedsheets, subconsciously wagging from left to right.

Then, after noticing her thick fatty arms with subtle hints of muscle underneath along with a pair of chubby hands and digits, your eyes moved to look at the fat Carmelita's head, which sported a pair of chubby facial cheeks and a double chin. However, you then noticed that slowly but surely, the obese Carmelita's lips began to curve into a smile. Other than her new fatty physique, you understood that you were definitely in the same bed as Carmelita, as you sat up a bit and pinched yourself hard to see if you were hallucinating, which proved to you that you definitely weren't seeing things.

Still, the situation before you definitely raised some questions; How did you end up sleeping in the same bed as Carmelita, and why was she so fat? Although, looking at her now, you had to admit that Carmelita did look very attractive with all of that fat on her. You weren't sure how much the bluenette vixen currently weighed, but if you had to guess, Carmelita had to be weighing around 500 to 600 pounds, judging from how much bulk she has on her frame right now.

Still wanting to get some answers, you decided to get up and explore your home, hoping to find something that could tell you what was going on here. However, from playing the Sly Cooper games, you understood very well that Carmelita was known to have a bit of a temper, especially when it came to the raccoon Master Thief known as Sly Cooper, so trying to give her a wake-up call isn't going to help whatsoever.

There was a large and spacious living room, complete with a large coffee table, a 6-seat couch, 3 wide recliners, and a huge Flatscreen TV, hanging on one of those large plexiglass windows that give someone a good view of the landscape, along with a large durable drawer with an electric fireplace below the Flatscreen TV, as well as your Playstation 4, Playstation 3, & Xbox 360 gaming consoles.

But as for what said landscape was, you could only Sun it up in one word, as you said, "Whoa." As you slowly approached the gigantic window looking at the snow-covered urban landscape, you instantly recognized the tall steel tower that was the Eiffel Tower, making you realize that you were currently living in Paris, France.

Looking to the left, you noticed a large dining table with almost a dozen chairs, one of those chairs was large enough for someone of Carmelita's size, judging by it's size, how it was made out of metal, and was reinforced to hold both her and her weight. The birds chatter outside your window as you slowly come to. You lay there for a while enjoying the relative quiet, except for the birdsong. You manage to slip out from under the covers without waking her, shivering slightly in the cold air. Seems like the AC had been really turned up.

"For who?" You wonder sarcastically, looking back at the vixen.

You quietly walk into the bathroom off from your bedroom and shut the door. There in the darkness, your mind tries to grapple with the idea. Not coming up with much, you reach up, and flick the light. As the light comes up, you catch a view of yourself in the mirror over the sink. There seems to be something different about you.

15522111111111.content:
You take a deep breath as you step through the door into your restaurant. Not too long ago, you had quite some success as a chef, after rising quickly through the ranks in the kitchen. Now you own your own restaurant, a decent sized place called the Den, why avoid your wolf and predatory heritage after all? You entered through the front door this time, just to check out the dining room. As you walk through, various staff setting up for the day give you variations on “Good day, Chef Drakkar.” You say response back to each as you help out where needed while on your trip back to the kitchen. There, the kitchen staff are hard at work on their preparations for the day.

Your sous chef Korrinna, a tall slender raven, was already working on preparing the breads the Den would go through. She had just put the next batch aside to rise when she noticed you standing in the doorway. She gave a whistle to get everyone else’s attention, and as one they said, “Good morning, Chef.” You give a toothy grin at how they always do that despite you never requesting anything of the sort.

Waving them off, you respond, “All right, everyone get back to work.”

Grabbing your own chef coat out of your nearby office, you wash your hands and slip on a hair net, before joining in the work. Geoff, a big tall jovial polar bear, is busy working on a side of aged beef. Jessi, a short rabbit girl, is mowing her way through a pile of fruits and vegetables at her station. Joe is an older croc, longtime friend of yours, and is well on his way through building the various broths and stocks everyone would need for the day. After checking everyone’s progress, you went to work on a huge red snapper, carefully removing scales and bones, and making quick work of getting the filets off in one piece.

A thought occurs to you, “Anyone seen Scott?” referring to the dishwasher who is missing from work.

Various answers amounting to no are your response. You give a slight growl, that guy was almost always late, when he decided to show up at all. The sound of the front door opening and closing stirs you from your thoughts. Footsteps coming your way announce someone coming back towards the kitchen.

155221111111111.content:
“Sorry boss, got held up in traffic,” a voice says getting closer to the door separating the kitchen and dining room.

You recognize the voice as belonging to Scott, the missing dishwasher. Something about the voice seems oddly familiar to you in another way, but you aren’t quite sure why. Your thoughts are disrupted when Scott slaps the door opens and walks in. Your attempt to berate him for being late again dies in your throat, and in your startled state your knife nearly slices into your finger. Cursing under your breath, you are left staring at him, and shocked to find you looking at yourself, or at least your old human self!

All of the memories from your other life come crashing back, colliding with your new memories of this life. With a groan, you hold your head, all of the conflicting memories giving you a splitting headache. Recovering enough, you manage to open your eyes, blinking away the tears, and see the concerned looks on everyone’s faces. Joe has his hand out, nearly touching you but not quite.

“Everything alright?” he asks, placing his hand on your shoulder to steady you, and you now realize that you are swaying on your feet.

Shaking your head, you are unsuccessful at forcing the “other” memories away, but you are able to answer, “Yeah…yeah, just a…bad headache. I’ll just go to my office for a bit. All of you have things handled for now?”

All of the staff gives you tentative nods, though they still look concerned. Scott on the other hand is giving you a strange look, and you can’t quite read it, the pounding of your head isn’t helping at all though. Letting Geoff take over on the fish, you move to your office, shutting the door behind you. You can hear some quiet comments even through the door, though they were expressing worry about you. Leaning against the door, you try to wrap your head around the clashing memories. Even last night is mixed up; in one version you remember a wonderful night out with Krystal before going back home, while in the other…you can only find disjointed and broken fragments that don’t make much sense. Shaking your head does little to dispel the fog blanketing your mind as the various memories clash and vie for dominance. A knock at the door causes you to jump, though you are welcome for a brief distraction.

Once you are sure that your heart resumes beating, you move away from the door, and call out in as steady a voice as you can manage, “Come in.”

15533212122.content:
Still, despite the sudden appearance of a slumbering yet obese Colleen from Road Rovers, you weren't entirely sure how this even happened. So, out of mere curiosity from this impossible conundrum, you voluntarily decided to explore your home, to see if anything else had changed along with acquiring yourself an obese Colleen.

Carefully, you quietly dismounted yourself from your bed, so as to awaken the slumbering anthropomorphic canine, who proceeded to unconsciously roll onto her voluminous backside, as her flabby apron belly slowly inflated and deflated with each slumbering breath.

From there, you slowly tiptoe your way toward the door, which now appeared to be a wide pair of oak double doors. You slowly turned the doorknob and quietly exited the bedroom, cautiously closing the door behind you. Honestly, you'd thought she would wake up, since dogs are know to have sensitive hearing. Then again, Colleen might be a heavy sleeper, no pun intended.

Now that you were out of earshot, you exhaled a deep breath and thought, "...Okay, this is...weird. How the hell did Colleen get here? She's supposed to be a cartoon character!"

However, your thoughts soon continued, "Also, why is she so...FAT?!" Suffice to say, you were undoubtedly confused about this entire situation. I mean, sure Colleen was basically your childhood crush, despite being a fictional character, and you've seen many pictures of her on DeviantArt, but still...how the hell did she get so big?

Needless to say, you knew you had to find some answers, as you then began to realize how different your entire home was now. Originally, you lived in a small but decent one-bedroom apartment, but now...now it looked more akin to a goddamn penthouse!

"Okay, this is...new." You thought to yourself, being surprisingly calm about all of this, as you began to explore your new environs. First, you head into the kitchen area, which was now larger and more spacious, obviously to accommodate a certain obese anthropomorphic Collie, complete with an industrial-sized fridge and freezer combo, as well as a smaller refrigerator alongside it, which most likely belonged to you.

Alongside that, there was a large dining area, complete with what appeared to be a downright massive reinforced chair big enough to hold two to three people at once, obviously meant for Colleen, given her currently established size and girth. From there, you then noticed the Living Room area, complete with a ruby red love seat, mahogany oak coffee table, 108 inch Flatscreen TV, video game console, and entertainment center.

Looking to your left from the Dining Room area, you noticed an outdoor terrace balcony area, blocked off by a set of pristine plexiglass windows and a wide plexiglass sliding door, just as the morning sun began to ascend upon a metropolis before you. It was there that you took notice of the elaborate yet stylized patio area, complete with a Jacuzzi tub large enough for Colleen to easily sit her fat self in.

Suffice to say, it was certainly a place fit for a Triple-A film actor, not someone who is married to a fictional cartoon character from the 1990s. Overall, this felt really weird, to say the least.

However, your attention soon altered upon seeing what looked to be a bookcase stored with books on the lower half, and a set of framed photographs on the upper half. Becoming rather curious (as well as seeking definitive answers to what has transpired), you calmly approached the bookcase, looking at the photographs displayed within the ornate picture frames.

At first, the first two photos were of you and your many relatives. However, upon looking at the third framed photo, you could clearly make out the distinguished appearances if the famed Road Rovers. From left to right, there stood, Hunter, the Golden Retriever from the U.S. Blitz, the Doberman from Germany. Exile, the Husky from Siberia. Shag, the Old English Sheepdog from Switzerland. And Muzzle, the berserk Rottweiler, who's always kept in a straitjacket and dog muzzle, due to his violent tendencies. And finally, stood you and Colleen, hands around each other's waists whilst facing the camera.

Judging from the background, you and the Road Rovers seem to be outside of the Road Rovers' main headquarters in New Mexico. "Well... This certainly explains a few things." You mentally noted, easily noticing yourself wearing some military body armor and holstering a M92F Beretta sidearm.

However, upon closer inspection of the photograph, you noticed something big and humanoid standing in the center behind Exile and Shag. It looked lanky yet nimble, as it was adorned with these sharp and angular pieces of white armor, bearing these glowing green eye-like optics below a large horned V-shaped golden headpiece, with a white faceplate and blood red chin-piece.

At first, you initially didn't recognize what it was. However, you soon experienced these brief yet vivid flashbacks of a violent and bloody conflict, in which only a name repeated in your frontal lobe:

Gundam. Lupus.

It echoed in your head for what seemed like ages, until...

"...My god. Th-That... That's a Gundam!" Your thoughts shrieked, upon realizing that the giant robot was some sort of Gundam from the Mobile Suit Gundam Franchise, looking eerily similar to Gundam Barbatos from Mobile Suit Gundam: Iron-Blooded Orphans, but with some key differences. The V-shaped horns were somewhat longer in the photo, as the mech appeared to be kneeling in the picture.

"B-But how? I don't remember any of this!" You thought, as you then began to experience another set of flashbacks, only these ones were far more vivid and intense than before, as if to remind you. In essence, these "false memories" took you to when...
15533212122.title: A New Home, A Different Life

155332121222.content:
In essence, it felt like a dream. Yet, it felt so vividly real.

The sounds of gunfire. The echoes of explosions in the distance. And the intense ferocity on both sides. This...was a battle.

"(Name)!! Get your ass over here! Parvo's got the professor!!" A voice rang out from the comms system inside the massive behemoth you piloted, the Gundam Lupus, just as you swiftly maneuvered it with inhuman agility and ferocity, killing an equally large Cano-Mutant via impaling it's skull with a nanofiber blade.

You recognized it he voice belonging to Blitz, the German Doberman, judging from his thick accent. "I'm on it!" You instinctively quipped, due to it being such a livid memory, as you felt Gundam Lupus sprinting at full speed, slaying multiple building-sized Cano-Mutants in the process. And yet, you were aware that these Cano-Mutants were sent by the dreaded General Parvo in a siege against the Road Rovers HQ.

After all, Parvo was hellbent on conquering the world. You and the Road Rovers were in his way of such heinous ambitions. Much to you being in the backseat iif this memory, your past self moved the terrifying Mobile Suit with such dexterity and lethality that it felt like riding a bike.

But as you approached the center of the siege, you saw Colleen fighting against Parvo, who seemed to have his own Mobile Suit, which he called "Gundam Felus", since he was part-cat. "Let go of the Professor, you mangy furball!" Colleen yelled over the comms, trying to open the cockpit hatch to fight Parvo one-on-one, only to be violently swatted aside by the massive machine as Parvo sneered, "Pathetic bitch!"

"COLLEEN!!!" You screamed, as Colleen violently smacked against the nearby wall, knocking her into a lifeless state. Surprisingly, you felt your blood boil with seething rage towards the madman, who cackled with glee over Colleen's unresponsive form.

And with a surge of murderous intent, you violently throttled the controls at full speed, lunging at Parvo and Gundam Felus with such force whilst you roared, "PARVOOOOOO!!!!!"

"You Insect!!" He shouted, trying to surmount a counterattack, but he was too slow, as you unleashed Gundam Lupus's right clawed hand upon Gundam Felus's head, grabbing it and throwing the mechanized behemoth overhead and into a nearby wall! From there, you put the thrusters at max speed, ramming into Gundam Felus so hard that rock debris flew apart and Gundam Felus's armor getting dented and scratched up with each consecutive blow!

Suffice to say, you felt like a berserker.

Desperate yet becoming terrified, Parvo summoned a few more Cano-Mutants as he yelled, "Don't just stand there, you mangy mutts! KILL GUNDAM LUPUS!!!" However, you soon noticed the three building-sized Cano-Mutants rushing toward you, where you instinctively tossed Parvo and Gundam Felus into his abominable creations, knocking them off their footing with such brute force! Then, you quickly pulled out the Bullhead Mace from it's sheath, blasting your thrusters on full capacity!

You readied your swing, and landed a mighty blow upon the first Cano-Mutant, caving in it's skull! From there, you swung around and bashed in the second Cano-Mutant in the arm, causing it to howl in extreme pain! And yet, whilst you brought the pain upon the bastards, Hunter and Exile, who managed to carry off Colleen to a safer location, noticed how Gundam Lupus's optics were now a bloody orange whilst in the midst of such carnage, which gave them great concern for you.

Finally, after killing the three Cano-Mutants, you slowly turned toward Parvo and Gundam Felus, who merely stood there in fear. In anger, you violently tossed aside the Bullhead Mace, grabbed Gundam Felus by the throat, and you soon commanded Gundam Lupus to begin beating the living shit out of the opposing Mobile Suit, barely missing a beat with each violent punch!

BOOM!!

BOOM!!

BOOM!!

BOOM!!

It felt like it had gone on for hours. However, you soon stopped when Parvo opened the cockpit hatch, letting Professor Shepherd go, while Parvo fearfully pleaded, "Stop!! No more! Leave me be!" Shortly after letting the Professor escape from the two mechanized units, you soon lifted Gundam Felus above you and Gundam Lupus in a rather threatening stance and hissed, "...If I EVER!! see you trying to take the professor, attempt to conquer the world, or even lay a single finger on Colleen..."

From there, you quickly yet violently pulled the Gundam Felus closer, your voice spewing and seething with venomous rage and growled, "...I will make you regret ever becoming a villain. DO YOU UNDERSTAND ME, YOU FELINE-LOVING PUNK!?!?!?!"

"Y-Y-Y-Yes sir." Parvo whimpered, as if he just pissed himself in sheer fear. From there, just as he was about to run away, you quickly placed Gundam Felus over your head, then violently ripped the damaged machine in two with such abhorrent strength from the Gundam Lupus.

Suffice to say, "pissed off" was putting it mildly for you.

And with that eventful memory reaching it's inevitable conclusion, your mind soon returned back to the present. You were reeling somewhat from the intense moment you've just witnessed. And yet, as you tried not to puke your own guts out from seeing such unfiltered violence, you soon questioned, "But...What happened to Colleen? Is...she alright?"

From there, after recollecting yourself from the floor, you soon got back up noticed...

6:00 A.M. was when your alarm clock went off as the sun was starting to rise. You had hit the machine’s snooze button with the palm of your right hand. You leaned back to bed for five more minutes of extra sleep, but you noticed some drastic changes in your bedroom that woke you up in great concern. When you went to bed last night, you had left you clothes on the floor, but now the floor is not only empty of those clothes but also vacuumed as well. Your clothes were cleaned and all folded neatly and organized in your dresser drawers. Your office desk has been dusted and your bookshelf had its contents all alphabetized. You also saw that your bed had gotten a lot bigger overnight, it was once a single innerspring mattress but now a queen sized mattress of memory foam. Even worse, whoever or whatever did this somehow manage to install a large ensuite, with a toilet, bathtub, and shower, where one of the bedroom windows should be.

         As you wonder how could anything have possibly redid your bedroom without you knowing, you hear a giggling coming from a female voice outside the room. However as you soon exit your bedroom you found who did this and you surprised as heck: A lavender unicorn named Twilight Sparkle, from the My Little Pony Friendship is Magic animated television program, with very noticeable differences from the show. First, she is able to stand and move upright with no complications. Secondly she now had a female humanoid body shape, her front legs are now arms with hands consisting of a thumb and four fingers each and the unicorn pony now had a pair of breasts in the position where human female breasts would normally be. Third and most noticeable, was her very obese weight. At 600 lbs., Twilight had an exercise ball sized belly apron that was smooth and orb like in appearance. Her breasts had a terrific combination of jiggly-ness, perkiness, and squishiness to them even though Twilight’s breasts were the size of medicine balls. Her butt was slightly smaller than her breasts but still swayed greatly along with her tail when she moved around. Her hips were 4 and half feet wide and her arms and legs were very thick with fat. The Anthropomorphic Unicorn was wearing nothing but a lilac bra and matching panties, which only covered up her private parts. Even her unicorn horn on top of her mane seemed be to fatter as well.

         “Good morning sunshine.” She greeted as she pulled you into a big fat hug. Twilight Sparkle was a foot taller than you so you ended up squished into her breasts before being lifted up so she could snuggle her fat cheeks with yours.

         “What’s going on?” you asked.

         Twilight just giggled again, “You’re so cute when you act forgetful,” She then pulled out a check list that was stored in between her giant breasts and used her unicorn magic to unravel it. “Todays our special day and we’re starting off with…

French toast, waffles, blueberry pancakes, omelets, scrambled eggs, frittatas, biscuits and gravy, hash browns, breakfast potatoes, oatmeal, granolas, all kinds of breakfast cereals, cinnamon rolls, donuts, bear claws, Danishes, various slices of fresh fruit, glasses of fruit juices, and fresh milk. From the look of the total quantity and the portion sizes of the food, you could roughly guess, that this meal was meant to serve 90 people.

         Twilight activated her unicorn magic again, and this was much a better display of her mystical abilities. 155332221121121122.content:
However, just as you were about to cautiously enter the "Nursery", you abruptly heard a youthful female voice to your right as it said, "Good Morning, Daddy!" Of course, in response to such a voice, you swiftly turned your head in the direction of the voice's precise origin, which revealed to you something surprising: There was what appeared to be a young anthropomorphic Unicorn mare, standing in the middle of the hallway just a few feet away from you.

In appearance, she was approximately 3 feet in height, around the same height as a 7 year old girl. However, she appeared to have some of the same physical traits as the anthropomorphic yet 600 pound obese Twilight Sparkle, including an anthropomorphic physique, light mauve fur, a small but somewhat pronounced Unicorn horn protruding from her forehead, and a lengthy but beautiful equine mane and tail, which had streaks of violet, light blue, and a single streak of dirty blonde. From there, upon closer inspection, you noticed that her eyes were two separate colors, with her left eye being a moderate violet tone, while her right eye had a jade green hue. Though as for clothing, the young anthro Unicorn made was currently wearing a pink nightgown upon her youthful petite frame, as she comfortably held a Wookie plushie in her arms.

Your mind processed the very words she said to you, which ultimately confirmed what you were suspecting: This wasn't Twilight Sparkle's first pregnancy, for this young anthropomorphic Unicorn mare who stood before you was indeed the biological offspring of you and the obese anthro Twilight.

But then, as if it was instantaneous, you suddenly remembered the name of your Unicorn daughter, Dawn Sparkle, as you knelt down to her height, and calmly picked her up in your arms. From there, you automatically spoke to her with a paternal tone in your voice and said, "Morning to you too, pumpkin. How did you sleep last night?" "Oh, pretty good. Where's Mommy?" She asked, wanting to know where her mother, Twilight Sparkle, was currently located. "Hmm, probably still talking on the phone, Dawn." You casually explained, as you carried your daughter with little effort whilst you made your way back downstairs.

However, as soon as you made it downstairs with your daughter Dawn Sparkle in your arms, you couldn't help but eavesdrop on her phone conversation, just as you then noticed that Twilight was now wearing a large purple turtleneck sweater, which clung snugly to her rotund form and left little to the imagination regarding how much adipose billowed on her anthropomorphic frame, where you then heard her speak into the cell phone and said, "...Mm-hmm. Oh yeah! Yeah, I'm very grateful for you and Coco Pommel for making some bigger clothes for me, Rarity. After all, I'm not exactly going to be getting skinnier anytime soon, considering I'm already a good ways into my second pregnancy."

Despite her already confirming to you that she was indeed speaking to Rarity, one of the Mane Six and the Element of Generosity bearer, Twilight continued to converse with her fashionista friend, just as the anthro Unicorn made placed a gentle but slightly plump hand around the undercarriage of her well-stuffed blubbery belly, giving it a light shake, causing it to jiggle lightly in response, feeling how pleasuring and euphoric it was to have a bloated pregnant belly stuffed with delicious food.

"Oh (Name)? Yes, yes! Of course he's treating me well, Rarity! I mean, he's basically been pampering and spoiling me like a queen ever since we've started dating many moons ago. In a good way, of course!" Twilight replied, as she gently began to rub the side of her belly in slow but soft circles, thus allowing her stomach to have an easier time digesting all that food she devoured earlier. From there, as she listened to Rarity on the phone, Twilight spoke back toward her friend and answered, "...Well, to be honest, Rarity, there IS a legitimate reason why I haven't slimmed down ever since I've dated (Name). And the truth is, well... I, um... I actually really like being this big and fat. Why? *nervous giggle* Well, truth be told, Rarity, (Name) happens to be what they call a "Chubby Chaser" here on Earth. It means he's into *ahem* "larger" girls."

"Was I surprised? Oh Sweet Celestia, I was! I mean, I honestly wasn't aware that there were those who like a mare with a lot of fat on her. Sure, I was reluctant at first to let myself go, but he was there to reassure me that I could stop at anytime I want, that he wasn't forcing me to get ridiculously fat whatsoever." Twilight explained, doing her best to reassure Rarity that she did this out of her love towards you, which made you feel a little warm on the inside. Although you couldn't quite hear what Rarity said to the obese anthro Unicorn, Twilight swiftly replied, "How much do I weigh right now? Well, last time I checked, Rarity, I just passed the 600 pound mark. I mean, I'm so big now that I can't even see the scale's numbers past this blubbery belly of mine anymore. Fortunately, (Name) was there to give me an accurate reading on my exact weight. So yeah, I'm a REALLY big girl now by this point. *giggle*"
155332221121121122.title: A Unicorn For A Daughter

choices: "Go grocery shopping, and get plenty of ingredients for lunch."
"Spend some time at the park."
"Drive around the city, and show you some places where Daddy and I went dating."
1553322211211211221.content:
Twilight then noticed you and Dawn in the corner of her eye and smiled.

"Well I got to get going, I got family time coming up soon. Is my costume going to be ready for tonight?... It'll be at our doorstep at sundown, thanks Rarity!"

Twilight hung up her phone. As you let daughter down, Dawn Sparkle immediately ran forward and hugged her mother's belly. Twilight Sparkle beamed, and gave her belly a slight shake.

"Good morning Mommy!" Dawn, said.

"Good morning to you dearie!" Twilight replied back. " I just need to do dishes, then we'll be ready to go out today. Okay?"

Dawn nodded. It took Twilight 45 minutes in the kitchen to finish up cleaning the dishes of her gigantic breakfast, and you were looking over Dawn Sparkle as she watched some classic cartoons on the TV. You took a quick glance at the calendar, it showed today was Saturday June 3rd, and a look outside the window displayed a beautiful summer day. Once Twilight had the last of the dishes cleaned, she got her purse strapped to her should and announced, "Is everypony and ready?"

Dawn immediately turned off the TV, and got her shoes on. The three of you headed to the garage where your SUV was parked in, your daughter asked, "Where are we going Mommy?"

"We're going to," Twilight answered,...

choices: Eventually, you, Twilight, & Dawn got enough ingredients for lunch.
The three of you returned home with loads of ingredients for lunch.

15533222112112112211.content:
"Well, my little bundle of sunshine, we're going to be going out grocery shopping, and getting ourselves plenty of ingredients for lunch. After all, you Aunts Rarity, Applejack, Rainbow Dash, Pinkie Pie, Fluttershy, and Uncle Spike are going to pay us a visit!" Twilight gleefully answered, which seemed to have made Dawn Sparkle quite excited to see them, as the obese anthropomorphic Twilight Sparkle now wore a red plaid skirt that reached down to her knees along with her turtleneck sweater.

Once all three of you got into the SUV, you sat in the driver's seat while Twilight sat in the adjacent passenger seat, with Dawn sitting in the back, seatbelt fastened around her. From there, you drove the SUV out of the driveway of your 3-story suburban home, heading down the very streets that led toward downtown Chicago, Illinois. Along the way to the grocery store, you spoke toward Twilight and said, "So, um... How's Spike been doing?" "Oh, he and Rarity are doing pretty good from what she has told me over the phone. Though, I must admit, sweetie: I truthfully miss seeing him now that he has moved in with Rarity and Sweetie Belle when I left Equestria to stay with you." Twilight explained, with the subtle hints of feeling a little homesick, considering that from what you could gather, she voluntarily left Equestria to live with you on Earth.

However, attempting to divert onto a different topic, you decided to turn on the radio as you said, "Well, um... Anyway, let's see what's playing right now." And within a few turns of the dial, you inadvertently stumbled upon a radio podcast, as the person on the radio spoke with an ecstatic attitude and said, "Hey, welcome to Mane 99.8, Chicago's top radio show for all things Equestria! My name's Johnny "Wings" Angus, and today, dear listeners... We have a very special guest: Ladies and gents, give it up for the one, the only, DJ PON-3!!!"

Before you could listen to the podcast any further, you, Twilight, and Dawn had soon arrived at the recently built grocery store, known as "Clydesdale's Supermarket For Equestrian Groceries". From what you had learned so far, it seemed that you being married to an obese anthropomorphic Twilight Sparkle wasn't just an idle circumstance, as you could clearly see ordinary human beings interacting with anthropomorphic Ponies of various colors and body structures.

"Well, this is the place." Twilight said, as she then used her magic to pull out and unravel a scroll, which contained a large list of ingredients that needed to be gathered and cataloged. Or at least, that was Twilight's intellectual mentality, as she casually stepped out of the SUV and walked her way inside the grocery store, her padded billowing hips sashaying from left to right in an almost seductive manner underneath her red plaid skirt. From there, you and your daughter, Dawn Sparkle, soon followed suit, making sure that Twilight was looking where she was going. Suffice to say, you somehow knew that this might be a hectic shopping trip.
15533222112112112211.title: Prepping For Lunch

choices: Several hours later, you suddenly heard a knock on the door.
Sometime later, you heard the doorbell ring. Did the Mane 6 just arrive?
155332221121121122111.content:
Eventually, after what seemed like hours of careful and deliberate searching on Twilight's behest, you, Twilight, and Dawn had finally got more than enough ingredients for lunch and possibly dinner, considering the ludicrous amounts of groceries packed tightly in the SUV's trunk. Overall, you could easily see that the obese anthropomorphic Twilight Sparkle (and potentially a few other Ponies) certainly have quite the appetite, as you calmly parked the SUV in the driveway. From there, Dawn swiftly exited out of the parked vehicle by herself, wearing a purple T-Shirt, blue shorts, and pink sandals, as she casually entered the spacious house, using the magic from her still developing Unicorn horn to turn the doorknob, then pushed the door open with ease.

Meanwhile, you and Twilight proceeded to carry in the groceries yourselves, with you carrying a total of 4 grocery bags in each hand. Twilight on the other hand, was hauling most of the grocery bags without breaking a sweat, carrying 3 bags in each hand, while using her magic to levitate the rest of the grocery bags with little to no effort, as you noticed how bright Twilight's Unicorn horn was currently glowing with a bright mauve aura.

Once all three of you were inside the large mansion-like house, Twilight gently lowered the levitated groceries onto the Island Table with relative ease, while you proceeded to place the grocery bags you were carrying alongside the rest of the groceries. "Well, that was much easier than I thought, as expected." Twilight said, beaming a little with self-pride at her personal organization talents, which caused her blubbery pregnant belly to jiggle lightly along with her voluminous breasts. Moments later, Twilight soon pulled out another scroll from her bulbous bosom, then used her magic to levitate and unravel the scroll as she spoke to herself and said, "Now then, let's see what needs to be made..."

"Hmm... Apple Salad and Caramel Apples for Applejack... Apple Cider and Banana Bun Cake for Rainbow Dash... Lemon Cream Cake and Strawberry Lemonade for Fluttershy... Raspberry Jelly Cake and Hay Sandwich for Rarity... A Large Strawberry Shortcake and Chocolate Soufflé for Pinkie Pie... And some Emeralds, Rubies, and a 9 Ounce Sirloin Steak for Spike... Yep, I think that's about it!" Twilight said to herself, putting her photographic memory to full use, remembering what each of her 5 friends and Spike are going to be having for Lunch today. From there, Twilight soon began to work on preparing the lunch food, multitasking with a combination of Unicorn magic and good old fashioned homemade culinary cooking.

Wondering if she might need some assistance, you spoke toward Twilight and asked, "Um, Twilight? Do you need any help with that?" "Oh this? Don't worry, sweetie. I can handle this. Plus, I've gotten MUCH better at cooking thanks to some pointers from Applejack and Pinkie Pie. And besides, don't you have a multiplayer session with your friends on Grand Theft Auto Online today? Something about doing a "Doomsday Heist"?" Twilight answered, reassuring you that she can handle the cooking by herself, as well as reminding you that you have a date with your friends on Grand Theft Auto Online, especially since you and three of your buddies were planning on playing the brand new Doomsday Heist missions in GTA Online.
155332221121121122111.title: Cooking Lunch

1553322211211211221112.content:
Eventually, several hours had flown by, as you played Grand Theft Auto Online on your PlayStation 4, coordinating with your online buddies during one of the Setup missions for the Doomsday Heist mission series. Suffice to say, this online session was certainly going better than you previously expected, as you calmly maneuvered the Mobile Command Center vehicle along the highway with relative ease, while your 3 online buddies were currently inside the vehicle's massive trailer, aiming the vehicle's defenses against any oncoming pursuers.

However, moments after completing the Setup mission with a relatively high score, you suddenly heard the doorbell ring explicitly, which indicated that someone might be at the door. "Hold on, I'm coming." Twilight said, who had finally finished making all of the required delicacies for her friends in such short time, as she casually waddled over toward the main double doors to greet whoever was at your doorstep. From there, upon opening both doors, there stood approximately 6 anthropomorphic Ponies of various physiques and a single adolescent anthropomorphic purple Dragon.

In response to seeing them, a cheerful smile appeared on Twilight's chubby equine snout, where she spoke toward them and ecstatically said, "Girls!" From there, despite her bulk and girth, Twilight swiftly wrapped her plump arms around what appeared to be an anthropomorphic version of Applejack, hugging one of her closest friends as she answered, "Oh, it's so good to see you all again!" "Same 'ere, Twi." Applejack replied, as Twilight politely gestured her friends to come inside her home. It was there you then noticed how physically different each of the remaining members of the Mane Six were now.

The first one to enter was Applejack, who was wearing a pair of denim overalls with a white T-Shirt underneath. In appearance, the cowgirl of a mare appeared to be just as fat as Twilight, complete with a massive apron belly jutting out from underneath her overalls due to consuming loads of Apple-flavored cuisines. However, her arms and hoofed legs told a different story, and instead of displaying equal amounts of adipose, there was a noticeably large amount of muscles on both sets of orange fur limbs, which should belong on a bodybuilder, but you figured those muscles were from Applejack bucking a lot of apple trees. On top of her burgeoning belly, Applejack sported a bountiful pair of Double E-Cup breasts underneath her large white T-Shirt.

Next came Rainbow Dash, who was currently wearing a blue Gym tanktop and Gym Shorts, along with wearing a pair of black fingerless gloves. In appearance, she had a vastly more athletic physique than the obese Twilight Sparkle and the muscle-gut Applejack, complete with toned muscles and a rock solid pair of 8 pack abs underneath all that cyan fur. After that, Fluttershy walked inside, wearing a lemon yellow turtleneck sweater and blue jeans. In appearance, the timid yellow anthropomorphic Pegasus was certainly sporting a chubby physique, but she certainly wasn't as fat as Twilight and Applejack in terms of size and girth.

Moments later, Rarity waltzed her way inside the house, who wore a tight form-fitting pair of designer jeans, a purple V-neck tanktop, and a white leather designer jacket. In appearance, Rarity proudly sported a slim but curvaceous hourglass figure, complete with a perky pair of Double D-Cup breasts. And last but not least, Pinkie Pie made her way in. Or rather, she waddled her way in, wearing a humongous pair of pink sweatpants and a massive light blue T-shirt. In appearance, she was certainly the fattest member of the Mane Six, appearing to be a little over a hundred pounds heavier than Twilight herself, complete with a big blubbery apron belly stuffed into the front of her sweatpants, which did little to conceal it's size and girth. Overall, you figured that Pinkie Pie might have been tasting her own sweets at Sugarcube Corner to grow to such a blubbery size.

Finally, Spike followed closely behind Rarity, wearing olive green cargo pants and a T-Shirt with the Injustice 2 logo imprinted on the front. In appearance, Spike had the athletic physique of your average teenager who often goes to the Gym, complete with some toned muscles subtly hidden underneath his purple draconian scales. Overall, everyone had finally entered inside the spacious house with little difficulty.
1553322211211211221112.title: The Arrival of The Mane Six

Moments later, your youthful and petite daughter, Dawn Sparkle, soon exited from her bedroom, now wearing a yellow T-shirt and green basketball shorts. Of course, shortly after exiting her bedroom, she soon became very aware of the rest of the Mane Six and Spike, which filled her with excessive amounts of youthful glee and excitement on her mauve equine snout. In response, she quickly ran toward her Aunts as she gleefully exclaimed, "Auntie Applejack!"

Of course, both Applejack and the other members of the Mane Six (excluding the rotund Twilight Sparkle) soon heard Dawn's exuberant voice, thus prompting Applejack to turn her enlarged muscle-gut physique around to greet her niece, kneeling down on one knee and extending her muscular arms outwards to embrace the youthful and petite Dawn Sparkle with orange furry open arms, where she happily replied, "Hey, there's my favorite niece! Come give yer Auntie Applejack a hug!"

And just like that, Dawn ran headlong towards the corpulent Applejack, colliding with her massive belly, as Applejack wrapped her muscular arms around your daughter in a familial embrace, nuzzling the petite anthro Unicorn girl against her bountiful bosom for a moment or two then spoke toward Dawn and queried, "So... How's mah favorite niece doing? Make any new friends here?"

"*giggle* Oh yeah, Auntie Applejack! I made a lot of new friends at the school I go to!" Dawn eagerly chirped, just as Rainbow Dash, Fluttershy, Pinkie Pie, Spike, and Rarity soon said their greetings toward the youthful and petite Dawn Sparkle, greeting her with the same familial embrace as Applejack had performed previously. After all, it appeared they came all the way from Equestria just to see Dawn, just as the elephantine Pinkie Pie unrealistically but swiftly pulled out a large box, which turned out to house...

Something else happens.
155332221121121122111211.content:
"Happy Birthday Dawn!" Pinkie said as she brought out Dawn’s cake.

Pinkie pulled out surprisingly small rectangular birthday Angel Food cake with a white vanilla buttercream frosting and garnished with strawberries and blueberries, with the words "Happy Birthday Dawn Sparkle" written in lilac icing and sprinkled with confetti candy. "That's bit small for all of us." you noticed.

"Oh, don't be silly Namey!" Pinkie said (Namey being a nickname the titanic pink pony gave you some reason), “I brought an extra-large one for all of us!"

She brought out from her hammerspace of fat rolls the adults' cake. It was larger, by 4 four layers higher and 5 feet forward in every direction. The Mane Six were in awe (with the heavier ones having their mouths open) at the cake’s size. The adults’ cake was the same composition and flavors as Dawn’s cake. The moment Pinkie Pie had set the birthday cake down, Twilight had already began cutting with a levitated knife and serving her friends, portion sized directly related to each pony’s physique. After the girls (Mostly Pinkie, Twilight, and Applejack) finished the cake, Presents were opened, and Dawn loved each gift The Mane Six had given. Your unicorn daughter had received a new clothing line from Rarity, A basketball hoop from Rainbow Dash, from Fluttershy, An R.C Tractor from Applejack, and an Ice Cream maker kit from Pinkie Pie. Twilight was looking outside at the driveway anxiously.

“Something wrong dear?” Rarity asked.

“I’m fine,” Twilight answered, “I’m just worried that mom and dad are late.”

“Yeah, I heard there was some terrible weather over at Crystal Empire this morning. Their flight got delayed, but their plane should be arriving anytime soon.” Rainbow Dash ansered

“Thanks Rainbow, I just don’t want my parents and big brother to miss out on Dawn's birthday.”

“Speaking of travel, have you ever considered?” Spike asked.

“Well a vacation is going to be our present for Dawn, but” you said before Twilight Sparkle finished for you.

“We’re still deciding where to go. Dawn's geography interests are all over the place. We’ve been considering Munich, Siem Reap, Sydney…”

“How about Ponyville?” Applejack asked.

“Believe me, Ponyville has been on the top of our list.” You answered.

1553322211211211221112111.content:
"Speaking of travel, have you ever considered?" Spike asked.

"Well, a vacation is going to be our present for Dawn, but..." You said, before Twilight Sparkle finished for you.

"-- We're still deciding where to go. Dawn's geography interests are all over the place. We've been considering Munich, Siem Reap, Sydney..."

"How about Ponyville?" Applejack asked.

"Believe me, Ponyville has been on the top of our list." You answered.

-- Two Hours Later --

Eventually, after two hours of waiting, you and the others then heard the sounds of a ringing doorbell, where you stood up from the couch as you commented, "Hmm. That must be them."

From there, you casually approached the double doors, opening them to reveal the presence of anthropomorphic versions of Twilight's parents, Twilight Velvet and Night Light, as well as Twilight's brother, Shining Armor, and his wife, Princess Cadance.

In appearance, Twilight Velvet apoeared as an average anthropomorphic version of herself, as well as her husband, but Shining Armor had a slightly more muscular physique, most likely due to his military raining in the Royal Guard. Though Cadance on the other hand, she was just as large as Applejack!

But unlike Applejack, Cadance's muscles weren't as pronounced as Applejack's, as said muscles were coated in plentiful amounts of plump cellulite.

"Hey there, guys! Come on in, we were just getting started." You said, gesturing them to come inside, where you then looked back at the rotund Twilight and exclaimed, "Oh Twilight~! Guess who's here?"

In response, Twilight looked behind her, quickly becoming rather excited to see her parents, as well as her beloved B.B.B.F.F (Big Brother Best Friend Forever), along with someone who was like a sister to her, despite her substantially larger physique. And yet, despite the extra weight and heft she now beared, Twilight rushed up to Cadance, where both the lavender Anthro Unicorn and the mildly larger pink Alicorn proceeded to greet one another with their "Secret Hoofshake", as they simultaneously said, "Sunshine, sunshine. Ladybugs awake! Clap your hooves and do a little shake."

"Oh, Cadance! It's so good to see you and Shiny again!" Twilight retorted, lividly hugging Cadance, despite their extensive girths and burgeoning bellies. In response, Cadance responded in kind, hugging her "little sister" in the process as she replied, "*giggle* Same here, Twily! Though I must say, you're certainly catching up with me."

Of course, this soon made you realize that Cadance was certainly much heavier and fatter than Twilight, judging from what the elephantine pink Alicorn had just retorted. Though, judging from her overall size, Cadance must be weighing at least 800 pounds, maybe a bit more than that. Who knows!

A brief moment later, Twilight soon directed her attention upon her brother, quickly tackling him with childish glee, as she quipped, "*childish giggle* And how's my most favorite B.B.B.F.F?"

"*chuckle* Well, I certainly didn't want to miss my niece's special day, that's for sure, Twily!" Shining answered, where you soon notice Dawn rushing over to both her grandparents, as well as her Aunt and Uncle, showing childish glee and enthusiasm as she exclaimed, "Grandma! Grandpa! Uncle Shining and Aunt Cadance!"

"Heyyyy! There's my favorite ball of sunshine!" Cadance chirped, quickly scooping the Human-Unicorn hybrid into her thick doughy arms, hugging her against the pink Alicorn's round paunch of a belly. Of course, Cadance soon let Dawn down to greet her uncle and grandparents.

15533222112112112211121112.content:
To say that the preparations to travel to Twilight Sparkle's old stomping grounds was packed was rather quite the understatement.

When you and the heavyset anthro Twilight personally gave Dawn the wonderful news of having a two week long vacation in Ponyville, the youthful Human-Unicorn hybrid offspring could cheer and jeer with a profound sense of glee. Though, in all honesty, you couldn't help but feel a little excited as well at the prospect, becoming curious as to how the three of you will get to Equestria...

== The Next Day... ==

"Alrighty then! Does everypony have their luggage ready?" Twilight quipped, her burgeoning belly jiggling slightly from such a proclamation, using her own Unicorn magic to levitate a set of six large luggage bags, whilst she wore a matching pair of lilac bras and panties underneath a casual ensemble, including a massive pair of booty short-shorts and a large T-shirt with an image of Jem & The Holograms emblazoned on the garment.

"Coming, Mommy!" Dawn shouted, running down the stairs to greet her blubbery parent. You on the other hand, were certainly getting your daily workout, carrying both your own luggage and Dawn's luggage as well, slowly descending the staircase as to avoid losing your overall balance, where you then answered, "*grunt* Yeah. Ready as I'll ever be, sweetie."

"*giggle* Don't worry, (Name)! Let me help you with that." The corpulent anthro Unicorn chirped, to which she then promptly surrounded the luggage you were hauling in a mystical mauve aura, only for you to then feel the luggage bags magically lift themselves from your person and towards the hefty Twilight Sparkle and Dawn.

Suffice to say, it gave your muscles a cathartic sense of relief from the overall weight of all those bags.

From there, you quickly took your place at their side, to which Twilight soon spoke up and elaborated, "...Now then, I've been working on this spell for a while, so let's see if all that studying has paid off. Everypony, hold on!"

And with that, as if acting on pure instinct, both you and Dawn quickly held onto Twilight's hands respectively, just as her Unicorn horn grew brighter and brighter with each passing second until--

-- FLASH!! --

And just like that, as if you had blinked at that moment, the three of you had finally arrived in Equestria. You blinked twice and thrice to make sure your eyes weren't deceiving you. Of course, it was no false vision or mirage, as you soon saw numerous Ponies of various colors, sizes, and appearances trotting about like it was a usual day in Equestria.

"Ohmygoshohmygoshohmygosh!! We're in Ponyville!" You heard Dawn exclaim with excitement and glee in her young voice, to which you then looked back toward your loving family, only to see that...

155332221121121122111211122.content:
In the somewhat decent amount of time you've spent in this new reality, you've thought you have seen what's on hand, especially when it came to anthropomorphic version of characters from My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic.

However, upon looking at your beloved bloated wife and hybrid offspring, life threw quite the curveball for sure. Instead of seeing just two anthropomorphic Unicorns, somehow, Twilight and Dawn became full-on Unicorns straight out of the famed cartoon series.

First, you looked over Dawn Sparkle, who looked like a full-on Pony version of her usual self, with only her Hello Kitty T-Shirt being what remained of her outfit, as you soon noted how much you towered over your half-breed daughter.

"Whew! That worked a lot better than I expected!" Twilight chirped, beaming with pride upon her successful application of what you assumed to be a Teleportation Spell of sorts. Of course, your eyes soon wandered from your child and onto what had become of the anthropomorphic Twilight Sparkle.

And, well... To sum up your initial reaction, it would be akin to something straight out of a Tex Avery cartoon, jaw on the floor and such. Upon looking at Twilight's current physical form, there were several things worth noting. First, she was practically the spitting image of Twilight Sparkle, as if she walked right out of the television screen and into the real world. Second (and the most obvious), was her overall size.

After all, if memory served you, she said that she just passed the 600 pound mark back when she was talking with Rarity on the phone. And boy did she look like a Pony who weighed that much. Her body looked and felt somewhat akin to a mauve-colored water balloon, with Twilight Sparkle's chubby head, multi-colored tail, and hooves jutting out from such a bloated bulbous object, as such a physique only made Twilight's plumper face all the more obvious.

https://images.app.goo.gl/Rp3QuhKUuCs7k4...

In all honesty, you weren't even sure if Twilight could actually move on her own four hooves by herself, as you can see that the bottoms of her hooves could barely touch the ground that her burgeoning abdomen was so easily making contact with. Of course, in response, the only words you could mutter at the moment were, "...Wow..."

"...Is something wrong, honey?" She asked, looking back at you, as her head only reached just around your upper pelvis region, but her back-fat jutted out barely above her head, emphasizing that whole "Water Balloon" comparison you've made in your mind's eye. In response to her question, you cleared your throat some and retorted, "Nothing. It's just, um...Can you still walk in your, uh...current state?"

"...Huh? What do you mean? Of course I can still--" Twilight replied, her body motioning to your front, only to soon feel how much her violet hooves could barely get any traction with the ground to gain locomotion. Her eyes darted down upon the bloated corpulent mass that was her own body (Or at least, about as much as she could physically see for the time being), just as an instinctive beet red blush appeared upon Twilight's plump fuller cheeks, obviously out of not expecting a situation such as this.

From there, out of curiosity, she placed an experimental poke and prod with her left forehoof, taking note of how much adipose is condensed from her 600 pound anthropomorphic form, and how it has effected her Equine form, instinctively uttering to herself as she said aloud, "Oh... Wow, I, um... Well...This I certainly did not expect."

"Are you going to be alright, Mommy?" Dawn asked, her concern making itself known to the two of you, considering her mother's heavyset predicament at the moment. Of course, her maternal side showing itself once more, Twilight looked back at her now Equine daughter, to which she then calmly reassured, "...I'll be fine, my little Starlight. I'm just...Nnnh! Going to have a little trouble waddling about. That's all."

From there, Twilight began to attempt to resolve the situation she unwittingly found herself in, her Unicorn horn still glowing from levitating everyone's luggage. First, she attempted to slowly rock herself forward, so her forehooves can gain a decent foothold on the ground beneath her, but it didn't seem to work out as she envisioned.

Then, she tried the same method, but in the opposite direction, using her hind-hooves to propel herself forward, which made her posture look just a tad bit silly, especially with her spreading her forehooves out like a set of wings to balance herself. Though, it seemed that her equally rotund behind was now much heftier due to lacking a pair of breasts, as the cellulite-filled rear end of hers smooshed against the back of her hind-legs from such deliberate articulation of her hind limbs.

It was such an unintentionally comical display that both you and Dawn Sparkle had to stifle your laughter so Twilight can still concentrate. Ultimately, after several minutes of struggling with her almost immobile physique, Twilight...
155332221121121122111211122.title: Reality-Warping Wibbly-Wobbly MLP

choices: "Sweet Apple Acres. I'm hankering for some of Applejack's food."
My old home, the Treehouse Library,  since we need to offload our stuff."
"Sugarcube Corner. I can really go for a triple-layer chocolate cake right now."
1553322211211211221112111221.content:
Eventually, after much unintentionally comical struggling on her own behalf, Twilight was able to figure out to propel herself forward of her own volition. And surprisingly, even for her, it didn't actually involve the use of any magic whatsoever.

Apparently, as you and Dawn were personally witnessing first-hand (Or...first-hoof, in this case), all the now elephantine Unicorn mare had to do was physically shift her weight from side to side whilst she planteed one hoof in front of the other, akin to a tune from a certain Christmas-themed Rankin Bass movie involving Saint Nick.

Currently, you and your now Equine daughter calmly followed closely behind the rotund Unicorn matriarch of the family, obviously out of some reasonable concern that Twilight might accidentally lose her gelatinous balance and comically roll and stumble onto her equally chubby back should she even trip.

And yet, as the three of you unintentionally garnered some attention from some of the residents of Ponyville, some outright recognizing Twilight Sparkle right off the bat, the rather heavyset Unicorn mare was easily keeping her balance, multitasking with both lumbering about her old stomping grounds, as well as maintaining total concentration on using her magic to levitate the luggage floating around the three of you.

But still, you couldn't help but be mildly confused as to why you were still human in a place ran by creatures of the Equestrian kind, scratching the back of your head some whilst you questioned, "Strange... How come I'm still Human? Shouldn't have I been turned into a Pony as well?"

"I know, right? How come Dad is still human while I've turned into a Pony as well, Mommy?" Dawn asked, obviously agreeing with you on such a question. Strangely enough, Twilight didn't seem to be breaking into a heaping pile of sweat as you would've expected, considering how much she weighs right now. In response to such doubts, Twilight soon spoke up and calmly explained in an almost geek-like manner as she theorized, "...Good question indeed. Though, I believe it has something to do with the latent magical energies that all Unicorns, Pegasi, and Earth Ponies have here in Equestria. After all, why else would you still be Human, sweetie pie?"

"Sooo... What you're saying is that since our little girl is half-Equestrian, she's attuned to this place like you are? Hence why she's now a Pony here?" You retorted, as if you can easily understand what Twilight was saying behind all the eloquent science garble. That is, if one can call Magic a type of scientific subject. Of course, Twilight easily nodded in confirmation, despite her now even more obvious double chin made itself more noticeable from such an act, to which she then continued, "...Exactly. It only makes sense as to why you still retain a Human physique whilst me and Dawn are now more Equine."

"Ohhh. That explains a lot." Dawn chirped, now gaining clarity as to what her mother was saying. However, whilst you kept a casual pace with your wife and daughter, your eyes curiously wandered around, taking in every nook and cranny of Ponyville, as if like walking into a reconstructed village of Hogwarts at Universal Studios Resort. Suffice to say, the average My Little Pony fan would be losing it if they were in your shoes right now.

However, you couldn't help but notice how a handful of mares passerby were almost as fat as Twilight. Some were only mildly plump, others were noticeably fat, while a few were downright obese. Though, if anything that occurred at Dawn's birthday party would be similar, you had a feeling that Pinkie Pie would certainly win the County Fair Prize as the Fattest Pony in Ponyville, that's for sure!

Though, speaking of things in Ponyville, another question soon arose, to which you looked back at the comically rotund Unicorn mare and curiously asked, "...So, out of curiosity, what's our first stop here in Ponyville, Twilight?"

Soon, with a chubby dimpled smile appearing upon her plump equine face and snout, Twilight eyed back you with quite the cheeky grin for a Pony weighing 600 pounds, as she then replied, "*giggle* Funny you should ask, sweetie! I was actually thinking of us visiting..."
1553322211211211221112111221.title: Big Unicorn Britches & Dimensional Anomalies

"...I was thinking of visiting Sugarcube Corner. I've been hankering to try one of those new "Belly-Buster" Cakes Pinkie Pie was making." Twilight answered, her mind's eye already imagining how delectable said cake was going to be, which caused her to subconsciously lick her own lips in eager gluttonous anticipation.

Of course, despite your unfamiliarity with the My Little Ponies series as a whole, you couldn't help but find Twilight's behavior in regards to food to be rather adorably cute, letting out a bit of a chuckle in the process as you retorted, "*chuckle* Sounds like a plan. Though, we should first get our bags dropped off first."

"Agreed. Thankfully, Spike and the others have been tending to my old home while I've been living with you on Earth, sweetie." She complied, leaving the scrumptious thought of binging on cake upon the backburner for the moment, as she lumbered in the direction of her former home: The Treehouse Library.

== 25 Minutes Later... ==

Fortunately, it didn't take long to reach the Treehouse Library and offload the luggage, as the three of you made your way over to Sugarcube Corner, with Twilight waddling her way over there just a smidge faster than previously.

"Hmm... I guess she really is that hungry for sweets, then." You thought, your eyes gazing directly at the jiggling wobbling mass of blubber and mauve fur that is Twilight Sparkle, while you and Dawn easily kept up with the elephantine Unicorn mare with little effort. Of course, as the famed bakery itself soon came into clear view, another thought crossed your mind, only mentally thinking, "...Y'know? I got a feeling we're going to be seeing Pinkie Pie again real soon."

However, such curious thoughts soon took a backseat for the time being, as you, Twilight, and Dawn quickly approached the main entrance to the Sugarcube Corner bakery, with Twilight leading the charge. Once the three of you arrived, Twilight casually waddled towards a rather distinct Earth Pony mare.

In appearance, she had a very light cerulean fur coat, accentuated by a light crimson mane and tail, which was also adorned with pale, light greyish crimson stripes, all whilst they were formed into an ice cream-like swirl. Currently, the mare was busy sprucing up the front of the shop a little, humming a brief tune to herself in the process, only to stop when she heard the distinct sound of Twilight's voice as she said, "Hi, Mrs. Cake."

Upon hearing your rotund wife's voice, Mrs. Cake quickly spun around towards the voice's point of origin, only to soon become quite surprised, brilliant rose eyes widening quite substantially to show her initial reaction, only for a smile to soon follow afterwards. And then, in an almost swift motion, she wrapped her hooves around Twilight's larger form whilst she ecstatically exclaimed, "Sweet Celestia! Twilight Sparkle, is that you?"

"*giggle* The one and only!" She replied, soon feeling Mrs. Cake's forehooves barely wrap themselves around her substantially fatter form, which certainly caught her by surprise. Then, she soon ended the friendly embrace to take a gander at the much heftier Unicorn, astonished at how big she's gotten as the mare chirped, "My goodness! Look at you... You're practically as big as Pinkie Pie!"

"*giggle* Close, but no cupcake. After all, I'm only a hundred pounds lighter than Pinkie, Mrs. Cake." Twilight replied, blushing a little from such a compliment. Then again, she figured that Mrs. Cake was more accustomed to seeing her at a smaller size, so it was only fair for Mrs. Cake's reaction to be so blatant. However, both mares had a good chuckle out of it soon afterwards, to which the cerulean mare then quipped, "It's good to see you again, Twilight! I assume your stay in Human society is doing well?"

"It sure is! In fact, I thought I'd bring my family here for a two week stay here in Equestria. You know? Have them see the old neighborhood?" Twilight answered, to which she then...

Fortunately, Mrs. Cake brushed it off with a light chuckle, easily telling if somepony was hungry when she saw them, responding with a simple gesture to follow her inside Sugarcube Corner whilst saying, "Let's get inside. I'm sure a certain somepony must be quite famished by now after a long trip."

But as you watched as both Dawn and Twilight promptly followed behind Mrs. Cake inside the establishment, you stayed just behind the obese Unicorn mare in case her britches just happened to now be too fat for the doorframe. Sure, it looked as if she was going to get herself wedged in the doorway, but luckily it wasn't the case, as Twilight calmly waddled her way inside the bakery, with her blubber-filled haunches simply brushing against the wooden doorframe.

A series of varying voices bellowed, which undoubtedly caught the three of you by surprise, only to soon realize whom was speaking:

The remaining Mane Six, Spike, Shining Armor, Cadence, Twilight's parents, and almost a dozen other residents of Equestria. Hell, even Discord was present!

Suffice to say, aside from garnering a glimpse of an utterly massive cake off to the side, Twilight couldn't help but feel overwhelmingly grateful for her friends welcoming her back home, as she lumbered over to hug each of them, with Pinkie being the most difficult to properly hug due to her over-encumbering girth compared to Twilight.

(Author's Note: I apologize in advance for any spelling, grammatical, or punctuation errors; I'm typing this on my android phone, and my thumbs are bigger than the damn keys. They really need an option to adjust the size of the keyboard buttons.)

Light flooded through the curtains, shimmering down onto your eyelids. This woke you up; with a yawn, you rose to greet this brand new day, only to notice something was off about your bedroom... check that, SEVERAL things were off about your bedroom. The first thing you noticed was that your bed's mattress was big enough to hold 3 people or more. This was strange, as you remember going to sleep on a twin size mattress; a mattress only big enough for one person. The second thing that seemed out of place was the size of your bedroom; it was huge! "Why is my bedroom so big? I live alone in an apartment," you thought to yourself.

Shaking that off, you looked around at what decorated your bedroom. Posters of your favorite bands dotted the walls: Metallica; DragonForce; Poison; Def Leppard; Anthrax; Slayer; Megadeth; Slipknot; Black Sabbath; Mötley Crüe; Motörhead; and quite a few others. You were starting to get really confused. Before you could ponder anymore, you heard very heavy footsteps drawing closer to you.

"Well, look who's up," a cheerful voice said. You looked over at the door... and your jaw dropped when you saw who was standing in the door frame; Rainbow Dash from My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic was standing there, smiling at you. She looked very different than you remembered. For one thing, she was standing on her hind legs. Secondly; she was incredibly obese! Her belly was as big as a beach ball; her breasts were as big as bowling balls, as were her ass cheeks; her hips were at least 4 feet wide; her legs and arms were as thick as tree trunks; overall, she had to weigh at least 500 pounds or more! Also, she had hands! What was an obese, anthropomorphic Rainbow Dash doing in your bedroom, and dressed in nothing but an extremely tight looking bra and pair of panties, no less?

"What seems to be wrong, honey?" She said with a notable worry in her voice. She walked over to you, her massive hips swaying side to side, her giant belly jiggling with every step - wait, "honey"? What did she mean by that? She wrapped her arms around you, pulling you into a big hug. She squeezed you against her massive body, nuzzling your cheek against hers. "Come on, honey. It's your birthday today. And what kind of wife would I be if I didn't make you a great breakfast? Come on, let's go!" She smiles and carries you away. This was getting weirder and weirder by the minute. What do you do next?
