1553322212224241.content:
At last, the emptiness clawing at the cavernous walls of Octavia's stomach became too much for her sleeping brain to ignore, and the snoozing Earth mare's dreams of sugar-coated delicacies transformed into the aches and pains of reality, eyes parting open to glare at the rising sun through her bedraggled mare.

The fact that it wasn't morning sickness that'd awoken her was a comfort, she'd admit, but not one enough to blot out both her hunger and those of the several brood thriving inside of her, their seven months in her womb serving to bloat up her obese frame even more. She could only remember up until her wedding photos that she had any semblance to he late slimness and regality, back when she, her wife, and husband could all fit together in frame, the newlywed mares smiling in the arms of the tall, lean man of their dreams.

The poor dear, she surmised as she gazed down right in front of her, observing him as he peacefully slept right next to her, so much more content with the world than she was. Lean he still may have been, but only in her distant memories were the times where she didn't absolutely tower over him, currently looming past his height by an extra two feet, rapidly going on a third, and paired with a tremendous waistline but a single roll in her sleep from smothering three of him side by side, looking at him was similar to staring at a toothpick. One she didn't love any less, of course.

...but not even her love for him could compromise her from the fact that Vinyl was likely awake as well, and likely harping at the nearest burger joint for food if she hadn't cleared out the entire kitchen. Surmising over that thought with a grunt, Octavia rolled to move out of bed, a workout even when gravity was there to help her out. She was out of breath by the time she was seated at the edge of the mattress, the bed flexing dangerously close to the floor beneath the concentrated weight of her gargantuan asscheeks. Everything ached; if carrying her younger self's bust was a literal pain in the neck, than carrying a set of massive, bulbous jugs each larger than her plumpened head was only equitable to carrying two lead-filled backpacks on her shoulders. Topping it all off was trying to rise off the bed with her belly weighing her down, a yoga-ball like mass of fur and adipose that bulged off her torso with so much weight that it was a miracle she wasn't constantly smashing her face in from falling over, its globular shape occasionally shifted by a kick from her breed.

...and yet through it all, much like yesterday, the day before, and all those of the week before, the muscles hidden within her mammoth-sized thighs became just a little bit stronger, more accustomed to existing within such a massive host.

Not wanting to let another moment last between her and breakfast, Octavia gave one last look backwards and smiled upon the second to the loves of her lives, then trundled to the door, striding with as much class and revere as a waddling penguin.


.....



"...wha...what the FUCK?!"

Your tired voice makes a leap in volume as your eyes open to the colors of your surrounding, all shades of purple, black, and brown that you can't even remotely recall living around. Instantly awake, the details of the bedroom you're in all fall on your shoulders at once, going several seconds without air before remembering to breath, your lungs heaving in large, rugged movements. You'd never pegged yourself as the kind of guy to wake up in a stranger's bed, not even a women's, given the more girly decorations on the shelves and cabinets, but it's not even the alien nature of the room that disturbs you; it's the colors, all brilliant pastel shades and hues that merge with one another in ways that reality wouldn't allow, except only in the cartoons.

Eventually, in your eyes' walk around the room, you gaze down at the heavy blanket laid on top of you, and, more importantly, what you're wearing. You couldn't even remember the last time you wore pajamas, and sure enough, you're dressed up in a plaid pair. In fact, upon tugging at the clothes to see if they're real, and not some hallucination, you're disturbed to see that even your body's changed; you weren't exactly the skinniest person, maybe not quite enough to be called "chubby," but whatever pudge you may have possessed is completely gone, your stomach flattened out while a bony set of ribs protrude from your chest.

Seeing it all, and staring ahead, eyes defocusing and gazing out into some other plane of existence, you finally get the idea to shut your eyes and will it all away, to wake up so the softness underneath you is that of your bed, your real one back at home.

Alas, upon flinging them open, you're greeted with as much of the same. Same for the second try. And the third. And the fourth.

155332221222424112.content:
As you slowly trod backwards near the door, watching from a safe distance, she...no, it saunters over to the bathroom door, humming in a tune that implies she’s totally oblivious to the looks she’s getting. All the while, your blinking is promoted into repeatedly clenching your eyes shut, seizing onto some vague, dwindling hope that when you’d open them, she’d disappear, and the world would come slightly closer to being as sane as you thought it was but a night ago, but no matter how hard you try to wish her away, the floorboards still creak beneath her immense weight, her muttered cursing still ringing in your ears as she briefly grapples with the door’s width to squeeze her own through.

Taking it as enough of a distraction to see your way out, despite having already being seen by her, you quietly tiptoe out the bedroom, eager to find a nice, quiet place somewhere to center your thoughts and-

WHAM!!!

“I’m ho-ome!”

...but the cheeriness in the other voice fails to quell the belief that a wrecking ball’d just been swung into the house. An embarrassingly high shriek escapes you, your feet unwillingly leaping a foot or two from the floor from the impact of something forcing its way into the living room, something, as far as you can define from the falling dust, white and massive.

More lumbering footsteps enter the apartment, shaking all the furniture with shockwaves that multiply that of which ‘Octavia’ could produce; in walks a behemoth with the vaguest semblance to ‘Vinyl,’ featuring the same coat, mane, and equine-esque maw and ears to the pony in the photo, but while Octavia towered head and chest above her former self, Vinyl stand with a foot or so on top of her, and with no less than five times the other mare’s weight.

Brushing off the wreckage she’d caused, her ham-leg arms cradling large purchases of junk food, fast food bags, and boxes of soda, Vinyl trundles along the room with a dizzied stride from the excess of blubber caked onto her joints, just short of some demeaning tuba music to compete the stereotype. The immense range of her hips makes it impossible for her to navigate the room without knocking things off their shelves or capsizing furniture as her steps cause her gargantuan buttocks to sway and slosh around with impressive reach, any gap shorter than ten feet impossible for her to move past without her ass compromising for space.

You almost forget to be scared, easily entranced by the sight of all her blubber sloshing around; despite her height, at least Octavia was obese to a degree that you could see the world’s fattest woman carry her dimensions, but this mare’s stomach proceeds her entire body like a white boulder that towers over you, possessing enough plushness that it sags low enough to smother a sizeable length of the ground ahead of her, but is also fastened by a musculature underneath that forms its blubber into a tense sphere, likely owed to the other ‘foals’ Octavia had mentioned before.

The sight is so entrancing that you don’t even notice the closing distance between the two of you. Neither does she, her eyes un readable beneath the purple visors of her shades, but just when it seems like she’s about to trudge past without acknowledging you, her arm hooks out and wraps around your torso, pulling you up against her.

“Hey, hon~” She says sweetly, squeezing your body within her armpit whilst your head is caught against the underside of her very, very large breast.

“Hey...Vinny...” You nervously murmur. Wait...Vinny?! You internally realize. Why did I call her Vinny?!

Vinyl scoffs back. “Hate it when you call me that...”

“Ahem!”

One of Vinyl’s ear angles towards the bedroom, and waiting inside is Octavia, scantily clad in a pink night robe that, despite its mammoth proportions, is several sizes to small to clothe her behemothic frame.

She taps a hoof on the floor, scowling. “Just because you’re the bigger doesn’t mean I’m any less hungry, you know!”

“Hey, I was the one with morning sickness when I woke up, I get first dibs.” Vinyl reasons, her grip loosening enough that you can safely drop down on both legs. “Besides, I saved you a couple of doughnuts!”

“Doughnuts?!” Octavia repeats. “I can’t eat doughnuts! I’m already a whale off of eating salads!”

“Ah...that’s...actually gonna work out, then.” Vinyl uneasily continues, scratching at a sweaty neck. “...I’d actually got kicked out of the Burger hut, so we might not wanna go there anymore...”

“WHAT?!” Octavia bellows. “You’d gotten us kicked out of someplace AGAIN?!”

Vinyl argues something back, Octavia retorting with something that spirals into a squabble beneath the two, but you don’t really have the mind to really make out all the words going back and forth between them. The fact returns that you’re in some alien world right now, trapped in a stranger’s home, and you have the idea to treat their little argument as a distraction. You guide a foot backwards, sneaking for the door that Vinyl’d entered through. Neither of them keep you from leaving as you plot to escape, make a run for it and get some damn answers as to what’s going on...but just when you’re about to grasp the doorknob and leap to freedom, a few patches of color off to the side catches your eye, prompting you to stop.

It’s ink drawn around the wall, marked by dashes that progressively higher, akin to the kind a child would make on their doorframe to measure their height. Part of it is drawn in pink, and looking to the highest one, you can see Octavia’s name, drawn in more professional handwriting.

Octavia

8’9”, 4,167 lb.

Month 7


...and somewhere far above, you can see something scrawled in blue ink. You squint to make it out.

Vinyl

10’7”, 17,233 lb.

1553322223.content:
That time already? Alright, time to bring out some of more obscure characters in animated movies from the 1990s, Balto. For those who don't know jack on what I'm talking about, Balto is an animated movie, made by Amblin Entertainment and Universal Pictures in 1995. The film is loosely based around a true story about the dog Balto (hence the movie's title) who helped save children from the infamous diphtheria epidemic in the 1925 serum rub to Nome, in which the antitoxin to the epidemic was transported from Anchorage, Alaska, to Nenana, Alaska by train, and finally to Nome via dog sled......minus the talking animals, of course.

Anyway, this interactive story choice isn't going to involve the titular character himself. Instead, this choice is all about Jenna and Aleu (or at least, the anthropomorphic versions of these two ladies). As for who they are, Jenna is basically Balto's "mate" in the movie, while Aleu is simply Balto's biological daughter who first appeared in the direct-to-video film, Balto II: Wolf Quest.

Now then, since we now know who we're dealing with here, who shall you choose? Jenna, or Aleu?

1553322223312.content:
Christmas.

Known for it's festive yuletide and annual gift giving, it was said to be the most wonderful time of the year. However, although you were known to be somewhat of a heavy sleeper by your family and a few of your closest friends, what you would soon awaken to was definitely considered a "life-changer".

It all started when you first arose from a plentiful slumber, eagerly anticipated for Christmas morning. However, as you casually rubbed the sleep from your eyes, it was there you suddenly felt something...soft, and furry, positioned next to you on your left side. "...What the?" You groggily muttered, ignoring the unusual soft furry feeling at first. That is, until you suddenly felt a plump cream paw-like hand wrap itself around your left arm in a strong vice-like grip, which in turn made you soon realize that something was definitely off. So, in response to such a physical touch, you slowly turned your head to your left, toward the source of who or what exactly grabbed your arm.

But what you saw laying next to you however, definitely wasn't there the previous night.

What you saw laying next to you in your bed was, in fact, a sleeping Lioness. However, upon further inspection, you soon realized that this wasn't just any ordinary lioness, but instead, it was none other than Nala from Walt Disney's The Lion King! Out of all the movies that Disney has produced throughout the decades, The Lion King was without a doubt your favorite, your favorite character in the movie (besides Timon and Pumbaa) was undoubtedly Simba's lover, Nala. Back when you were just a boy, you developed a somewhat huge crush on the female lioness, always wishing that Nala was actually real.

And yet, here she was, sleeping right next to you.

However, upon further inspection of the slumbering lioness, you began to notice something...strange about the slumbering Nala beside you. The first thing you obviously noticed on Nala was that instead of 4 paw-like digits that regular lions have, she currently had 3 paw-like fingers and a plump paw-like thumb, similar to a human hand. And it wasn't just on the forepaw she used to grab your left arm either, for it was also the same on her left forepaw as well! From there, just out of mere curiosity, you cautiously lift up the bedsheets on Nala's side of the bed with your free hand, which revealed to you what you had suspected: Instead of being a quadruped like in the movie, Nala was now an anthropomorphic lioness, along with a pair of cream fur digitgrade feline legs.

However, it was there that you also noticed another certain detail: Nala was ludicrously fat. Her creamy feline face and snout had a thin layer of adipose on it, complete with a pair of slightly chubby cheeks, a thick double chin, and a plump neck. However, what stuck out the most on Nala's head was that some of the hair on the top of her head had grown out into a flowing mane, which looked extremely similar to Cressida's hairstyle from the movie, The Hunger Games: Mockingjay Part 1.

But as your eyes scrolled across her body, you noticed how rotund and corpulent yet voluptuous and curvaceous Nala's physique actually was. It was also there you noticed that Nala now sported a large billowing pair of F-Cup breasts, which were somewhat contained in a silk white bra, which happened to be covered up by a very large blue T-Shirt which had the words, "I'm (Your Name)'s Feline Fatty!" written on the front in big bloated letters. However, even with a T-Shirt at such a humongous size, it did little to conceal one of Nala's more "prosperous" assets: Her massive spare tire of an apron belly.

Easily the size of a large couch cushion, Nala's blubbery girth was definitely and surely a sight to behold, as it splayed out and covered up a good sizable portion of Nala's lap and private area with relative ease. Looking further down, you easily noticed how large and thickly padded Nala's hips and butt were, which displayed a large stretchy pair of panties, as her hips noticeably billowed outwards to be nearly 4 and a half feet in diameter, while her blubbery derrière was noticeably visible to you, as each buttcheek was about as wide as a regular pillow, while her lioness tail slowly swished from side to side subconsciously. Upon looking down at her digitgrade legs, you noticed how they were as thick as the rest of her, especially around her burgeoning and bulky cream fur thunder thighs and plump paw-like toes on her hindpaws. Finally, you looked back up toward Nala's arms, easily noticing how bulky and smothered with a fine layer of adipose they were. However, judging from how strong and tight her grip was on your left arm, you could tell that there was most likely a good amount of muscle hidden underneath all that blubber. Overall, if you had to wager a guess on her exact weight, you would had to guess that Nala had to at least weigh over 500 pounds, maybe 600 pounds given how much muscle she's got underneath all that body fat on her larger than plus-sized physique.

Even after taking it all in, you still couldn't believe that Nala was now legitimately and physically real, albeit an anthropomorphic version of her, but still her nonetheless. And yet, you couldn't help but ponder to yourself over a few questions, such as "How is this even possible?", "Why is Nala now an anthro?", and "How come she's so fat?" You know, THOSE kinds of questions. However, the more you looked at the rotund Nala, the more you couldn't help but find it very attractive on her.

As soon as the light from the morning sun shone through the nearby window to your left, Nala slowly but surely began to stir from her peaceful slumber, revealing a glimmering pair of bright teal eyes.

And they were looking straight at you.

From there, just as she displayed an excited but fanged toothy grin on her somewhat plump feline snout, she eagerly and playfully pounced on top of you with a surprising yet unexpected amount of momentum and speed, especially considering her substantial amount of physical bulk and adipose she sported on her physique, where she swiftly placed both of her plump paw-like hands against your wrists, easily pinning you to the bed, all whilst she comfortably straddled your legs with her own thick meaty digitgrade legs.

Of course, in your current disposition, you weren't exactly sure if you should be gleefully excited to be with Nala or somewhat unnerved at how inhumanly fast and strong she actually was moments ago, just as you heard the bed creak and groan slightly from such violent movements on it's frame. But as her long feline tongue began to intermingle and intertwine with your own, Nala slowly yet calmly released her vice-like grip on your wrists, lustfully moving her thick meaty furry arms to comfortably wrap around your back, where she began to playfully smother you with her blubbery cream fur-covered spare tire of a belly and her billowing breasts, which caused her to emit these loud but pleasured purring noises, where you easily acknowledged that she was certainly enjoying such personal intimacy with you.

Moments after such affectionate intimacy between you and the corpulent anthropomorphic lioness, Nala calmly sat up on her knees, still straddling you with her bulky adipose-coated thighs and legs, allowing you to sit up as well, just as she held your hands with both of her plump paw-like feline hands. She looked at you with a sense of loving affection in her beautiful teal eyes and said, "Merry Christmas, sweetie." "Merry Christmas to you too, Nala." You replied, doing your best to blend in. Eventually but inevitably, the gears in your mind stirred, which soon led you to such a shocking revelation:

From there, you soon looked back up towards Nala, who was now bearing a gentle yet fanged motherly smile on her somewhat plump feline snout, where she then calmly spoke toward you with a sense of maternal joy in her voice and said, "The doctor said that we're going to be having twins." In response to such news, you were undoubtedly taken completely by surprise. After all, you had just found out that Nala was legitimately pregnant with twins, and you were most likely the father of said twins. However, you mostly hid your shocked reaction, especially since this wasn't exactly the time to be freaking out in a very negative manner. And yet, as your mind slowly but surely coped with the realization and reality that you were now officially going to be a father, one singular question inadvertently popped into your subconscious:

Was her daughter, Kiara, from The Lion King 2: Simba's Pride, already born into this world by now? Or was she not even born yet?

"*sigh* ...Well, at least I'm still a bona fide human being." You thought to yourself, easily seeing that you still retained the physique of an athletic young man. However, despite your relief, your mind soon refocused on your current surroundings. Initially, you thought it looked like a regular yet fancy-looking bathroom.

But of course, upon further inspection, you soon easily took heed of the bathroom's overall size. Off to one corner, there was a large industrial-sized shower stall, complete with plexiglass sliding doors, which had these innate African markings carved throughout the plexiglass.

"*hmph* Seems fitting, considering where Nala came from." You thought, seemingly okay with these changes, as you noticed how the entire room had this air of the Africa Savannah to the decor. But then, before you could contemplate further, you soon heard what sounded like Kiara as she exclaimed, "Daddy! Are you coming out to open presents?"

Instinctively, you loudly chirped, "I'm just about done, sweetie! Gimme a sec!" "...Okay, that was...weird. Why does this feel so normal for me?" You soon thought, as you began to exit the spacious bathroom, make your way through the bedroom, and finally passed through the large double doors leading out to the main area of what you assumed to be your apartment.

Or, at least what you thought WAS your apartment.

Instead of a low price one-bedroom apartment, you walked into a penthouse condo fit for a freaking celebrity! Before you was a massive open area, with a Living Room on the right, an expansive Kitchen and Dining Room area to the left, complete with a massive industrial refrigerator, (most likely for Nala, considering her current size and weight).

And to the furthest left corner, there stood some exercise equipment, complete with a huge bench press kit, dumbbells, and several other pieces of equipment. And before you stood a plexiglass window wall that was two stories tall, showing a snow-covered balcony and the city landscape of what could only surmise to be none other than New York City.

Overall, it was rather overwhelming, considering what world you've awoken to. However, your thoughts were focused elsewhere when you heard Nala's honeysweet voice speak toward you and said, "Ah, there you are, darling! Kiara was wondering where you were. *giggle*"

You quickly turned toward the source of the voice, only to see the corpulent yet pregnant and anthropomorphic Nala sitting Indian style alongside an eager Kiara waiting to open her Christmas presents, as they sat beside the nine foot tall Christmas tree.

In order to avoid suspicion, you soon joined Kiara and Nala, where you noticed that Nala was now wearing a massive red yukata robe for modesty, since her daughter was present. "...So, what did I miss, ladies?" You quipped, as you sat next to the rotund Lioness who was essentially your childhood crush come to life, as Nala's chubby snout mildly contorted into a cheery fanged grin towards you, where she then chirped, "*giggle* Not much, sweetie. Kiara was waiting until you came out before opening her presents."

From there, as if your body was on autopilot, you plucked out a wrapped present from the pile and presented it to Kiara, with a cheery curve on your lips, where Kiara eagerly yanked it out of your light grasp, tearing into the wrapping paper with her feline claws without damaging the gift underneath. Once the wrapping paper was strewn about, Kiara now held...

15533222233222112.content:
You open your eyes expecting to see the familiar confines of your cozy if not a little unkempt bedroom, alone, like you had been doing for quite some time now. However, this morning, all around you is black. Not like that the room was covered in shadows, or even like you had forgotten to open your eyelids when your body tricked you into thinking you did. This was not even a sort of darkness, this was empty. The shade of black overwhelming your line of sight was nothing that could be found in nature, more akin to the space between stars that you can see in the sky at night. Why are you here? Are you here at all? Or is that just the treachery of the void?

Soon you finally detect another something in the black, a voice, with a deep, throaty rasp, characteristic of a chain smoker. It begins to talk in deep, grimy and guttural noises. “There is nothing, only warm and primordial blackness. Your conscience ferments in it, no larger than a single grain of malt. You don’t have to do anything anymore.” It pauses for its words to sink in. “Ever. Never.” It continued.

“Never...ever?” You respond inquisitively.

“Never, baby!” It had been brought to your attention that you might just be dead. This is when you die, and you cease to exist. No afterlife. No feeling, no thought, no perception, no existence. Your existence and everything you simply disappeared like a popped soap bubble. You know nothing, you feel nothing, you ‘are’ nothing. You simply keep on not existing. “An inordinate amount of time passes, and it is utterly void of struggle. No ex-wives are contained within.”

“This is great!” You say though you don’t know why you said it. Perhaps this voice was a higher authority that could let you back into the realm of reality if you got on its good terms. Or maybe you thought this was great. You didn't know.

“Yes. It. Is.” The voice says.

“Wha...what was that about an ‘ex-’ something?” You raise another question. An awareness creeps up on you. A mass lies hidden in your dead angle, soaking in some lurid, acidic sauce. It’s bloated and shameful, a ball of meat surrounding you. This is a terrible line of questioning and it will only lead to more awareness of the meat thing. You know somewhere in the back of your mind (you still have that?) that this thing you were dreading was you.

Do you plunge back into the fathomless deep? No, you wanted to know about the ex-something. Again, the voice. “Ex-love, ex-tenderness, it is foolish of you to resurface to the loss. Not after all the damage you suffered to get here, some of it irreversible...stay! Sail with me through the abyss!”

“No, I want to get off, now.” You decide. “I like pain and burning light and wanting things from people who don't want to give them to me.” Once again you had no idea why you said those words in that order but grimly resigned this was the meat thing you were trying to come back to.

“Do you?” You had no idea. One half of your non-existence wanted to sail the inky blackness until forever ends, whilst the other half, the half that you don’t think you like, wanted to get off. “You wouldn’t like it if I told you what was back they're. Why do you think you had to bludgeon yourself into oblivion?” The voice sounds apprehensive and afraid now, you should ask what's out they're...wait, did you do this to yourself? You feel so infinitely small, but that's a step up from feeling like your nothing.

Somewhere in the sore, bloated man-meat around you...a sensation! Like a fly to ointment, your conscience sticks to it. The limbed headed machine of pain and undignified suffering is firing up again. It wants to walk the desert. Are you ready for this? Yes, you are, and this is a thought you feel confident about. You don’t want to go back to the formless, disembodied nothing. The stench of liquor rises from your mouth, and with it an ungodly headache. Who are you? What sort of creature does this to their mouth?!

A fiery streak penetrates your skull, trying to force your eyes open. It’s a sound...a clarion from Hell. Somehow, you know what it is...the stomach of a hippopotamus.



You open your eyes expecting to see the familiar confines of your cozy if not a little unkempt bedroom, alone, like you had been doing for quite some time now. However, this morning, you had absolutely no idea who you were. You were naked and lying face down on the tiled floor of a room that could have been yours but didn't seem familiar. There was an empty bottle of vodka near the base of your head, you must have gotten drunk, you reasoned. The memories will come back soon, right? You stand up and notice a turned on reel-to-reel tape player on the dresser (your dresser?), rolling empty.

A mirror hangs above the dresser. Your vision is foggy from liquor and sleep, you can only see the outline of a man in the glass. You suddenly realize you have no memory of the fate that awaits you, underneath the haze of your own eyes. Nothing? Really. All recollection of the person you were, the people in your life and even the world you’re in has drowned in a sea of blood and alcohol. This was no mere night of drinking, this was a deluge of world-ending proportions.

Perhaps you should touch your face first, make sure there's nothing wrong with it. You slowly reach your hand to the skin of your left cheek. There's something wrong with it. It’s bloated and swollen, like an upholstery of alcohol just underneath your fingertips. Your nose feels like a small balloon in the middle of your face, and it hurts when you honk it. Is your tongue okay? It’s not, it’s like a snail wriggling through your fingers. You blink the haze away. Behold!



You have no idea what this thing in the mirror is. Why aren't your memories coming back?

What does come back is your sense of hearing. Somewhere inside your messed up brain something decides to unplug your ears and they were at once filled with the booming, thunderous noise of a stomach gurgling to life. You turn your head away from your reflection to follow the sound. You do a double-take on the origin of the cacophony as you steady your hand on the tape player for balance. What you saw on the bed...it had to be the most ridiculous thing you could never imagine.

It was from Gloria. Gloria the hippo, from the Madagascar movies. Out of all the things you could have remembered about yourself, like your name or how old you were, it was Gloria that took up your mind. A fictional anthropomorphic animal from the big screen, now no longer fictional on presumably your bed. And she was big. She was laying on her front, giving you a perfect view of a shelf with two massive, pinkish grey hippo ass cheeks, each wider than you were tall and swaying with every subtle motion of those hips wide enough to make a double doorway look small. All capped with a subtle, relatively tiny hippo tail right above that grand canyon of a crack. She was nude, which was appropriate, as there was no hope any article of clothing could ever fit her.

The hippo looked as big in the front as she did from the back, a pair of massive melon tits as wobbly as balloons, her belly aline round enough to outweigh you fourfold. She was tall, tall enough to obscure the bed she was sleeping on with all that flesh, the wooden frame barely able to keep up with all the pressure she forced upon it. Before you knew what you were doing you were walking up to this Goddess of Fertility and placed your hand on her exposed thigh and thick as a tree-trunk. It was soft. It was so freaking soft, your digits sunk into the warm, creamy flesh and it quivered like an ocean in a gentle wind. “Ah…” you let out a sigh. It’s the first time you hear your voice.

"Mhmph...~" You hear a pleasured huff of greeting emanate from the hippo's head, a grin forming across her perfect, chubby cheeks. "G' morning, hubby..." She slurred tiredly, letting out a yawn as she woke up from her deep sleep. It felt so surreal to have her talking in front of you, to exist next to you, to feel her form bob up and down with every physical breath of air she took against your hand on her thigh. This should not be happening. Not because you don't want it, but because it's just not possible. Gloria does not exist. But here she is. Calling you her hubby.

Hubby?

The lardy idol of your fantasies chuckles as she blinks her eyes open, taking in your disheveled, admittedly funny looking form. You felt like you could fall into those eyes. What do you see in them, though?

155332222332222323222112.content:
The pleasant dreamscape of sleep is interrupted for you, a pleasant smell filling your nostrils as well as an unpleasant tickling sensation. No amount of wiggling your face and batting at your nose with a sleepily aimed hand will dispel the irritation. Soon enough, the tickling prompts a seemingly inevitable outcome; you sneezed, not very loudly, but certainly enough to cast you out of the last vestiges of sleep. You are sitting up in your bed, your mind still somewhat foggy from the last fragments of sleep slipping away, casting your bleary eyes around for the source of your nasal irritation. Finally your gaze settles on the likely culprit: the bundle of hair gracing the end of a tail that had gotten up into your face. The tail isn’t yours though; it belongs to the person who also owns the multiple square feet of curvy body taking up a majority of the room in your bed.

You had been spooned up against the rear of the obviously female figure, your face nestled in the pillow formed between her neck and shoulder, and your hips pressed into the soft gelatinous cheeks of her rump. Her tail seemed to have flicked up and ended up in your face, causing the events that led to you now being awake. Long auburn curls tumble across her upper body, nearly hiding the short blunted horns protruding from the top of her head, as well as the long floppy ears hanging behind her head. Beneath the sheet and covers, mountainous breasts protrude from her torso, pooling across the bed and over the edge, while her stomach is weightier but doesn’t extend quite as far. Pulling the covers up a bit further to get a better view, you see that scrumptious rump is attached to wide fertile hips and cascade down into her long lovely and shapely legs. Her whole body is covered in a tiny almost invisible layer of incredibly soft fur; mostly a light brown but with much darker patches at the ends of her ears, and forming the appearance of gloves and socks on her hands and feet.

Your gaze trails back up across her body, your hand slipping across the silky hills and valleys of her body. A shift in the bed and a creaking noise causes you to look up faster and you find yourself looking into piercing green eyes staring back at you, sleep slowly fading away from their owner, the lovely and fattened Mora Lindas.

“What’s wrong, baby?” she asks drowsily, blinking those luminous orbs several times to try and focus in.

The bed gives another – slightly alarming – creak as she turns over, her blubbery bulk now flowing up to and partway over you as she reaches up to cup your face, before pulling you closer to give you a deep loving kiss.

“Come on, please, tell me what’s wrong,” she asks a bit more imploringly after the kiss breaks, her eyes flitting this way and that as she looks you over.
155332222332222323222112.title: You and your bovine bedmate

choices: …scales.
…fur.
…something else.
1553322223322223232221121.content:
“Nothing, dear, your tail just caused me to sneeze, that’s all. You can go back to sleep,” before giving her another kiss.

She smiles and flicks her tail up across her hip to rest between the two of you, “This darn thing just keeps getting in the way, doesn’t it? Sorry about that, baby.”

Her concerns diminished, you can see that she is already ready to return to sleep; her eyelids are drooping, and her supporting arm is starting to slip, bringing her lower and lower, closer to the bed. A yawn escapes her mouth as she drops down and her head lands on her pillow, her plush arm pushed out across your own pillow, and a soft snore coming forth as she drifts off to sleep again.

Stifling a yawn of your own, you adjust the covers and nuzzle your head down against her arm, pressing your face into the upper curve of her bountiful, pillowy breasts. You place one hand up against her cheek, lightly stroking it, feeling the give of the fat softening her formerly thin face, while the other reaches down and lovingly rubs across a small portion of the expanse of her belly. A contented smile is brought to your lips as your touch is rewarded with a small flurry of kicks and other motions: the lively actions of the children resting within Mora’s fertile womb. Their movements soon die down, as does yours, as sleep pulls you back down into its embrace.

As you drift off, your eyes trace the soft curves of Mora’s face in front of you, as well the back of your hand, covered in…

15533222233222232322211211.content:
As you drift through the limbo at the edge of sleep, your mind flits through some of your memories with Mora.

––––––––––

It started just over a year back at a black tie event. You spied a beautiful woman across the room, nursing a drink and exchanging a few words with passersby, but little else. You tried not to stare, but you kept finding your eyes drawn back to her, her Rubenesque figure filling a slinky backless black dress. Making your way over to her, you introduced yourself, her to you, and made some small talk before inviting her to dance. She looked a little unsure of herself, her green eyes diming and downcast, but finally acquiesced. It took some time before she got into the swing of it, but before long the two of you became the center of attention, your combined movements becoming more steady and grandiose. As another song ended, Mora was left panting slightly, her bust quivering slightly visibly through the low-cut front, as the crowd around you broke into respectful applause. Sensing that Mora wasn’t quite up to another dance, you led her off the dance floor and to a nearby table, pulling her chair out before bringing her another drink. With drink in hand, you and she talked some more. You found out about her work as an actress, though she hadn’t been getting much or any work recently. In turn, you explained about your work, before the conversation continued to spin on. You noticed how she kept wistfully glancing at any food nearby. Offering to get something for her to eat prompted a thoughtful moment from the woman, a hand stealthily drifting down to her plump stomach, before she gave a forceful shake of her head accompanied with a similar declaration of no. You abandoned the attempt but filed it away for future reference. At the end of the night the two of you went your separate ways, but not before trading phone numbers and a wish for another meeting.

The wish was granted again and again before long, the dates starting out casual but quickly becoming more serious and romantic in nature. Each time you saw the lovely Mora, you noticed that she looked like she had put on a bit of weight, a few pounds here and there, but enough that you could perceive, especially as her clothes pulled a bit tighter around her body. You also noted how any time that she was offered food she would initially consider getting a larger item or amount before reconsidering and settling on something smaller unless you urged her to enjoy herself, to which she would only sometimes give in. With each instance, you were drawing conclusions, till you finally brought it up while on a date in a dark, quiet, and romantic restaurant, questioning her about it as softly as you could.

It took her a long time to answer, a slightly pained expression on her face, as she told that she had always struggled with her appetite. She had been quite a heavy child, but had lost the weight during her teen years, though the she kept the enthusiasm for food that caused her weight during her earlier years. She had successfully fought against her stomach’s urges until a couple of years before, when a combination of some bad relationships and work drying up had resulted in her overindulging and gaining more than a few pounds. It also seemed that her new weight proved quite resistant to any efforts to remove it, or she would yo-yo and end up even heavier than before. Your frequent gifts of candy – especially chocolates – as well as you persuading her to eat more when it succeeded had resulted in the most recent and heavier gains, and was proving even harder to lose. O-Of course, sweetie."

Vanilla replied, where she then hand you her orange Mawashi, which you could clearly see that it was considerably large enough to fit around Vanilla's waist, hips, and butt. Once you held the orange Mawashi, you stretched it out so Vanilla could insert her thick furry legs into the Mawashi's leg-holes. First, Vanilla inserted her left leg in the Mawashi left leg-hole, and then her right leg into the other leg-hole. "So, um... How did you become a Sumo Wrestler anyway, Vanilla?" You asked, trying to get a decent explanation as to how and why Vanilla the Rabbit became a Sumo-Sized version of herself.

"...Oh, that's right! *giggle* I must've forgotten to tell you all about my promotion to Yokozuna, darling! I'm sorry for not telling you sooner, sweetie. It must have slipped my mind!" Vanilla answered, confirming that she was promoted to the rank of Yokozuna, which happens to be the highest rank a Sumo Wrestler can obtain. After all, the title of Yokozuna means "Grand Champion", and can only be obtained when a Sumo Wrestler under the title of ōzeki either wins the championship for two consecutive tournaments or an "equivalent performance" in order to be considered for promotion to the title of Yokozuna. And judging from the somewhat gleeful expression on Vanilla's cherubic lapine face, it seems that she most certainly received the rank of Yokozuna.

But as you slowly pulled the orange Mawashi up the corpulent rabbit's thick fat-laden legs and towards her wide hips and blubbery rear end, you spoke toward Vanilla and asked, "Wait, Yokozuna? That's the highest rank a Sumo Wrestler could obtain! How did you even get that title anyhow?" Obviously noticing your curiosity, Vanilla let out a feminine giggle, which caused her large apron belly and butt to jiggle some due to her giggle fit. From there,Vanilla began to speak toward you and said, "*giggle* Funny you should ask, dearie. Do you still remember the brother of your college roommate and best friend, Ichigo Gasai?"

Ichigo Gasai. Now that was an individual you weren't going to forget anytime soon. From what you remember, Ichigo Gasai was both your roommate and best friend from your college days at the University of Phoenix in Phoenix, Arizona. He was a foreign exchange student from Kyoto, Japan, who's father and 3 uncles were professional Sumo Wrestlers, so it was basically an honored tradition in his family. Heck, even his slightly younger brother, Yamato Gasai, was undergoing training at a Sumo Training Stable, or heya as they're called in Japan, to become a professional Sumo Wrestler like his father and 3 uncles. So, in response to her question, you spoke toward Vanilla as you secured the orange Mawashi around her thick padded hips and waist, where it hugged the bottom portion of Vanilla's flabby belly and said, "...Well, now that I think about it, yeah. Why?"

"*giggle* Well, Ichigo's father, Gorumaki Gasai, was remarkably impressed by my skills and me being the reigning champion of the Meiji Sumo League Tournament for 3 consecutive seasons. Apparently, he happens to be a high-ranking Yokozuna with a powerful reputation as one of the strongest and most influential members of the Sumo Wrestling community." Vanilla answered, giving you a decent explanation as to how she received the rank of Yokozuna, despite being a woman, just as Vanilla waddled over to the nearby closet and pulled out a short orange tank top with the picture of a carrot printed onto the fabric. From there, as she equipped the large tank top onto her large blubbery frame, Vanilla continued talking and explained, "Anyway, shortly after I won my 3rd consecutive Meiji Sumo Tournament, he greeted me in the stadium lobby, where he and a member of the Sumo Association Board of Directors formally offered me the title of Yokozuna! ...Of course, I would have to participate in the inaugural ceremonial ring entry ceremony held at Meiji Shrine in Shibuya, Tokyo a few days from now. And well... I want you and Cream to attend the ceremony. You know, to give me some bolstered encouragement and support."

In all honesty, what Vanilla had just explained to you was quite the news indeed. After all, becoming Yokozuna was quite a high honor, especially since Vanilla was becoming probably the first female Yokozuna in Sumo Wrestling history. And yet, you could sense some form of nervousness and hesitation in Vanilla's hazel eyes. After all, the ceremonial ring entry ceremony was a HUGE deal in the world of Sumo Wrestling, so the fear and hesitation were soundly profound.

In other words, Vanilla's current sense of hesitation was very understandable at this point. I know that this whole ceremony is a major deal in your line of work, but... You need to calm down a little first. Remember: Deep breaths, Vanilla. Deep breaths."

"wait a minute: Why am I reassuring her?" You thought to yourself, quickly realizing that you were somewhat on auto-pilot for a moment there. From there, the bulky Vanilla began to take several deep breaths, inhaling and exhaling deeply for a moment or two. Obviously, it must be some sort off stress reliever for the corpulent lapine woman, which seemed to be noticeably effective on her.

"...Feel better?" You asked, just as Vanilla exhaled another deep breath, where she looked at you with a reassured smile and replied, "...Very much. Thank you, sweetie." "Anytime." You answered, as you subconsciously administered a tender kiss upon her plump lips. Moments later, you severed the kiss as Vanilla spoke toward you and said, "I'm so sorry, (Name). It's just that ever since I became pregnant with my second child, I became a bit more...moody than usual." "...Wait a second: Second child? Pregnant? Vanilla's pregnant?!" You thought to yourself, coming to quite a shocking revelation: Vanilla was actually pregnant with a child. Your child!

Although this was quite shocking news indeed, you attempted to keep yourself calm and collected as if this was a normal occurrence, despite what you've awoken to was anything but normal. And yet, this felt like a dream come true to you, as you then spoke toward the obese rabbit and asked, "Vanilla? Aren't you worried about harming the baby?" In response, Vanilla slowly gazed down at her large flabby abdomen, gently placing a plump left paw-like hand upon her apron belly, feeling the light kicks of your child inside her flabby abdomen, displaying a maternal smile on her plump lapine face and snout.

Shortly after that, Vanilla began to speak toward you and explained, "...Do not worry, dearie. Mr. Gasai completely understood me carrying our bundle of joy. After all, once I've completed the ring entry ceremony and have been officially proclaimed Yokozuna, Mr. Gasai has allowed me to take a long enough vacation from participating in any upcoming Sumo Tournaments until I have fully recovered from giving birth to our child. *giggle* And besides, I won't be going into labor until 3 weeks from now."

Judging from the information she had revealed to you, Vanilla was pretty far along into her pregnancy, especially if she could feel her baby kicking underneath all that blubber on her thick physical frame.

But while Sonic, Knuckles, Princess Sally, and many others fought valiantly against Robotnik's mechanized forces, Tails had developed a machine that could allow us to travel to other dimensions. With no other choice, we retreated through the portal, unaware that we would inevitably travel to your world, the planet Earth." Vanilla explained, as she was comforting Cream throughout her explanation to you.

Of course, the name Knothole Village became easily recognizable to you, as it was the safe haven used in the Sonic The Hedgehog (AKA Sonic SatAM) cartoon series. And yet, you distinctly remember that Vanilla, Cream, and Cheese weren't even created yet until the early 2000s, which you could only guess that the world that Vanilla came from was a hybridization between Sonic SatAM and the anime Sonic X. From there, Vanilla continued her explanation to you as she said, "When Cream and I entered the portal, we got separated along the way to Earth. But when I landed in San Francisco... That was when I first met you, sweetie. You nursed me back to health and reunited me with my beloved Cream. And yet, you decided to help us fight against Robotnik, but before that final battle... You proposed to me, asked for my hand in marriage, in sickness and in health, till death do we part."

Although you were very fortunate for such a clear explanation coming from the rotund lapine, you still had one more question still gnawing at you: How and why did Vanilla get so fat and bulky in the first place? So, in an attempt to receive such an answer from the obese rabbit, you spoke toward Vanilla and asked, "Thanks, Vanilla. I appreciate the explanation. But still... Not to offend you, but... How did you become so, um...rotund? And why?"

"...Oh? You're wondering why I got so fat in the first place? *giggle* Oh, sweetie! You know I don't mind if you call me a Butterball. And besides..." Vanilla replied, as she gave her flabby abdomen a few playful pats with a chubby paw-like hand, which obviously made you blush somewhat, especially since you were finding Vanilla to be very attractive with all that blubber and girth on her physique. "...Though, as for why I decided to get this big, well... Let's just say that a few months before you proposed to me, I discovered that you were quite the avid Fat Admirer. From there, Vanilla continued her explanation to you and explained, "...Though, as for why I decided to become a Sumo Wrestler... It started when we were on our honeymoon in Tokyo, where you could say that I was "inspired" to become Japan's First Female Sumo Wrestler. Ever since I was publicly announced to become the first Female Yokozuna, I guess you could say that I inadvertently inspired an entirely new generation of Sumo Wrestlers, almost all of them being women."

155332222332222323222322222112.content:
It was a beautiful sunny morning. The birds were singing outside your window and the sky never looked better; as you slowly come to. You lay there for a while enjoying the relative quiet, smiling a bit from the birds’ singing. Opening your eyes, you slowly lift yourself out of your bed, stretching your arms and letting out a long yawn.

“Aaaaah! Mmm… Slept so well last night,” you mumble happily.

You scratch your chest and smack your lips, looking around your room…

...

Wait… Something doesn’t look right here…

Immediately, you realise that something is wrong. The room is different from what you knew, looking like an apartment in New York. The bedroom is simple, with a shelf full of books, as well as a TV with three different game stations and a DVD player attached to it, adorned with posters of female pop singers, films, and video games.

"What the hell…?”

As you slowly continued to investigate the strange changes in the room, you soon saw a large lump taking up a large portion of your bed underneath your blanket. Then, you realize said lump is moving, breathing is more accurate. As you take a closer look, you can see that it's a person…

“Oh god… What sweet horror awaits me there,” you nervously whispered to yourself. You carefully approach the blanket and slowly pull to reveal…

None other than the beautiful Interpol agent martial artist from China, Chun-Li, from the Street Fighter franchise!

Your face immediately goes blank at what was revealed in front of you. The Street Fighter franchise was one of your favourite games of all time, and you certainly enjoyed playing games because not only were they fun, but, you had a humongous crush on the Chinese martial artist. And here she was, sleeping right next to you in your bed!

“How in… What in the-?!” you stuttered, bewildered in all of this.

However, upon further inspection of the slumbering woman beside you, you couldn't help but notice one glaring difference: This version of Chun-Li was undoubtedly extremely overweight!

Chun-Li had a tremendous, flabby gut that hangs down over her wide, fleshy hips and extends out at least three feet. Her blubbery rump was large and as soft as a couch cushion; giving her a distinguished waddle when she walks. Her already thick legs were now ridiculously thicker than ever with fat, most likely rub together as she walks around. Her arms were thick and flabby, as were her breasts, large and massive as you imagined them to be at least Double F-Cup big, which looked to be barely contained in her huge blue bra.

You didn’t want to check if she was wearing a matching blue panty to go along with that bra, as you gently pull the blanket back over her.

155332222332222323222322222213312.content:
You drifted through the limbo between consciousness and unconsciousness. Something felt odd, but you couldn’t quite but sure what it was and you didn’t exactly care at this point. Eventually you do become aware of the noise of barking, a lot of barking, and it sounded close too. Trying to ignore the clamor and drift back to sleep proved fruitless, it was just too much. Cracking one eye open, you looked over for the clock on your bedside table. It wasn’t there, and you briefly thought about having to get a new one if it broken when you knocked it off the table. Then you realized that the table wasn’t there either. Propping up on one arm, you tried to make sense of how the table could have been knocked over, but couldn’t even find it on the floor.

That’s when you saw that your small and cramped bedroom looked nothing like when you had gone to sleep. It looked like you were now in a huge loft apartment, and if you leaned up just a bit further, you could even see a slice of the ocean pretty close by though one of the windows; that was certainly not part of your usual view. For the most part your view of the outside consisted of a lovely shot of the brick wall across the alleyway, though rarely you could get a brief shot of the sun reelecting off of a window a few floors above your own. Now though, the view wasn’t anything really spectacular, but it was certainly better than what you had before. Your eye next caught on an odd furry lump; was that a partially burned beaver sitting on a skateboard?

“Mornin’ puddin’, I was starting ta wonder if you were going to sleep the whole day away,” a feminine voice called out, breaking you out of your thoughts about the room and the beaver.

You frowned; you had gone to sleep alone, you were sure of that, so who…Your wild wondering was cut off as you turned to look. It had to be a dream, but pinching yourself didn’t seem to dispel what you were seeing. There was a woman standing in the door to what seemed to be the bathroom. Part of your mind was stuck on her odd appearance: her skin was pale, unnaturally pale, and her hair was split down the middle, one half a deep blue while the other was a vibrant red. Her blue eyes twinkled while her plump pink lips were curled in a grin. It could only be…but it couldn’t, but there she was: Harleen Quinzel aka Harley Quinn, looking like she stepped right out of the pages of a comic book. Well not quite, there was one small difference: namely that the Harley Quinn standing in the doorway looked to be tipping the scales somewhere past five hundred pounds.

She was clad in only a relatively tiny towel that did little to hide almost any of her body. Her hair was damp and clung around her rounded face and neck. The thick collar of fat surrounding her neck flowed into curved shoulders that arched into flabby arms that pooled together at the slightest bend. Her already substantial breasts had ballooned out into twin blimps that rested atop her enormous gut. That stomach was a great pale fleshy blob that extended out well beyond her reach and sagged under its own weight. It reached almost halfway to her knees, though even with that obstruction you could tell that her hips and thighs were wide enough that you couldn’t wrap your arms around one and meet on the other side. The formerly pert and shapely rump she possessed had blown up into what had to be chair crushing girth; you could easily see a portion of it despite the fact that she was facing towards you.

She gave a laugh breaking the trance she had you under, though you couldn’t help staring, she was utterly beautiful in your opinion. “Good ta see that I can still knock ya dead.”

She walked over to the bed, her elephantine form jiggling and wobbling with each step, and stopped right next to you. She leaned down – partially burying you in her warm flesh –and gave you a kiss; while you were distracted she slipped a hand beneath the covers.

However, upon carefully touching the abdomen scar, you suddenly began to experience these vivid memories...

---- Sionis Steel Mill, Gotham City / Six Months Ago ----

The sounds of steel being smelted, the smell of blood in the air, and the sight of the Clown Prince of Crime smacking you senselessly with a bloodied crowbar. Such memories were something one doesn't so easily forget, as Joker reluctantly ceased his assault upon you, as you were currently tied down to a metal chair with duct tape wrapped around your wrists and ankles, with your face a little bloody from taking a few blows to the head by a maniac wielding a crowbar, as the Joker violently threw the crowbar against the concrete floor with an audible CLANG! out of frustration.

In response, you spat out a bit of blood from your mouth, where you then looked back at the Joker with an aggressively determined scowl on your face and said, "...Really? Is that the best you can do, Joker? Beat me up with the same crowbar you killed one of the Robins with? And here I thought you were clever- UNGH!!" NOBODY!!"

However, unexpectedly, Joker pulled out his signature revolver, aimed at the thug, and shot him in the head with zero hesitation, shocking his other henchmen in the process, where the Clown Prince of Crime yelled, "...How many times do I have to tell you boys? THIS INSIGNIFICANT PIECE OF SHIT IS MINE!! Now unless any of you want to join Cox here in a dirt nap, STAY OUTTA MY GODDAMN WAY!!!" From there, Joker began to madly sift through the numerous makeshift torture devices he had lying on the table nearby, where you then spoke toward him with a serious tone in your voice and said, "...You know, now I see why Harley left Gotham in the first place: To get away from you!"

Of course, Joker lashed out, swiftly throwing a butterfly knife at you, but you quickly tilted your head to avoid it, causing the knife blade to firmly plant itself in the metal chair, especially since Joker wasn't taking it too kindly with your bravado. However, he looked at you with that iconic devilish grin of his as he chirped, "Oh (Name), you should really keep that fat mouth of yours shut. It'll get you into trouble."

"If you think your charismatic threats can scare me, then you're only kidding yourself, Joker. Face it, Clown Boy: You don't truly have feelings for Harley like I do. In fact, you only seem to have your eyes only on the goddamn Batman! Should I keep going, or would you rather put a bullet in my skull?" You retorted, displaying a smug shit-eating grin on your bloodied face. Of course, that back-talk struck the Joker's last nerve, as he swiftly responded by violently stabbing you in the abdomen, causing you to yell out in pain, as he slowly dragged the blade downwards, cutting open your side some.

"Now THAT'S. Not. Funny!! You think you can have your way with my Harley, but she'll always come crawling back to me." Joker replied, as if he knew that Harley Quinn will come back to him like it always has been with the two of them. Of course, you spoke toward Joker, trying your best to ignore the throbbing pain some as you retorted, "...Maybe what you say is true, but nothing will change my mind about how I feel about her, even if you dunk me in a pool of acid, or feed me to your pet hyenas. So, go ahead! Do your worst, Joker!! I'VE GOT NO FUCKING REGRETS!!!"

But then, just as Joker was about to finish you off, you both suddenly heard the sound of glass breaking, then the sound of someone getting knocked unconscious, where you both then heard one or two of the thugs scream, "It's the Bat! HE'S HERE!!" "Well, what are you waiting for, April Fool's Day?! STOP HIM!!" Joker yelled, as most of the thugs began to rush toward Batman, only for the Dark Knight to counter, punch, and jab at the oncoming thugs with ease.

Meanwhile, as the Joker's thugs kept Batman preoccupied, Joker was about to finish you off by slitting your throat, but was suddenly knocked down by Robin, who then knocked the Clown Prince of Crime out cold with his retractable staff. From there, Robin got and proceeded to cut the duct tape restraining you with his Wing-Ding as he asked, "You okay there?" "*grunt* Besides from being tortured by your boss's archenemy, yeah, things are quite freaking peachy!" You sarcastically remarked, as Robin soon helped you up onto your feet, while you attempted to hold your abdomen together to prevent your organs from spilling out.

But as you managed to make it through one of the hallways of the Sionis Steel Mill, you began to notice the numerous unconscious Joker thugs lying around as you both pass by them, where you then spoke toward Robin and asked, "So... I'm guessing Harley sought you and Batman out in order to find me, didn't she?" "...Pretty much. He was reluctant to help her out at first, considering-" Robin answered, just as you promptly retorted, "Her criminal past and affiliation with the Joker? ...Yeah, that's understandable. But, I can assure you, Robin: She's a changed individual...Well, somewhat changed, but she isn't trying to hook back up with Joker. After all, I've been living with her on Coney Island for a few months now."

But then, as Robin helped to carry you toward the Sionis Steel Mill main entrance, you both could hear the distinct sounds of Harley Quinn beating the crap out of some Joker thugs with a mixture of acrobatic kicks and flips, as well as using her trademark wooden mallet, where she finished off the final thug as you spoke out toward her as you exclaimed, "Harley!!" "No problem, sweetie. What do you have in mind?" You queried, as you soon dismounted yourself from the L-Shaped couch and walked into the Kitchen area of the apartment. Now dat I think 'bout it, I'm certainly in da mood fer some..."

155332222332222323222322222213312111211.content:
Of course, Harley thought somewhat long and hard about what she wanted to eat for breakfast. Eventually, Harley soon made up her mind as she then answered, "Hmm... Now dat I think 'bout it, I'm certainly in da mood fer some Chili Dog Waffles. Afta all, ya know how ta make a mean Dog, puddin'! *giggle*" At first, you were legitimately surprised to such an odd choice for breakfast. But then again, this was Harley Quinn you were dealing with here, so of course there was going to be some semblance of abnormality when it involved her.

So inevitably, you complied with Harley's distinct breakfast order, as you spoke toward her while you went into the Kitchen area of the lofty apartment and retorted, "*chuckle* Alright, Harl! One big stack of Chili Dog Waffles coming right up!" Of course, as you went into the Kitchen area, your mind suddenly realized something as you thought, "...Wait a minute... I DON'T EVEN KNOW TO MAKE SOMETHING LIKE THIS!!"

However, as if guided by instinct and muscle memory, you suddenly began to grab several things from both the fridge and several kitchen cabinets, which included two boxes of regular Eggo Waffles, Hotdogs and Hotdog Buns, and Chili Sauce. Suffice to say, you personally felt relieved from such an unexpected action, as you thought to yourself and subconsciously said, "Well... That was definitely...unexpected. But hey, I'm certainly not complaining, especially if this came from parts of my life with Harley Quinn that I was unaware of."

Almost an hour later, after instinctively cooking and preparing the unusual cuisine, you were finally finished making what only Gordon Ramsey himself would describe as "Culinary Chaos": The Chili Dog Waffles, as they were built like a sandwich, with the Eggo Waffles acting as sandwich buns, while the chili dogs were smooshed in between the two waffles. However, due to Harley's established weight and girth, you only assumed that one dish of Chili Dog Waffles probably wasn't going to satiate the rotund clown girl's increased appetite, so you decided to make a few more stacks of Chili Dog Waffles just in case.

From there, as you placed the Chili Dog Waffles on the Kitchen table, you spoke up toward Harley and said, "Harley, breakfast is served!" Of course, Harley heard you loud and clear, where she soon stood up from the couch and began to approach the Kitchen table. However, despite now weighing in at little over five hundred pounds, Harley surprisingly was able to pull off two full cartwheels along her way over toward the table, where she momentarily celebrated such a minor accomplishment as she excitedly quipped, "Hell yeah! Still got it in spades!"

Shortly after that, Harley casually but slightly waddled her way toward the Kitchen table, her burgeoning hips sashaying from left to right with each step she made. Being the gentleman you were, you chivalrously pulled out the large reinforced chair for Harley to sit in, where she looked at you with a flirtatious grin on her plump pink lips while she casually sat down and chirped, "D'aw! Aren't ya such a gentleman t'day, puddin'!"

Moments later, you soon gave her a beer mug full of Orange Juice, just as you then got yourself a cup of Orange Juice and a bowl of Cinnamon Toast Crunch, sitting beside the substantially larger Harley Quinn and cautiously queried, "So, Harley... How were you still able to do those Cartwheels anyway?" After holding and biting into the Chili Dog Waffles like a Burger King Whopper, Harley chewed up and swallowed the bite-sized chunk of Chili Dog Waffles before speaking to you and explained, "...Oh dat? Don't ya remember, (Name)? Ivy gave me some special fruit she made to keep mah muscles active, jus' in case anymore of those pea-brain assassins are still afta dat bounty I subconsciously put on m'self when I was sleepwalkin'."

"Oh, um... Yeah, sorry about that. It kinda slipped my mind there. My bad!" You replied, attempting to tell a convincing excuse for not knowing about such information. Of course, what Harley just told you definitely made sense, considering that Poison Ivy was also the one who gave Harley Quinn the immunity to numerous poisons and toxins in the comics, especially since Poison Ivy was also known to sometimes secrete these toxic pheromones that can kill a person if they got too close to her. Fortunately, Harley was very forgiving for your unintentional ignorance, as she then continued eating the Chili Dog Waffles before her, speaking toward you at times with a mouth full of food as she answered, "Vat's e'kay, puddin! *gulp* Afta all, it's not really dat important anyway."

"An' b'sides, t'be honest, sweetie... *gently pats her belly* Ah actually kinda like bein' this big! *giggles* Ah mean, yer hella lot more fun in bed when I got this fat. Plus, ya did say ta me dat yer into bigger chicks afta we got back from Gotham when you were...taken, by Mistah J." Harley explained, revealing to you that, in fact, you were the one who made Harley pack on the pounds in the first place. At first, you were mentally surprised by such a revelation. But then again, you definitely couldn't help but find Harley more attractive in her current size and girth, just as you witnessed Harley taking another large bite out of the Chili Dog Waffles with gluttonous ferocity and gusto.

Of course, both in an attempt to divert the conversation onto a different topic as well as sating your curiosity, you spoke toward the corpulent Harley Quinn and asked, "...So, out of curiosity, Harley: What were you and Ivy talking about over the phone? I mean, I heard you mentioning me a little to her, but... What exactly did she say?" Eventually, after finishing off the first stack of Chili Dog Waffles, licking her unnaturally pale fingers clean of any residue chili sauce, Harley then calmly spoke toward you, displaying a somewhat gleeful smirk on her plump pink lips as she retorted, "...Well, now dat I think 'bout it, puddin'... Yeah, we were talkin' 'bout ya a little. In fact..."

But then, out of nowhere, Harley suddenly and unexpectedly exhaled quite a loud belch from her lips, which made somewhat cherubic cheeks to blush profusely from such an unexpected yet unintentional outburst, where she looked at you with her blue eyes and quipped, "*giggle* Whoops! Must've ate too much!"
