1553322223322223232223222222133121112111.content:
You felt a grimace cross your face for a moment till you saw the twinkle in Harley's eyes as well. Rather than say anything in response though, you instead stepped closer to her and pulled her into a lip-crushing kiss. You could feel her heartbeat pounding against you even through your armor, as well as the heat washing off of her body.

When you finally stepped back, panting for breath, you said huskily, "I just didn't want to get interrupted."

"Ooh, so that's your game?" Harley asked, batting her eyelashes. "Well, ya don't have ta worry 'bout that, Red said somethin' about needin' ta make a quick trip ta the park uptown. She said she'd give a call before droppin' in again."

In response, you dropped your weapons to the ground and started to tear sections of the armor off, while Harley looked on with her smile back in place.

However, as you had stripped yourself topless, you suddenly felt Harley giving you quite the hefty push, taking the initiative, as you were launched onto the bed with relative ease from the clown girl, despite her outward appearance.

From there, despite her substantially larger physique, Harley was able to perform a cartwheel, then a lunging corkscrew flip, landing perfectly upon you with an audible THUD, causing the massive bed to loudly groan and creak in protest from the violent and abrupt movements, as Harley straddled her thick chalk white meaty thighs against your physique, thus keeping you pinned underneath her bulbous girthy frame, as she beared her trademark mischievous smile.

Of course, knowing Harley by this point, that was usually a sign that she was certainly gonna have some dirty not-so-little fun with you.

-- Meanwhile, The Next Morning... --

To say that you certainly had fun last night was undoubtedly an understatement, as you slowly stir from your slumber, with your outfit and equipment scattered across the bedroom floor, thus leaving you in nothing but your boxers.

You rubbed the side of your temple to relieve some mild discomfort due to regaining consciousness. From there, you slowly turned to your right, taking in the full view of an aptly slumbering Harley Quinn, who was currently wearing only her patchworked red and black bra and panties, her signature pigtails undone, leaving her somewhat lengthy mesmerized in a tangled amalgamation of ruby red and deep cobalt blue, all whilst her rotund body laid on it's left side in a semi-fetal position.

Of course, you couldn't help but find it quite adorable the way Harley was currently slumbering. However, as you slowly and quietly dismounted from the luxurious bed, you soon heard Harley mumbling in her sleep.

"Nngh... Com'back 'ere, Mistah J... *groan* Ah got an ass spanking with ya...name on it... *murmur*" She mumbled in her sleep, just as Harley turned onto her back, her bulky bulbous derriere firmly pressing against the soft velvet mattress. Suffice to say, you were hoping that Harley was beating the snot out of the Joker in La-La Land.

Moments later, after getting a shower and proper grooming, you exited the bedroom in some sweatpants and a God of War III T-Shirt, giving Harley some more beauty sleep, whilst you prepared a substantial breakfast for her by the time she awakens.
1553322223322223232223222222133121112111.title: Harley Time

choices: From there, Harley soon came out of the bedroom.
But then, you & Ivy suddenly heard a loud explosion from outside.
Actually, something else happened instead...
1553322223322223232223222222133121112111.content:
You calmly walked into the Kitchen, preparing a rather large breakfast by the time Harley awakens from her slumber. However, whilst you were mixing the pancake batter, you heard the muffled sounds of footprints approaching from behind you.

Your sense of hearing was undoubtedly more acute than you remember, as you were able to easily tell that it wasn't Harley. After all, each footstep sounded much lighter than one can expect from someone weighing a little over five hundred pounds. So, you wagered a guess and subconsciously quipped, "Morning, Ivy."

"*Yawn* Well, at least I'm not the only one awake." She retorted, thus confirming that it was indeed Ivy. From there, as you poured the pancake batter into the large frying pan, you spoke toward Ivy and asked, "...So, I take it that your trip uptown was pleasant?"

"...As much as one would expect, (Name)." Ivy calmly replied, as she sat herself on one of the bar stools, taking a swig from a glass of premium organic Orange Juice. Judging from her tone, it seemed as if something was bothering her. So, in response, you turned around to face the redhead and said, "...Well, it sounds like something seems to be bothering you, Red. What seems to be the problem?"

"...During my trip to Central Park, the plants confessed a disturbing truth to me. They've conversed with their siblings in Gotham, and have revealed a, um... concerning revelation." Ivy explained, which strangely made you concerned as well. After all, back when Harley first introduced you to Ivy, Harley explained how Ivy can talk to plants like how Aquaman can communicate with marine life.

...Or at least, that's what these "False" memories that go with this reality have shown you.

Anyway, something in your gut told you that Ivy was trying to tell you something, as your eyebrows furrowed in suspicion and questioned, "...Why do I get this gnawing feeling that you know something, Ivy?"

"...I'm afraid so, (Name). Last night, the plants warned me that that annoying little bastard Cobblepot is going to retaliate against what happened yesterday." She explained, which quickly made you all the more concerned when Ivy confessed such a thing.

"Wait, I thought I made it loud and clear for him to not hunt down Harley." You retorted, in which Ivy looked at you with a rhetoric yet stern expression on her flawless face and answered, "Heh. If you knew him as much as Harley and I, you should know that the Penguin is far too stubborn to back down, especially if he's being threatened."

Moments later, after pacing back and forth in great concern, you soon lashed out, as you punched the Kitchen counter top and roared, "FUCK!!"

"Well, what did you expect, lover boy? Cobblepot isn't some two-bit thug from the Bronx. After all, there's a reason why he's been called "The Gentleman of Crime"." Ivy retorted, obviously having a mildly smug "I told you so" expression on her face, as if she was expecting this. Then again, both she and Harley have dealt with the likes of Penguin on numerous occasions, so of course she would've had an inkling on what Cobblepot's next move would be.

Shortly after calming yourself down, you sifted through your short hair and then asked, "*sigh* ...Okay, so he isn't backing off. What do we do now?" "...Well, all I can say for sure that the borough is going to get a nasty wake-up call when Penguin arrives with a small army." Ivy explained, knowing with certainty that Penguin's gonna be on the warpath.

And you got a feeling that it was going to get bloody.
1553322223322223232223222222133121112111.title: The Return of Ivy & Penguin's Retaliation

choices: Check out what's going on around Coney Island today. The weather seems nice.
Pay Harley a surprise visit while she's at work. She'd probably like that.
Actually, you suddenly heard a loud bang coming from the roof...
1553322223322223232223222222133121112111.content:
However, as you were about to ask Ivy on what they should do in the meantime, you and the human-plant hybrid soon recognize the almost lumbering footsteps of a quarter-ton Harleen Quinzel, still in her massive babydoll tee and plus-sized lingerie, instinctively outstretching her doughy arms whilst letting out a rather extensive yawn as well.

Her hair, currently not kept in it's iconic appearance, flowed down and reached past her rounded shoulders by an inch or two, which was strewn about in an unkempt "bedhead" appearance, as her shimmering blue eyes dilated to refocus themselves while she casually (albeit drowsy) asked, "*yawn* ...Mornin', luv'birds. Sho... *yawn* What's shakin', Red?"

"*sigh*...Hate to be a bearer of bad new, Harleen, but... It seems Penguin wants payback for what went down yesterday." Ivy hesitantly explained, not exactly the type to be a downer for the pale-skinned quarter-ton clown girl that is Harley Quinn, especially in life-threatening situations such as the conspiracy they've unwittingly found themselves in.

However, much to you and Ivy's surprise, Harley was...actually pretty calm about this, as she kinked her neck with a muffled *Pop!* in response, to which she then performed a few leg stretches, which left little to the imagination in regards to the overall circumference of her thunder thighs, to which she then replied by saying, "Psshh! Yeah, so what? It's not like we haven't gone thru worse, right Red?"

"Harley, this is serious. We're talking about how one of your ex-boyfriend's worst enemies is now gunning for our goddamn heads." You interjected, adjusting your voice to not sound too aggressive while also staying firm, as the corpulent Clown Princess of Crime then stood back up to do several arm stretches (Or at least, about as much she can physically do at her current size and girth), arching her back, which made her black and red babydoll tee ride up her hefty gut just an inch or three, exposing just a little more chalk white belly flesh for any and all onlookers to see.

Though, one thing's for sure; You were certainly starting to enjoy seeing this newer, fatter Harley Quinn before you, where you felt a small but prominent bulge spring up a tad in your pants, but that was a mildly noticeable feeling at the moment, as Harley soon lumbered over toward you, her partially exposed apron of a stomach casually brushing up against your form with surprisingly little effort.

From there, Harley gave you a quick but compassionate peck on the lips in reassurance and then retorted, "...I'm well aware of dat, (Name). Stupid Blubberpot was gonna come afta me, anyway. But y'know what? I'm done runnin'." She reached into the fridge and cooked up a large chili-dog submarine sandwich, taking a greasy bite out the messy cuisine, where she then spoke, cheeks still packed full of food, and continued, "Ah made a shitload of mishtakesh vhen I wash wit' Mishtah J, *Nom!* *Chew* *Chew* -- But if Blubberpot wantsh ta throwdown -- *Chew* *Gulp!* -- Ah'll be happy to oblige!"

Even though you completely understand what she was going to do with this whole Penguin debacle, you still questioned, "...Okay, I understand your intentions, Harley, but...If Penguin does come knocking, you got a plan to deal with him and his goons? I mean, sure you got me, Ivy, your Gang of Harleys Big Tony, and the other tenants, but...Will that even be enough?" In response to your question, Harley swiftly finished off the chili-dog sub she was wolfing down on, wiped a bit of the residue chili from her mouth with a meaty arm, and casually waddled over to you. From there, as if to assert some form of mild seduction over you, she firmly pressed her flabby bulge of a abdomen against your flat-toned abs, which also caused her voluminous breasts to smoosh against your pectoral muscles as well.

Of course, you were backed up against the kitchen island, so you were essentially between a fat pregnant rock and a hard place, as Harley placed her hands upon her wide burgeoning hips with a huffed grinning expression, then finally answered, "...Don't worry so much, Puddin'. Y'know I always got plans for those bozos an' their nosy boss."

"An' besides..." She quipped, administering a firm yet sexy slap of the hand upon her chair-crushing behind, which caused the adipose on her ballooned posterior to jiggle and wobble some like a bowl of gelatin, obviously to get you a little heated under the collar. And then, she soon continued, "...I might weigh as much as two prized piggies at a Country Fair, but I can sure crush 'em like anvils!"

Obviously, you figured she would make an explicit comparison to a Looney Tunes cartoon, since she behaved like someone who's nuts over such unrealistic shenanigans. And with a coy yet reassuring pat on your cheek, Harley then quickly turned her hefty self around with a turn of a chubby heel, then happily trotted off back towards the bedroom, with a heavy yet playful skip in her lumbering step, which confused Ivy a little, as she cocked an eyebrow whilst placing her hands on her hips and asking, "...And what exactly do you plan to do in the meantime, Harl?"

Momentarily, just as her body was just in the doorway, Harley gazed back at you and Ivy with her blue eyes and a calm smile on her cherubic face as she simply retorted, "Goin' t'my day job, of course! Sy's gonna wonda how I'm doin'." And with that, she casually waddled back into the bedroom, disappearing from view. Of course, your brain once more had to fill you in on who your 500+ pound eccentric girlfriend was referring to...

The man that Harley was referring to was an old guy named Sylvester Borgman, otherwise known as "Sy Borgman". Apparently, he was some sort of Soviet super-spy during the Cold War, complete with an impressive set of cyborg prosthetics from such a bygone era. Now, as to how this relates to Harley, she was working as a psychiatrist at the Free Spirit Assisted Living Home where Borgman lives with the other elderly folks, and he "hired" her for his final mission -- To kill the eight Russian spies who left him bound to a wheelchair in the first place.

(Author Note: Yeah, it's a little weird. Don't worry, you'll get used to it.)

Afterwards, he's been one of Harley's many new allies during her tenure as the wacky landlady of an apartment complex on Coney Island, as you then returned to shortly thereafter the brief mental recap. Of course, this left you questioning a little as to how Harley could maintain having a working job as a psychiatrist despite her...previous career, you could say.

And yet, just as you were able to concoct a reasonable response given your girlfriend's distinct appearance, Harley then waddled out of the bedroom, looking drastically different than earlier. Aside from the enlarged business attire and labcoat that would e more akin to a small tent on a regular-sized person,the first thing you clearly noticed about Harley was undoubtedly her skin tone. Instead of a bleached chalk white like you're used to, Harley was somehow able to disguise her bleached skin to make it appear as if she has a normal Caucasian skin tone, most likely from applying some substantial amount of facial makeup on her face, hands, neck, and any exposed skin.

And second, instead of her zany matching color palette of permanently dyed red and blue hair, Harley now sported a set of golden blonde hair, neatly formed up into a business hair bun. Obviously, you figured she was most likely wearing a custom-made wig or something similar. Yet, despite her formal-looking attire, you can easily tell how she tucked her belly into her business skirt a little, which gave off a slight bulge along the hem of her skirt.

And as straightened out her eyeglasses, Harley then twirled in place some to give you and Ivy a good look at her in such a disguise, then cheekily asked, "...Well, how do I look?"

"Wow..." Was all you could mutter, obviously astonished at how she looked, as if she never became the Joker's henchwoman prior. From there, Harley let out quite a chuckle at your reaction, to which she then calmly lumbered up to you, wrapped her meaty arms around your shoulders, and seductively whispered in your ear and quipped, "...Glad I can still knock ya flat, Puddin'!"

And with that, Harley then swiftly grabbed her purse and briefcase for today's appointments at the Living Home, blowing you a kiss as she lumbered out the door, heading towards her workplace as if it was an everyday recurrence. Suffice to say, you felt rather speechless in a sense.

Fortunately, Ivy managed to snap you out of it with a quick flick of a vine from a nearby flower pot, where you instinctively blinked twice to thrice, then turned back to Ivy and said, "Thanks."

"You're welcome, considering you were ogling at my best friend for a bit too long for my liking." Ivy flatly retorted, to which she then began to tend to her "Children" currently living in the apartment condo with you and the hefty Harley, which felt like the least weirdest thing you've seen this week ironically.

Now, with more than enough free time on your hands, you ultimately decided to...

1553322223322223232223222222133121112111.content:
However, before you could ultimately make up your mind for today, a sudden noise crackled through the silence.

*THWANG!!*

*CRACK!!*

At first, it jolted you something fierce, as you instinctively grabbed for your pistol and headed to the source of such mechanical noises: The apartment building rooftop.

Rushing up the stairs, you quickly rammed through the rooftop door, aiming your pistol with murderous intent at whoever was intruding, only to stop short upon seeing who was the cause of such a ruckus.

Big Tony and Goatboy.

judging from their current behavior, they were using a weird contraption that could only be described as a junkyard catapult, as you then swiftly lowered your sidearm in a huff and instinctively muttered, "Goddammit, Tony! One of these days I might just shoot you on accident."

"Heh! Well, you're certainly too high-strung for your own good, that's for sure." He rebutted, cleaning his hands a little, just as Goatboy then loaded up another pair of garbage bags onto the catapult's metallic bucket. From there, as if on muscle memory, you bumped fists with the little person, as if it was a normal occurrence for you.

From what you remember via reading a few Harley Quinn comics, Big Tony is one of the apartment's more prominent residents, alongside the aforementioned Goatboy, as well as Madame Macabre, who owns a wax museum comprised of various killers and murderers, including one of Harley's ex-boyfriend, the Joker.

The nickname itself was supposed to be ironic, considering Tony's short but muscular physique. However, he's known to be a close friend of Harley when she moved in as the new apartment landlady. In fact, Big Tony was the owner of a sideshow cabaret of sorts, to which Harley would sometimes perform on.

Plus, he's really good with firearms.

"So... What brings the Lardlady's boy-toy up here, anyway?" Goatboy sarcastically retorted, obviously making a "small" jab towards Harley's fattened waistline, finally loading up the last bag of garbage onto the catapult. Obviously, you gave a bit of a evil eye at the sideshow oddity, who shrunk back slightly, especially since you were still packing heat.

However, you soon replied, "...Came up here to find out what was making all that noise. Nothing more."

"Oh. You were curious, eh?" Big Tony grinned, putting his hands in the pockets of his leather jacket, to which he then explained, "Sorry 'bout that. We had a bit of a mess last night downstairs, so we're usin' this bad boy here to get rid of it all." He then motioned towards the scrappy catapult, giving it a firm pat once or twice to emphasize it's sturdiness.

"She a beaut, isn't she? 'Boss came up with it when we had a garbage problem many moons ago. We call it...The Scatapult!" He rebutted, akin to a car collector with his favorite exotic vehicle.

"Scatapult... ...Well, that explains a lot. This probably must be one of Harley's ideas." You thought briefly, gaining clarity to the metaphorical elephant in the room, just in time to witness Goatboy violently pull back an adjacent lever towards him, which caused the Scatapult to launch it's stench-ridden cargo with a violent upward swing, thus sending it flying at one of many unsuspecting targets.

...Which just so happened to be an office building.

The flung bags of garbage splattered all over the pristine windows of the aforementioned building, to which Goatboy and Big Tony had quite a laugh at what the occupants' reactions upon seeing flying garbage, though you eventually joined in upon imagining the looks on the office workers' faces on such a outlandish and absurd concept.

"Well, I can certainly see why Harley came up with this crazy idea." You quipped, to which Big Tony and the sideshow oddity that was Goatboy settled down somewhat, as the duo then repeated the process once more via retracting the Scatapult back to a prepped position. But then, whilst he assisted the human-goat hybrid in loading up another batch of garbage bags, Big Tony continued speaking with you and asked, "...Speakin' of ladies, how's our favorite Fat Clown Lady doin'?"

Obviously, it was a slight non-threatening jest on the behalf of Harley's now-established weight and girth, which would've probably be akin to a compliment for someone like Harley Quinn. Shortly after exhaling a breath, you soon spoke to Tony and elaborated, "...She's doing...okay, per say. Though...I'm not gonna sugarcoat it, Tony; I'm honestly worried about her at times. I mean, I know she can handle herself just fine, but...We just found out that the Penguin is now gunning for her head."

"Yeah, I heard about him. Some weird eccentric crime boss from Gotham's underworld who's obsessed with umbrellas." Big Tony rebutted, briefly smoking a cigarette, inhaling it once then puffing out some smoke in the process. From there, the diminutive badass then looked back at you and calmly retorted, "...However, I've known Harley long enough to know that she's one tough bitch. A fat one for sure, but still tough nonetheless."

And with another puff of smoke, Tony soon brought up a rather unexpected question in your opinion and bluntly stated, "...And speakin' of Heavy Harley, when are you gonna pop her the question?"

In all honesty, you didn't expect him to bring up such an important topic like marriage. Then again, you have been thinking about such a thing from time to time, considering how close you've gotten with the rotund clown girl. Inevitably, you then spoke to the shorter man, scratching the back of your head some, and eventually answered, "Honestly, Tony..."
1553322223322223232223222222133121112111.title: Scatapult Shenanigans & The Talk

choices: Curiously, you decided to visit Harley while she's at work today.

1553322223322223232223222222133121112111.content:
"Honestly, Tony, I... ...I'm just...not sure if I should, you know?" You humbly answered, whilst Tony continued to smoke on his cigarette, his hearing still trained on your conversation with him. From there, shortly after puffing out smoke from his mouth, the shorter man looked back at you and questioned, "...How so, kid?"

"*sigh* Look, we're not talking about some girl I've found on some cruddy dating site, Tony. We're talking about Harley motherfucking Quinn here!" You flatly retorted, to which you momentarily ceased to calm your nerves then continued, "I mean...Sure she's a bonafide badass in her own right, but...at times, I feel like I'm only kidding myself."

Suffice to say, it felt as if you were talking to a psychologist instead of a tough-as-nails individual like Big Tony. Yet ironically, you felt like you could confide in him, despite initially being a fictional character, where you soon elaborated, "...I'm just...honestly not sure if I should pop the question to her, considering what she went through with the Joker, having a relationship with Ivy, and god-knows-what-else she might've not told me yet before I met her. Plus..."

Almost as if on some emotional impulse, you began to fidget a little with your fingers for a minute or two, then promptly explained, "...I don't...*sigh*...I don't really want to feel like I'm anchoring her down when all is said and done."

"Wow. ...You really thought a lot about it, haven't you kid?" He calmly quipped, calling you "kid" due to the age difference between you and him, as the two of you watched as Goatboy pulled the lever once more, sending another pile of trash bags flying at some unsuspecting individuals. In turn, Tony continued to smoke his cigarette, breathing out another cloud of smoke with a single breath, then proceeded to respond in an understanding manner whilst he retorted, "...And I get what you're sayin', too. After all, I've known a few ex-girlfriends who'd say the same thing."

You felt as if Tony was putting up a jest with that quote, as he then flicked the used-up cigarette onto the floor, calmly stamping out the stick of nicotine to put it out. And with that, the diminutive man then put his hands in the pockets of his leather jacket, breathing out another puff of smoke in the process when he then continued, "...But Heavy Harley, on the other hand... (Name), I've seen a good number of weird shit in my life, and she's definitely that, but in a good way."

Despite the height difference between you and him, Big Tony gave you a reassuring butt pat, since he could barely reach your shoulders without something to stand on, as he then said, "...Kid, you and the big clown have a lot more chemistry together than what I had at your age, even if your tastes in the ladies are...unorthodox at best. But hey, the world's a weird place, whether you're in Coney Island, Gotham, Keystone, or Metropolis! The important thing is...is that you make the best of all the craziness. Don't give a damn about what the other jackasses care about. Capiche?"

From hearing what he said to you with such sage-like wisdom, you eventually nodded back in agreement with the shorter man, as an upward curve appeared upon your lips in the process. Afterwards, you confidently bumped fists with the leather jacket-wearing pygmy as you quipped, "Thanks for the talk, Tony! I owe you one."

"--Just promise me you'll ask her when you get the chance, kid." He interjected, responding in kind, to which you then took off downstairs, saying your goodbyes to them for the time being. You felt as if a great weight was seemingly lifted from your shoulders, as you calmly traversed down the stairs, returning towards Harley's apartment with a seemingly confident stride.

Hopefully, if the stars were aligned just right, there might be hope for what awaited for you and Harley in the near future, even if it will get somewhat chaotic.

Calmly, you picked up one of the several photos strewn about the place, which showcased you and a somewhat thinner Harley Quinn than the one you've grown accustomed to. Looking at the photo, she appeared to be approximately half the size of the currently obese Harley.

But then, as if a light bulb cartoonishly appeared above you akin to an episode of Looney Tunes, you then came to a rather savory conclusion, as you then yelled out to Ivy and hollered, "...I'm heading out for a while. Can you hold down the fort, Red?"

At first, no response. But then, the door to her private greenhouse opened via a vine in the shape of a man's hand opened the door, to which you soon heard Ivy reply, "...It's fine. Where are you even going anyway?"

In response, a cheeky grin appeared on your face, to which you cryptically answered, "...I think it's about time I paid a visit to the doctor."

== Free Spirit Assisted Living Home ==
== Brooklyn Borough ==
==New York City, New York ==

"...Okay, then! Your weekly medical prescription should be in order, Mrs. Savoy." Harley said, fully donned in her normal-looking disguise of an office ensemble, lab jacket, as well as her self-applied disguise, where she filled out the necessary paperwork for one of her more elderly patients, a Mrs. Eleanor Savoy, who immigrated from Eastern Europe during the end of the Great Depression.

"Why thank you, Doctor Quinzel! This place is rather fortunate to have someone such as yourself." The elderly matriarch complimented, to which an almost rosy blush flustered upon the rotund psychiatrist in a bashful manner, to which Harleen sheepishly rebutted, "Oh, please, Mrs. Savoy! You're embarrassing me!"

"Nonsense, child! After all, you're quite a beautiful young lady as is!" She interjected, the old woman still retaining some old-fashioned values on what made a woman beautiful in the eyes of a man.

"Heh. Well, I know a certain someone who would agree with you." She mentally noted, letting her inner personal thoughts circulate temporarily, as she closed the folders containing Mrs. Savoy's files, standing up from the groaning chair to take her leave as she asked, "So, same time next week, then?"

"As always, Doctor. It was so wonderful to see you again." Eleanor chirped, waving an aged wrinkled hand towards the pudgy psychiatrist, with Harleen waving back in kind whilst she scooted and squeezed through the doorway, triple-checking nothing got caught in the door frame in the transition.

Once he was a good distance from the old lady's personal quarters, Harleen letting out a huff of relief, which made her prominent gut press slightly against the hem of her business skirt, creating the illusion of a double-folded belly. "*huff* Whew! I never thought she'd stop. But still, at least she's so earnest." She hushed to herself, letting her real accent slip just a tad.

Once she caught her breath again, Harley reaffirmed herself back into her "Harleen" persona for the time being, for she still had a few more appointments for the day before she could head back and get into some more "Fun Clothes" as she'd love to plainly put it.

And with a forward waddling trot, Harleen traversed her way through the clean halls of the living home, carefully looking through her appointment papers as to who she'll be checking on, humming a short tune to herself as she flipped through sheet after sheet of documented dossiers, thinking to herself as she elaborated, "Okay, let's see... Mr. Karkov is complaining about his back pain meditation...again. ..Then, there's sweet little Agnes Jewell...She's due for a medication refill. And finally.."

After flipping through several documented files, Harleen stopped sifting through the folders upon seeing a certain dossier, to which a dimpled curve appeared on her chubby cheeks as she continued, "...We have you, Sy. *giggle* Can't wait to see that old geezer again!"

From there, Harleen unintentionally let her clown-like enthusiasm seep out a little, where she gave out a little skip in her waddling step, despite she was still wearing a pair of expensive custom-fit heeled shoes due to how plump her feet had gotten by now.

Letting her curiosity get the best of her, she then proceeded to waddle her way towards the front reception desk, not realizing who would be there to personally greet her...

=====

Meanwhile, back at the Front Reception Room...

You sat in one of the several couches residing within the waiting area, now wearing one of the living home's Visitor Passes around your neck, hands clasped together in a patient stance. For the first time since you've arrived here, your thoughts have shown surprising amounts of clarity, despite who your girlfriend is.

However, said silence was soon disrupted, coming in the form of your vibrating smartphone. Instinctively, you pulled the compact cellular device from your left pocket, only to see a notification from an unknown messenger.

"*sigh*...I got a hunch I probably know who's texting me." You thought to yourself, to which you then tapped a thumb upon the notification, sending you to the text message itself, as you read the following:

"CH, it's me. I take it that you're already well-established in NYC?"

Letting out a sigh, you instinctively figured that it was probably a certain Dark Knight giving you this message, considering that the text was most likely heavily encrypted to avoid unwanted eavesdropping. Figuring you might as well respond back, you soon tapped away on the phone's touch keyboard in rapid succession with the following message:

"...I'm fine, if that's what you're saying, DK. However, HQ and I have a big problem right now."

A brief second or two later, the unknown caller retorted:

"...How so?"

Feeling mildly annoyed, you decided to spell it out to him, as you angrily texted:

"C-O-B-B-L-E-P-O-T. You know? Little guy, beaked nose, has bad blood between J and HQ. Any of THAT ring a bell?!"

For a brief moment, no response. But not a few seconds afterwards, you swiftly received the proceeding text:

"Yes. I'm aware of who you speak of. What have you found?"

You gave a sarcastically smug curve of your lips, obviously not a little amused with Penguin threatening Harley. In turn, you confessed:

"Turns out he still wants HQ's head on a spike, so he's sending some of his men and some local thugs after her. Not sure when they'll strike next, but he's planning on expanding his business into NYC. That's all I know so far."

Moments later, you then received a single text that ultimately stated:

"Keep me posted."

And with that, the archived text messages were abruptly wiped from your phone, as if they ceased to exist. In response, you let out a mild huff of frustration, especially with how...secretive, communication was with Gotham's most notorious vigilante. Then again, it was given that this would be how you communicate with Him, which strangely didn't seem to bother you as much.

"Bad time, huh?" A voice rang out, which you soon found it came from the male orderly, some guy named Javier, based on the ID Tag clipped onto his shirt. Of course, you readjusted your demeanor and swiftly answered, "...Not exactly. Just a co-worker with some annoying tendencies."

"Heh! Yeah, I know how you feel." He retorted, to where he then soon noticed the Visitor Pass dangling from your neck, as he then casually asked, "...Expecting to see someone?"

"Oh! Um...yeah. My girlfriend works here. Her name's Harleen," You answered, trying to keep a somewhat low profile, only for the orderly quickly realize who you were referring to and reply, "Wait... You mean Doctor Quinzel? I honestly didn't know she even have a boyfriend."

"*chuckle* Yep, guilty as charged." You casually quipped, which resulted in you receiving a pat on the back by the living home employee as he chirped, "Congrats to you, buddy! She may be a tub of lard, but Dr. Quinzel's a real sweetheart."

From there, the man parted ways with you, beginning to make his rounds within the facility, just in time for the aforementioned Doctor Quinzel to pass by him whilst he went through the double doors in the opposite direction. Luckily, she didn't initially notice you when she went through the doors, making a lumbering bee-line towards the Reception Desk, speaking toward the receptionist as she asked, "...What is it, Julie?"

From there, you swiftly approached her from behind, calmly wrapping your arms around Harley's fattened waistline, which barely connected to each other due to your disguised girlfriend's widened physique. In turn, this caused a small "Eep!" yelp of surprise to erupt from her ruby red lips, almost dropping the minuscule stack of folders she was carrying in her thick chubby arms in the process.

However, she soon returned to a calmer composure upon realizing who was hugging her, a plump dimpled smile soon appeared upon her fuller face, her head tilted downwards slightly, to which her chin was slightly pressing against the plump fold around her neck that was her double chin.

From there, she mustered up enough resolve to speak to you and coyly asked, "...Sweetie? What are you doing here?"

"...I thought I'd pay my cute bundle of fun a visit. Is that so wrong?" You coyly flirted, which brought about a rosy blush from the blubbery blonde's fuller cheeks, still bearing a coy curve upon her lips. Of course, the receptionist, Julie, was certainly having quite a chuckle from Harleen's expense, doing her best to stifle such chuckling with a gesture of her hand, yet obviously just aware of Dr. Quinzel's relationship with you.

"I'l uh...I-I'll leave you two alone." Julie quipped, to which the receptionist returned to work, whilst Harleen then turned her hefty self around, holding your hands within her own plump pair, to which she then calmly guided you...

== 2 Minutes Later... ==

Eventually, after walking through the near labyrinthine halls of the retirement home, the two of you inevitably reached the office of Doctor Harleen Quinzel, which was surprisingly spacious, considering your rotund girlfriend's profession, complete with a furnished oaken desk and reinforced rolling chair, obviously for withstanding Harley's incredible posterior and girth when needed.

Picking up the phone, she put it against her left ear and mouth, then politely questioned, "Hello, this is Doctor Harleen Quinzel. How may I help you?"

Despite your peak physical condition in this world, you couldn't quite make out who your girlfriend was conversing with over the phone. Though, judging from the subtle tweaks and changes in Harley's facial expressions, it was clearly something that's garnered her undivided attention, as you can hear Harley answer, "Yes... ...Uh-Huh... Yes, I can meet you there... ...I understand. See you then,"

And once was all said and done, Harley then calmly ended the phone call, putting the antique telephone back into it's neutral stance, huffing out a deep sigh in response, to which you stood back up, looking at the corpulent yet disguised Clown Princess of Crime with a worried expression on your face and asked, "...What's wrong? Did something happen?"

At first, she didn't respond. But a few short seconds later, Harley looked back at you, now bearing...

In response, you then gently took hold of her right hand, squeezing it just a tad to reassure her, which seemed to be rather effective on her behalf, as you calmly retorted, "...It's okay. You can tell me."

"Thanks, sweetie. Well... *chuckle* ...I think we might've gotten a new Doc. You know..." She replied, chuckling somewhat as she motioned her free hand towards the bulging blubbery expanse that is her abdomen, accompanied by quite a rosy blush upon her slightly rounder cheeks, as well as an upward curve of her lips. Meanwhile, on your end of the situation, you were...actually surprised to hear this news, to which you then mildly exclaimed, "Harley... That's excellent news!"

However, as one question was answered, another one arose, where you soon looked back upon the obese Harley and then curiously asked, "...So, um... ...Who were you talking to on the phone, anyway?"

Initially, the porcine clown girl didn't answer right away, subconsciously stroking the soft smooth orb that was her stomach in an absentminded manner with a free hand. Of course, you easily forgave her for such mannerisms, considering it's probably the pregnancy messing with her own hormones, to which you easily snapped her out of it with just a few sharp snaps of your fingers, only for Harley to blink several in a confused manner as she stammered, "Huh...Wha?"

"Didn't you hear what I said, Harley?" You asked worryingly, to which she compensated by responding< "Yeah, I 'eard ya, (Name)! I was just..."

She briefly thought back, only to quickly reassert her focus once more as she interjected, "A-Anyway... Turns out doctor from Japan's int'rested in me. Hell, she asked me by name, no less!"

"Japan? Well, that's...unexpected." You retorted, being honestly surprised at such news, wondering who'd pull the strings to get Harley that sort of professional help, let alone from a place on the other side of the world. However, you quickly redirected back onto the subject at hand, as you then spoke once more and said, "...Anyway, you were saying, Harley?"

"..Well, she traveled all the way 'ere t'do some med-eval on me. From what I 'eard about her, she's supposed t'be some sort of...Weight Gain Doctor, you can say?" She explained, which certainly took you by surprise when you heard the words "Weight Gain" and "Doctor" in the exact same sentence. Of course, the corpulent clown then promptly continued, "...I think 'er name is Dr. Miharu-something. Y'know, me, I'm not much inta the small details."

"I figured as much. So, did this doctor say where she wanted to meet us?" You interjected, as Harley then calmly (albeit slowly) stood up, proceeding to quickly gather some of her discarded garments strewn across the floor, re-equipping them along with buttoning up her work shirt, and putting her blonde wig back on, to which she replied, "--Over at the Brookdale University Hospital in Brooklyn. Y'know the place, right?"

"Yeah, I believe so. Here, let me help you with that." You retorted, promptly assisting the heavyset harlequin with getting some of her clothes back on. Though, something told you that today was going to be...hectic, in a sense.

== Brookdale University Hospital ==
== Brooklyn Borough, New York City ==

"*sigh* <You would think the most famous city in America would give the hospitals outside of Manhattan Island proper funding to work with.>"

A voice flatly stated, speaking in the native Japanese dialect, which originated from a certain individual who stood out substantially in the sterile halls of the hospital. In appearance, she wore an orange-yellow turtleneck sweater, which did little to conceal the woman's burgeoning 300+ pound frame, with her lab coat only exaggerating such proportions. Her pants strained a little from attempting to contain her bulging thighs, calves, and buttocks, as well as her sandal-like heels exposing her feet to the elements.

With a waving gesture of her equally plump yet uncannily human prosthetic left arm and hand, she sifted through her semi-messy mid-length brown mane of hair, only for her assistant, who carried her fair share of obesity, waddled up behind her superior and retorted, "<Well, at least some of the food here is decently edible and rich in calories, Miharu-san.>"

From there, the heavyset nurse promptly handed over a set of files toward her equally rotund colleague. Flipping through the intricately written pages, the documents contained...

To say that her latest patient was..."unique" would certainly be an understatement back in her native country, that's for certain.

As she explicitly absorbed every word and syllable within the confines of the folders she held in her grasp, Miharu then flipped over the folder to the front cover, reading a set of bold and prominent words engraved upon the folder:

[Classified]
[Elizabeth Arkham Asylum for the Criminally Insane]

Of course, Miharu herself wasn't too intrigued by the goings-on within the notorious Gotham City, let alone the tall tales of a dark vigilante the local Gothamites call "The Batman". However, she has heard numerous speculative rumors from her fellow doctors in regards to the Elizabeth Arkham Asylum for the Criminally Insane, or simply "Arkham Asylum" as crudely abbreviated as it was.

However, as to how exactly the rotund Japanese doctor managed to acquire such confidential information... One can only speculate at the moment. Out of a mix of curiosity and concern, her equally obese nurse spoke up toward her and questioned, "<...Doctor...A-Are you certain about this, regarding our choice of patient?>"

And with a slow turn of her semi-plump head, Miharu looked back towards her assistant, a raised quizzical eyebrow aimed at the porcine pink-haired nurse, keenly noticing Takumi's apprehensive doubts in regards to tending to their newest patient.

"<...I'm well aware you have certain..."inclinations", regarding who we have an appointment with, but-- >" She explained, only for the heavyset nurse to interject as she soon questioned, "<Why are we helping someone like Her? She...Sh-She's a criminal! A really bad one, Doctor!>"

"*sigh* <...Regardless of their life choices, Nurse Hara, a patient is still a patient.>" Miharu bluntly elaborated, placing her plump prosthetic limb upon Takumi's shoulder to ease the rotund nurse, especially since the patient they would be tending to was of some renown. Afterwards, the two overweight medical professionals lumbered their way inside the Brookdale University Hospital, to which the blubbery brunette flatly continued in their native dialect and retorted, "<...After all, we're here at the behest of Dr. Pamela Isley to diagnose her..."friend", and we should not be quite judgmental in our profession.>"

"<Maybe...*sigh*...But still, she's a criminal, Doctor!>" Takumi stated, doing her best to keep pace with her equally overweight medical superior, only for Miharu to retort back whilst keeping a well-paced waddling stride as she replied, "<A patient is still a patient, Takumi. Whether they be rich or poor, upstanding citizen or known criminal, a patient is still a patient either way.>"

"<...Though, if you seem so determined to crave such answers, I would recommend taking such questions up with our patient when she arrives, Nurse Hara.>" The brunette elaborated, to which the pink-haired woman then meekly answered, "<I...I will keep that in mind, Doctor.>"

And as Miharu reopened the folder to observe it's contents once more, her eyes gazed upon a distinct picture of Harley Quinn, her oversized mallet slung over her shoulder in a rather confident pose, despite the skimpy red and black clothes saying otherwise, to which the near quarter-ton physician mentally mused, "<...Well then, Ms. Quinzel... Let us hope you are willing to make it to your appointment.>"

Meanwhile, back outside on the streets of Brooklyn, the two of you were calmly striding towards the Brookdale University Hospital, clearly walking side-by-side with the substantially heftier Harley, who still wore her Dr. Quinzel disguise, due to not having enough time to head back to Coney Island for a quick change of clothes and makeup.

Aside from the odd stare from any passerby, the trek to Brookdale was rather...surprisingly uneventful, to say the least. Harley, on the other hand, was casually humming a little tune to herself, obviously in quite a peppy mood today.

"...Well, someone seems to be in a good mood today." You stated, to which the rotund disguised clown girl couldn't help but wholeheartedly agree with that statement, giggling back as she replied, "*giggle* What can I say, sweetie? I'm honestly rather excited!"

"I know, Harl. *sigh* ...I'm sorry. I'm just a little on edge from what Penguin's trying to do, y'know?" You blatantly confessed, only to then feel Harley's softened from press against you, with her plump hands resting upon her titanic hips, as you accidentally bumped into such a cushioned exterior. From there, Harley looked back upon you and calmly retorted, "...I know, Puddin'. However, I ain't lettin' Blubberpot ruin my time wit' ya. An' besides..."

And with a simple but pleasing gesture of performing a light pat of her bulging belly to emphasize her...well, SIZE, Harley proved her point to you whilst she continued, "...If stupid Blubberpot plans on ruinin' my fun, you can bet I'm sittin' my big fat ass on him!"

Honestly, you thought that it sounded more erotic than what she was getting at, as the two of you then continued trekking toward the University Hospital. Hopefully, with some luck, there wouldn't be any of Penguin's thugs waiting there to rough things up.

== 5 Minutes Later... ==

Eventually, you and Harley had finally reached the Brookdale University Hospital. Of course, after making it to the Reception Desk, you were pointed towards a nearby Waiting Room just a few doors to the left. Though, despite her clearly abundant and corpulent physique, Harley was able to fit her hefty self into one of the couches in the room, with it's frame groaning somewhat due to her not-so-subtle quarter-ton form, with you sitting in an adjacent chair next to her.

Currently, she was harmlessly reading through some Victoria's Secret magazine donated to the hospital for use by the waiting room occupants. Obviously, you figured she was probably thinking up some way to fit into some sexy plus-sized lingerie to garner your affections, which wouldn't seem so bad in earnest.

However, with a sudden turn of the office doorknob, you witnessed as one of the local nurses appeared to announce, "Harleen Quinzel?"

"Hey, that's us!" She mildly exclaimed, almost instantly shooting up from the love-seat she was sitting in, as she then waddled her way toward the nurse, with you following suit as well. Though, you were certain to make sure that Harley was able to fit through the doorway, so the likelihood of her unwittingly getting wedged was minimum at best.

Afterwards, the two of you were personally escorted to a decently-sized doctor's office, undoubtedly one big enough for Harley's current size standards. A few moments of waiting passed by until the door opened once more to reveal...

After much waiting for the assistance of these supposed medical professionals, such patience had finally paid off.

The door leading into the doctor's office slowly opened to reveal a rather rotund nurse before you and the somewhat heftier Harley. Of course, you can easily see how...revealing the heavyset woman's attire was, especially since your girlfriend was rather renowned for consistently wearing skimpy outfits, which were only made all the more revealing by Harley's now established heft and girth.

Anywho, you noticed how the pink-haired nurse waddled inside, making sure her 300+ pound frame had passed through the doorway as to avoid getting herself wedged in the doorframe. Surprising, considering that you noted how the nurse was actually the thinner one in the room compared to the 500 pound pregnant Harley Quinn. However, once the hefty woman was fully inside the room, she and Harley soon found themselves facing one another in an awkward stare-off, akin to two complete strangers meeting for the first time.

Ultimately, this led to the woman speaking, her voice having a rather substantial British accent to it despite her contradicting physical traits as she blurted, "...You're, um...b-bigger than I thought."

"Oh, uh...yeah! You too!" Harley retorted, speaking in her Harleen accent, bearing a rather noticeable blush underneath the applied makeup she used prior to disguise her unnaturally pale bleach white skin, with her blue eyes looking off to the side as well. Of course, as the porcine nurse promptly obtained the necessary doctoral utensils, you looked upon her and quizzically asked, "So...I'm guessing you're this Dr. Miharu person we're supposed to be meeting?"

As if you said something offensive, Takumi promptly turned her hefty self around (Or...at least, about as fast as her body would allow.), now bearing a rather confused expression upon her round face, only to then raise her hands before her in a negative waving gesture as she shyly stammered, "...What? No! Nononono! I'm not Dr. Endo! I...I-I'm her nurse, T-Takumi Hara!"

"Nurse, huh? Never seen an overweight nurse before till now, that's for sure." You jokingly quipped, much to Takumi's initial embarrassment, only for the heavyset nurse named Takumi Hara to meekly retort, "It...I-It's a side-effect from working with Dr. Endo. N-Nothing to be too worried about!"

Obviously, you can easily somewhat tell that Takumi seemed a little..."hesitant", considering her display of demeanor for the time being. From there, the pink-haired nurse promptly began to use a stethoscope to examine your girlfriend's heartbeat, only uttering the words, "Deep breaths, please."

Inhale, count to three...

Exhale, count to three...

Inhale, count to three...

Exhale, count to three...

It was a surprisingly steady process for Harley, considering she was known for the opposite, of course.

However, a bit of Harley's makeup-covered skin around her cleavage area got smeared upon the stethoscope's flat disk used for inspecting one's vitals, which soon exposed just a smidge of Harley's signature yet unnatural skin pigmentation. Luckily, the overweight nurse didn't initially notice the exposed skin, but she was soon aware of the smeared makeup on the flat disk, using a sanitation wipe to clean it off. From there, she soon answered, "...Well, your heart rate and BPM are...surprisingly healthy, despite your body mass."

"Well, that's actually good. So, when will she get here?" Harley asked, wondering when the aforementioned Doctor Miharu Endo would inevitably arrive for her appointment. But whilst Takumi continued the basic medical evaluation upon Harley, you soon heard Takumi speak up and hesitantly reply, "Oh! Um...I-I'm sure she will enter soon enough. After all, I...I've worked with her for quite a while now."

"...She sounds like an interesting person." You responded, obviously noting Takumi's shyness towards Harley in particular. However, speaking of the aforementioned physician, the office door soon opened wide, to which an equally heavyset woman lumbered inside. Unlike the nurse, Takumi, this woman was noticeably different, both in physical appearance and outfit, wearing an orange-yellow turtleneck sweater underneath a large lab-coat, wearing a set of black cargo pants and, oddly enough, a pair of black strap-on sandals.

Shortly after entering the room and closing the door behind her, she soon spoke toward Harleen with a rather flatly blunt tone and asked, "...Dr. Harleen Quinzel, I presume?"

"Yes, that's me. I'm guessing you're Dr. Miharu Endo?" She retorted, asking a question as well in her Harleen accent. In response, the woman nodded in confirmation, gently placing a small stack of folders upon the nearby countertop, where Miharu then promptly sat herself down in a rather small metal stool, to which her burgeoning buttocks oozed a little out of the armless furniture. However, what came out of her mouth next was unexpected, as Miharu then flatly said, "...Let's get down to business. ...I know you're Harley Quinn."

It felt like time had just froze for a few seconds, as Takumi swiftly looked at her superior and yelped, "Doctor!! That was uncalled for!"

" -Wait a minute! How the hell do you even know who I was anyway?!" Harley exclaimed, pulling off her blonde wig as if the jig was up, with you being equally as confused, as her true accent slipped out some on accident. Of course, you chimed in as well, intent on getting some answers as you questioned, "Yeah, like she said! What are you, Psychic or something?"

From there, with a simple series of gestures, Miharu grabbed one of the folders, opened it up before the two of you, thus revealing Harley's entire psychological profile that came straight from Arkham Asylum akin to a children's book, to which the rotund brunette then promptly (albeit flatly) elaborated, "...It doesn't take someone with a PhD doctorate to figure out that Harleen Quinzel and the criminal known as Harley Quinn are one and the same."

In all honesty, this...actually surprised you a little. After all, you assumed the whole world kinda knew that Harley Quinn is Harleen Quinzel, considering it seemed like common knowledge. And yet, this rotund Japanese doctor just flat-out said so to your faces. And in an almost uncanny nonchalant demeanor, no less!

So, in an attempt to recover herself from such a shocked stupor (along with getting some definitive answers), Harley moved her blue eyes to gaze upon the heavyset medical duo and forcibly asked...

1553322223322223232223222222133121112111.content:
[Hello, everyone! Vocal here! If you're interested in the exploits of Dr. Miharu Endo and Nurse Takumi Hara, go check out Dr-Black-Jack on his DeviantArt page! (https://www.deviantart.com/dr-black-jack...) Anyway, let's get back to it!]

To say that you and the hefty Harley Quinn were initially dumbfounded as to how the woman before you was so nonchalant about the fact that she was fully aware as to Harley Quinn's true identity would be considered an understatement, to say the least.

It felt as if this moment was etched into your brains.

That is...until Harley instinctively lunged from her seat, lifted up Dr. Miharu by the woman's sweater with surprising strength, gave her a pissed off stare and yelled, "Alright, brownie! Who sent ya?! Mistah J?! Blubberpot?! Riddlah?! B-Man?!"

Much to your expectations at this point, the same couldn't be said with Nurse Takumi, who looked thoroughly surprised at the fatter woman's strength. But as you quickly notice her trying to grab some sort of sedative, you quickly jumped from your seat, as you gazed at the pink-haired nurse and exclaimed, "Wait! Don't do it!"

"And why not?!" Takumi stammered, the syringe looking primed in her plump gloved hands, only to be stopped dead in her hefty tracks as Dr. Miharu bluntly yet flatly exclaimed, "...Put the sedative down, Nurse Takumi!"

At first, Takumi didn't initially do as her medical superior demanded, obviously out of Miharu's own safety in their current situation. However, whilst she was forcibly hoisted up by an angered heavier Harley, Miharu gave Takumi a blunt authoritative glare at the fat nurse, which seemed to be slightly unnerving to her. And with a simple gesture, Takumi gently placed the sedative-filled syringe back onto the countertop, then positioned her hands in a surrendering posture.

Although you were glad that she put the sedative down, you were still concerned about what Harley was currently doing, holding up the thinner doctor in a threatening position, still gripping tightly on Miharu's sweater with her semi-plump hands and digits, having this crazed look in her sharp blue eyes.

So, in a meaningful attempt to defuse the hostility in her current situation, Miharu soon spoke up towards the fatter Harley and bluntly elaborated, "...Dr. Pamela Isley sent me and my assistant here to examine you, Ms. Quinzel. Not to bring you harm on the behalf of...whomever you spoke of."

Initially, Harley still bore a noticeably hostile demeanor upon her rounded face. However, as the gears in her often chaotic subconscious turned and spun, her angered features slowly but surely softened, though only halfway when she soon spoke up, using her actual accent and asked, "...Did she have red hair, leaf green skin, an' a habit of talkin' t'plants like they're people?"

Of course, you figured she would ask that sort of question. Sure, it would've been a downright weird question to ask if you were back in the real world, but you easily remembered WHERE you were, so it wasn't entirely lost on you. Either way, the tension was soon resolved when Miharu gave an affirmative nod, which made her chin press against the neckfold that was her double-chin, then promptly answered, "...Yes. She was certainly...unique, to say the least."

"Oh! Well, in that case..." Harley quipped, as she then casually lowered Dr. Miharu back down onto the stool, then proceeded to lumber back to her respective seat, now bearing a bit of an embarrassed blush for lashing out like so. From there, she cleared her throat a little, then continued, "...Sorry 'bout that. We've been goin' thru some shit as of late."

Miharu properly readjusted her ensemble back to it's previous position prior to Harley's crude man-handling of her person, pulling her sweater down to re-cover her bulbous light chocolate sphere of a belly. Afterwards, the rotund Japanese brunette then calmly responded, "...You had your doubts, Ms. Quinzel. It was only fair that you would be initially apprehensive about us."

"So...let me get this straight, because I'm still a tiny bit confused about this. Ivy sent you two?" You questioned, having your turn to speak your mind, now that the metaphorical dust had settled for the time being. Shortly after readjusting herself on the stool, with Takumi picking up the strewn about papers that laid on the floor from the brief scuffle and putting them back in the folder, Miharu then looked back at the two of you and bluntly answered, "...Yes. Long story short, Nurse Takumi and I formally met her at a physician's convention in the Shibuya Ward. The only word I could describe her would be...intriguing."

"*giggle* Y'got that right!" Harley chuckled, undoubtedly agreeing with the less heavier doctor in regards to the human-plant hybrid that is her best friend. Of course, once the documented papers were re-gathered, Takumi handed the dossier over to Miharu, to which a silent non-verbal "Thank You" was exchanged between the two heavyset women, where the pink-haired nurse proceeded to obtain the necessary medical instruments to continue the medical evaluation on Harley Quinn, just as Miharu then looked back toward Harley and continued, "...Now, Ms. Quinzel--"

"--Please, call me Harley!" The red and blue-haired woman interjected, akin to a gullible (albeit friendly) demeanor known quite clearly in her posture and expression. Correcting herself, Miharu cleared her throat some, then promptly continued speaking, the brief glimpse of an upward curve of her lips appearing before dissipating just as quickly, and retorted, "My apologies. Now, Harley... I will need to ask you some critical questions, regarding the...current, state of things as it were. Can you do that?"

"Yeah. Yeah, sure!" She quipped, just as Takumi began to perform the standard medical evaluation upon the larger woman before her, only for Takumi to say, "...I need you to take some of your clothes off."

"Ooh! Gettin' frisky on me, Nurse Takumi?" Harley coyly teased, which brought about a rather embarrassed blushing expression upon Takumi's chubby face, obviously flustered about her patient's flirtatious quips. Fortunately, Harley was merely jesting, being all too willing to strip herself of her disguise, as she casually flicked her heeled shoes from her plump feet, then proceeded to pull down her business skirt and pantyhose, thus exposing her shimmering yet revealing red and black Harley Quinn booty short-shorts, along with her unnaturally pale bleached white skin.

Suffice to say, said shorts left little to the imagination as to the size of her snowy white caboose.

1553322223322223232223222222133121112111.content:
[Hello, everyone! Vocal here! My apologies for the delay. Anyway, if you're interested in the exploits of Dr. Miharu Endo and Nurse Takumi Hara, go check out Dr-Black-Jack over on his DeviantArt page! (https://www.deviantart.com/dr-black-jack...) Now then, let's get back to business, shall we?]

But as Harley proceeded to sit her abundant derriere back upon the chair she previously used, Dr. Miharu calmly received the written documents by her equally tubby assistant. With a few good smacks of the sheets of paper, they were reorganised within the confines of the clipboard.

She cleared her throat, then commenced the medical interrogation, pulling a pen out from her lab coat pocket as well, then began, "...According to these documents, you were once a staff member of Elizabeth Arkham Asylum for the Criminally Insane, and were assigned as the psychiatrist to the criminal they call "The Joker". Is this indeed accurate, Ms. Quinzel?"

"And what does this have to do with her health, anyway?" You questioned in a reasonably skeptical manner, only for you to feel Harley reassure you with a tight squeeze from her plump chalk-white hand. In response, she looked at you with a reassuring look on her slightly rounder face and retorted, "...It's fine, Puddin'. I can handle it."

And with that, Harley refocused towards Dr. Miharu and Nurse Takumi, to which she promptly answered, "...Yeah. Y'got it right, Doc. Right down to my ties wit' Mistah J."

"It seems your hippocampus is working correctly. Excellent." Miharu quipped, noting how Harley still retained a massive portion of her memories prior to becoming who she is today, to which she jotted it down on the clipboard. From there, the heavyset medical professional soon continued, "Alright, then. Next question: It is said that you developed..."Romantic Feelings" towards the Joker, according to the testimonies by the Arkham staff. Is it true that you helped him escape captivity as well?"

There it was. The most infamous question. The one that made a seemingly naive woman into the notorious Clown Princess of Crime. Your eyes darted over onto the rotund Harley, who looked to have a sliver of nostalgia written on her plump facial features. In response to such a question, she let out a nostalgic sigh, then casually elaborated, "*sigh* Now that brings back memories..."

However, her mood dampened slightly, to which she continued, "...Too bad I didn't realize the feelin' was one-sided till he tried t' get me killed on multiple occasions."

"But why? Why would you fall for such a vile man?" Takumi interjected, to which Dr. Miharu allowed...at least for now, anyway. After all, you can see that the heavyset nurse was having some difficulty comprehending how someone like Harley would fall for someone like the Joker. Of course, Miharu quickly reprimanded, "...My apologies. Nurse Takumi was rather...adamant, in receiving an explanation regarding yourself, Ms. Quinzel."

"Fair enough." She retorted, shrugging her plumped shoulders in response. After all, Harley figured that Takumi appeared rather apprehensive about her, so it seemed fair that she's given a decent explanation. With a short exhale, the pale-skinned rotund beauty then gazed back toward Takumi and reluctantly confessed, "...I became a psychologist so I can understand why my family was the way it is. Though, as for why I hooked up wit' Mistah J... *sigh* I thought he an' I were kindred spirits. ...That is, till he did some fucked up things lately that made me...reconsider."

In an instinctive response, you obviously wrapped your hand around Harley's own in comfort, squeezing it some out of affectionate reassurance. Of course, whilst Dr. Miharu was jotting down several personal notes for future reference, Takumi then apologized, "...I'm sorry. It's just that...I knew a classmate who was studying abroad. I only heard from him how terrible Gotham City was. I...I-I want to understand why someone like you would associate themselves with a madman."

Understanding the irony of her prior predicament, Harley let out a small dry chuckle, which caused her burgeoning belly to jiggle slightly from such movement, only to then reply, "*dry chuckle* Yeah. I know da feelin' all too well, Pinkie. ...Some people call it "Mad Love"."

"That's understandable, Ms. Quinzel, considering what you had to endure." The heavyset brunette doctor flatly answered, flipping onto another page to continue jotting down crucial notations in the process. But then, almost out of nowhere, Dr. Miharu randomly asked, " Could you please get up onto the scale, Ms. Quinzel?"

"Eh, why not?" She shrugged, casually standing up to her full height, causing her semi-smooth double belly to pooch over and obscure her red and black harlequin panties. From there, Harley seductively waddled herself over towards the scale (obviously to get you flustered from seeing her voluminous backside), whilst a thought crossed your mind regarding the medical instrument, noting, "...I got a feeling that that scale isn't gonna hold up under her."

Meanwhile, Nurse Takumi on the other hand, waddled up towards Harley, who slowly stepped up onto the miniscule scale, only for it to make these metallic *groans* and *creaks* the moment the hefty harlequin gently put her foot down on one side of the mechanism. Judging from all the strained noises echoing from the weight measuring instrument, it appeared that it was on the brink of crumbling apart should Harley weigh even a single pound more.

Of course, due to the accumulated adipose on the insides of her meaty thighs, it made it difficult to get an accurate reading on her actual weight, but she managed to compensate this by forcibly pressing her legs together, causing her thigh fat to ooze and bulge outwards from such an action.

And with that, the scale dial begun to rapidly spin for nearly an entire minute... That is, until it finally landed dead-center on the true number of Harley's physical heft.

"Waga kamiyo... <My god...>" She muttered in her native tongue, as you can tell by her initial reaction towards Harley's weight. From there, despite you not entirely understanding the Japanese dialect, Takumi waddled over towards her equally heavyset superior, only to promptly whisper into the woman's ear and hushly elaborated, "Miharu hakase, kore o miru hitsuyo ga arimasu. <Dr. Miharu, you need to see this.>"

And with that, the pink-haired nurse showed Miharu their patient's estimated measurements, the subtle twinge of a smug grin appearing on the woman's round facial features, responding in the same dialect as her assistant, only retorting, "...Omoshiroi. 259.455-Kiroguramu. <...Interesting. 259.455 kilograms.>"

Fortunately, despite not being proficient in Japanese, you can somewhat tell that she was referring to Harley's current weight. And from one too many math lessons at school, you now knew how much your girlfriend weighed.

"572 pounds... Wow, I didn't expect Harley to be THAT heavy." You mentally noted, only to watch as the aforementioned individual cheerfully skipped back to her seat (which initially seemed difficult given her girth). But soon, as she let her belly flop out onto her lap some, Harley then promptly blurted out, "Oh! Before I forget; I'm actually preggers, if you catch my drift, Doc."

Although Takumi showed a decently surprised reaction on her part, Miharu on the other hand seemed almost unfazed by this revelation, only writing down another short paragraph of information of note. And with such confirmation at hand...
1553322223322223232223222222133121112111.title: Interview With A Harlequin

1553322223322223232223222222133121112111.content:
[Hello, everyone! Vocal here! If you're interested in the exploits of Dr. Miharu Endo and Nurse Takumi Hara, go check out Dr-Black-Jack over on his DeviantArt page! (https://www.deviantart.com/dr-black-jack...) Now then, onto the next chapter at hand!]

Despite the timing of it all, the appointment itself felt like it had gone on for a few decent hours. And yet, Dr. Miharu appeared to be finished with the paperwork at present, to which she then promptly handed the clipboard over to Harley as part of the patient's consent, with the heavyset doctor only saying, "Sign here, here, and here, Ms. Quinzel."

From there, following medical procedure like she was back working in Arkham, Harkey consciously signed by the dotted lines scattered across several pages worth of paperwork. But still, despite the hectic chaos you've found yourself in not too long ago, it felt quite...fresh, even exhilarating, to be a part of this version of Harley Quinn's life. Of course, whilst she was in the midst of her second John Hancock, the hefty harlequin gave off her signature quirky smirk with a set of somewhat plump ruby lips, then cheekily quipped, "*giggle* Y'know, I know this wonderful lil' place over on Coney Island you two would love ta see, that's fer sure!"

Despite her initial apprehensions, Takumi slowly began to warm up to the more corpulent clown girl, only for her medical superior to interject, as Miharu bluntly responded, "...Maybe. However, that will-"

*BANG!*

*BANG!*

*BANG!*

The audible sounds of gunshots were suddenly heard from outside the room, which garnered everyone's attention, accompanied by the notable panicked screaming accompanying the chorus of bullets flying.

Of course, both you and Harley weren't as unnerved compared to Takumi, who looked to be quaking in her pink nurse attire, with her bountiful adipose jiggling from the pinkette's unwanted stress and unease, though Dr. Miharu seemed more stable compared to her assistant. However, looking back at Harley, she had this look of disdained frustration as she lowly growled, "Please jus' let it be some sort a' local fuss..."

"Spread out an' find 'er, boys! That fatass clown bitch has to be here!" A gruff voice rang out, accompanied by some scuffling noises. Meanwhile, you looked back at Harley, who promptly stood up on her meaty legs, rolling her neck and stretching a little, with you and her noting what's coming next whilst she commented, "*sigh* Of fuckin' course! Why ain't I surprised?"

"Okay, so what's the plan, Harl?" You quipped, pulling your pistol out from the back of your pants, only for the two of you to hear Takumi exclaim in a hushed voice and nervously stammered, "W-Wait, y-y-you knew th-that this would h-happen?!"

"Pretty much, Pinkie." She retorted, casually picking up one of the stools and wielding it like a weapon with one hand. Meanwhile, you checked how many bullets you had in the ammo clip before inserting the magazine back into the pistol and cocking the weapon. From there, after a brief practice swing with the metal stool, Harley, with a devious twinkle in her eyes and an excited-looking grin plastered on her plump face, then spoke back towards you and replied, "As fer a plan... *giggle* Isn't it obvious, Puddin'? We're gonna go out there, bash their noggins in, bust some nuts, an' call it a day! That sound good?"

At first, you looked back at Dr. Miharu, who was currently trying to keep her equally chubby assistant calm through the tense situation, only to then gaze back at Harley, a devilish grin growing on your own facial features, and instinctively chuckled, "...Sounds good to me, sweetie!"

"And what about us?" Dr. Miharu flatly questioned, speaking in her usual nonchalant mannerisms, despite the current situation occurring on this floor of the hospital. But whilst the heavyset brunette continued to attempt to ease her equally blubbery assistant through the ordeal, Harley simply answered, "Just stay in 'ere while (Name) an' I clean house. B'sides, these bozos are afta me, an' I intend ta send 'em packin'!"

"Make sure you lock the door behind us once we're out of the room." You interjected, to which Dr. Miharu voluntarily complied with what you were saying, confirming with a sound nod, causing her chin to press some against her double chin in the process. And as the two of you heard a series of footsteps steadily approaching the door to the room, Harley gazed back at you and asked, "Ready ta have some fun, Puddin'?"

"Let's get them, Harl." You instinctively retorted, readying yourself in a combative stance, pistol in hand. But then, as the doorknob was turning to allow entry for the armed intruders, despite her weight and girth, Harley lunged at the door with a meaty push kick, sending the thug at the door flying!

From there, Harley swiftly leapt from the room, heading straight for the downed goon! And with heaving around her own heft, the heavyset harlequin launched her full weight down upon the creep, with him only screaming, "Wait-!!"

*SQUISH!*

*CRUNCH!*

And with a cacophony of organic stomach-churning noises, the thug that she first assaulted had his entire ribcage and torso region pulverized from a 572 pound heavyset Harley Quinn, with the man's insides turned into a mashed red paste. Harley on the other hand, looked fine as ever, promptly standing up from the bloodied mess she unleashed, only to cheerfully quip, "Holee-Fracturolee! Who knew havin' such a fat ass can be so effective?"

"HOLY FUCK!! She killed Ritchie!" Another thug exclaimed, who was only three doors down the hall from where you and Harley rushed out, only to be joined by several more of his buddies soon afterwards. Quickly, you slammed the door behind you on the way out, to which Dr. Miharu promptly locked it to prevent unwanted entry.

From there, another set of goons approached from the right side of the hallway, as Harley wiped a bit of the residue blood from her red and black harlequin panties, which inadvertently made her abundantly plump shelf of a butt jiggle and wobble some in response, where she then looked at the pack of thugs, a devilishly Cheshire-esque grin appearing on her full lips whilst she loudly answered, "Well, what's it gonna be, boys?! Stool, or my big fat caboose?!"

"I'd back off if I were you, dumbasses! Or do you want to end up just like your buddy over here?" You impulsively interjected, threatening for the idiots before you and Harley to back off before things got extremely dicey. Of course, noting how their fists were clenching against some of their weapons and possible teeth grinding on their part, it was looking like they were going to be too stubborn and prideful to even think about backing down, where the first thug then impulsively yelled, "...Fuck this shit! Just kill them all!!"

And with that, he rushed at you with murderous intent in his gaze, crowbar in hand, raised high and ready to strike! However, as if acting on mere killer instinct, you swiftly aimed the pistol at one of his legs and fired off a round at his kneecap, causing him to collapse onto the floor in agonizing pain, as you then shot him in the head, killing the man. But from there, like a series of falling dominoes, the rest of the thugs proceeded to launch their assault upon you and the obese Harley Quinn, with Harley only quipping, "This is gonna be fun!"

And just like something straight out of the Deadpool movies, what followed shortly afterwards was what can only be described as "Beautiful Symphonic Chaos". While you took the group on the right side of the hallway with techniques right out of John Wick's playbook, Harley confronted the rest on the left, swinging away with the metallic stool along with her own brand of heavyset gymnastics, leaping from one of the walls, catapulting herself towards one of the thugs, and performing (ironically enough) a move ripped straight out Super Mario 64, using her girth and quarter-ton weight to practically squash the goon underneath her chalk-white billowing buttocks.

Fortunately, the momentum was more than enough to cause her to bounce right back up onto her own feet shortly after rendering the man's spinal column into bony splinters, as she continued her assault on the preceding thugs before her, with you fighting alongside her.

Eventually, when it was all said and done...
