1553322223322223232223222222133121112111.content:
[Hello, everyone! Vocal here! If you're interested in the exploits of Dr. Miharu Endo and Nurse Takumi Hara, go check out Dr-Black-Jack over on his DeviantArt page! (https://www.deviantart.com/dr-black-jack...) Anywho, onto the next chapter at hand!]

Chaos.

Unadulterated. Symphonic. Chaos.

To describe the scene before you and the substantially heftier Harley Quinn, the most apt description to sum it all up would be "Slaughter".

Beaten, bruised, and dismembered remains of what were once the chorus of thugs that the two of you assaulted laid scattered across a large portion of the hallway. Some slumped up against the walls, sparsely riddled with bullet-holes. Some had parts of their bodies appearing as if they were fatally crushed by a quarter-ton anvil dropped from three stories up. But as you rolled your neck some to get a kink or two out, holding a pistol with an obvious smoking barrel, Harley on the other hand, appeared to be explicitly rejuvenated, possibly from being allowed to let loose, as she arched her back, outstretching her chubby arms towards the ceiling in the process.

"*relieved sigh* Ho-lee Slaughter-olee! We sure did a number on 'em! Didn't we, Puddin'?" She chirped, her voice obviously showing how cathartic it was to kick some ass. But whilst you look over the carnage splayed out all around you, you couldn't help but honestly agree with the hefty harlequin, to which you ejected the emptied magazine from your pistol to then re-insert a new one, only to look back at your heavyset girlfriend and calmly retorted, "Can't say I disagree, Harl. Unfortunately, now we got a bunch of dead pricks who won't be spilling the beans on who sent them anytime soon."

But then, as if on a coincidental cue, the two of you soon suddenly heard some muffled groaning and grunting noises coming from one of the piles of deceased cronies, only to inevitably witness one of the thugs trying to painfully claw his way out from under his dead cohorts.

"Nnnh...Egh! Fuckin' Ellis...C'mon!" He grunted, trying to push one or two corpses that have fallen onto his person, struggling to get himself free from the carcasses. However, that would only be the least of his worries, as Harley lumbered over towards the thug, yanking him free by his jacket collar, which showed how deceptively strong she was as she chirped, "Ooooh! Look what we have 'ere, Puddin'? We got ourselves a live one!"

"Gaah!! You fuckin' fatass bitch!! You're gonna pay! Ya hear me!?!" He yelled, groaning from the physical pain he was experiencing, realizing who pulled him out of the pile, only to then feel a meaty punt kick sent straight at his lower jaw, momentarily stunning him. Meanwhile, Harley forcefully propped him up on one of the waiting room chairs, with you following close behind her and her substantial buttocks. From there, getting on the creative side of things, she yanked an extension cord out from the nearby wall, using it as a sort of makeshift restraint, binding the bastard's arms to the arms of the chair in the process, and tying it all up with the cord outlet only jutting out from the wiring.

Thankfully, with all the commotion that occurred within the past ten minutes, you and Harley had the entire hallway to yourselves, especially with what was coming next...

"Prop his legs up." Harley quipped, as you did what she was requesting, which came in the form of propping the restrained man's legs up on a nearby chair you pulled in. From there, you hoisted his feet up onto the seat of the chair, to which Harley tossed you another appliance cord, still attached to a table lamp, where you then began to bind the goon's legs together by the ankles. Obviously, you figured out what exactly the heavyset harlequin was doing right now, as the restrained bruised thug spat out a bloodied tooth that was forcibly knocked loose during the brawl. Putting on the tough guy persona, he chuckled, "Heh! If ya think I'm gonna snitch, then you're outta luck!"

"Oh we know..." Harley retorted, circling around him with this predatory twinkle in her baby blue eyes, akin to an overweight lioness toying with her prey. From there, in an almost mocking demeanor, she propped a foot atop one of the thug's legs, administering a slight pressure against his limb, to which she continued, "...However, since you an' yer buddies interrupted me on an important day, you're gonna wish you was dead when I'm done wit' ya."

Although, despite her gullible ditzy behavior in the comics, you undoubtedly had to admit that Harley can certainly be intimidating when push comes to shove. But still, the thug didn't cave in from the bad cop routine, so you approached the goon, gun in hand, only to then question, "I'm going to only ask you this once, dipshit. And if you still got enough brain matter to think for yourself, you'll give us what we want. Who sent you?"

"Mister None-Of-Your-Damn-Business, that's who!" He snapped, spitting a wad of bloodied spit in your face, a bloodied toothy grin spread across his face from his tough guy act. Of course, in response to such retaliation, you slowly wiped the blood-soaked spit from your face, figuring that he wasn't going to talk so easily. So, as you then gazed towards the rotund Harley Quinn, who looked just about ready to administer some pain on the stubborn fool, as you then gave her the go-ahead as you sternly answered, "...I think someone needs an attitude adjustment. Harley? Would you do the personal honors?"

"*giggle* It would be my earthly delight, Puddin'!" She chirped, a cheekily toothy grin appearing on her somewhat chubby face, to which she then waddled down the hallway, stopping only when she reached the fifth doorway down. Though, you had this unmistakable gnawing feeling in the back of your brain, as if it was preemptively warning you that what came next would be very messy, so you instinctively took a few steps away from the restrained goon, a single tear of sweat running down his forehead. Of course, he had every right to feel a little hot under the collar, especially with what Harley was about to do very soon.

Looking down the hall to where she was standing, despite her overall girth and corpulence, Harley took off running with surprising speed for someone of her heft, where she then contorted her blubbery form to commence several cartwheel-like front-flips, with her launching herself on the third or fourth flip, sending herself flying straight toward the faux bridge that was the thug's bound legs, to which she curled her body into a pseudo-cannonball position while she excitedly (albeit randomly) yelled, "Sok-A-La-Ho-Ya!!"

*CRACK!!!*

*CRUNCH!!!*

*SQUELCH!!!*

"GAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHH!!!!!" The thug shrieked, screaming at the very top of his lungsupon Harley's quarter-ton physique making excruciatingly painful contact with his legs, only for them to internally shatter and splinter upon impact. In reaction, you nearly gagged from the sight, but you swiftly recovered from the gory display, as Harley gracefully dismounted from the thug's bent-in lower limbs, landing on the floor in a victorious gymnastic pose, pudgy arms outstretched above her head at an ascending angle whilst she exclaimed, "Ta-Da!!"
1553322223322223232223222222133121112111.title: Leg-Busting & Hard Knocks

1553322223322223232223222222133121112111.content:
[Hello, everyone! Vocal here! If you're interested in the exploits of Dr. Miharu Endo and Nurse Takumi Hara, go check out Dr-Black-Jack over on his DeviantArt page! (https://www.deviantart.com/dr-black-jack...) Anywho, onto the next chapter at hand!]

"YOU FUCKIN' BITCH!!!!!! You fuckin' fucked up my legs!!!!!!" The thug screamed, his adrenaline reaching a fever pitch from his patellae, femurs, tibiae, and fibulae being bent and fractured in ways they weren't supposed to. Now, you weren't a medical professional, but you knew what broken legs looked like, as you can see several bits of leg-bone jutting through the man's flesh on the back of his legs. Anyway, as Harley dusted her abundant buttocks off with a free hand, she turned her head a little to eye at the now crippled goon, which easily shut him up, as you then rushed at him, hand on his throat, as you obviously lost some of your patience and angrily roared, "Your Boss!! WHO SENT YOU!?!?!"

"I DON'T KNOW!!! I don't fuckin' know, you bastard!!!" He impulsively screamed, only for you to angrily punch him square in the face, busting his nose and several more of his teeth in the process. With your instincts burning through your patience like an explosive fuse, you swiftly pulled out your pistol, pressing the barrel against the skin of his forehead. Luckily, the brutal intimidation tactics seemed to be quite effective, as you and Harley then suddenly heard the bruised and crippled meathead abruptly squeal, "Okayokay!! I'll talk! S-Sionis...R...R-Roman Sionis sent us."

And just like that, the very name the man spoke of hit you like a ringing gong.

Roman Sionis...

To anyone else, they wouldn't know two shits as to who he is. But you've read a few Batman comics and played most of the Arkham games to distinctly recognize who the bound goon was prattling on about.

Though, he was more well-known by his more intimidating criminal alias...

Black Mask.

In the comics, Black Mask is one of the most prominent figures in Gotham City's seedy underbelly of organized crime. Once a member of Gotham's social elite, he was the president of the makeup company, Janus Cosmetics. ...That is, until Roman's own poor business sense inevitably led into a series of bad decisions that ultimately destroyed his reputation as a legitimate businessman. Humiliated, he sought revenge against those he perceived to be responsible for his own misfortunes. To that end, he defiled his father's grave, and carved an ebony skull mask from his father's own coffin, becoming the criminal Black Mask, and developing his own criminal organization called "The False Face Society".

Sure, Black Mask wasn't a household name like The Joker, Penguin, Riddler, Two-Face, Catwoman, Bane, or any of the other members of Batman's Rogues Gallery, but he can certainly hold his own as a messed up individual worthy of a sentence in Arkham Asylum. After all, from what you remember from the video game, Batman: Arkham Origins, Sionis was known to be both paranoid (given his notoriety as a crime boss and the baggage that comes along with it), as well as being rather proficient in torturing people for any sort of valuable information, even going as far as to garner a sick and depraved pleasure for making people endure physical suffering, whether it be by cutting off a guy's fingers with a pair of rusty shears, or thrusting a still-burning cigarette into someone's eye.

However, whilst you and the heavyset Harley were preoccupied with interrogating the now crippled thug, Dr. Miharu Endo unlocked the door, easily noting at how there was no longer any signs of combat within the hallway, only to soon come across the grisly spectacle before her. Fortunately for her, she didn't gag from the sight, but she found the smell of human carcasses a tad bothersome.

And with that, figuring that the crony wasn't going to be divulging any more crucial information, you swiftly pistol-whipped the man right in the left temple, thus knocking him completely out cold. Of course, both you and Harley soon realized that the good doctor was present before the two of you, to which she then calmly questioned, "...I'm assuming the man you were interrogating had some answers you deemed satisfactory?"

"*sigh* Sadly, no. Only more bad news I'm afraid, Dr. Endo." You bluntly answered, obviously a tad frustrated at how you now had two prominent figures of Gotham's criminal underworld gunning for the self-inflicted bounty on Harley's head. Of course, Harley didn't seem fazed by the obvious revelation whatsoever, given that she was sorta expecting something like this to occur when she severed her ties with the Joker and hooked up with you. From there, it was Harley's turn to speak, placing her hands upon her wide burgeoning hips, only to then answer, "Yeah. An' 'ere I thought that we wouldn't have ta worry 'bout anyone else besides Blubberpot."

Obviously, Dr. Miharu gave you both a somewhat confused expression as to who the hefty harlequin was referring to exactly, especially since you figured she doesn't seem to be the type to keep tabs on the head honchos of various criminal organizations, unlike a certain grey and black-clad Dark Knight. So, in turn, you quickly reprimanded this by calmly explaining, "...She's referring to a guy she knows back in Gotham City. His name's Oswald Cobblepot, though in certain shady circles, he's better known as The Penguin, due to his short stature and beak-like nose."

"I appreciate the explanation, Mr. (Name). Though, judging from your behaviors, I can only hazard a guess that there is some "Bad Blood" between Ms. Quinzel and this Penguin individual you speak of..." Miharu retorted, only to soon be joined in company by her equally plump assistant, Nurse Takumi Hara. Though, from the look on her face, she appeared a tad unnerved by the overall carnage laid bare in the hallway, looking as if she was about to vomit out her lunch, but she thankfully was able to hold it in by performing several meditative deep breaths. Then again, she IS a nurse, after all, so it kinda came with the territory from such a profession. In turn, Miharu repositioned herself to overlook her assistant, placing her dark-skinned hands upon the pink-haired nurse's chubby shoulders in reassurance that the worst had come to pass, to which she complied with a thankful nod.

"So... What happens now?" Takumi timidly questioned, bringing forth a fairly valid question in the process.

"Good question..." You subconsciously replied, experiencing this uneasy feeling that the four of you were being watched, your gaze peering out a nearby window towards a rooftop across the street from the hospital. Somehow, you couldn't help but think that your own developing sense of paranoia was starting to make sense. However, it ultimately ended with you snapping your gaze back towards the heavyset doctor and her equally-sized assistant, to which you then continued, "...But it looks like we have to postpone our appointment with you until further notice, Doctor. After all, they'll think you and your nurse are accomplices if Penguin, Black Mask, or any other scumbag from Gotham come knocking."

"*sigh*...As much as I despise leaving an appointment unfinished, it seems we have little choice in the matter, considering the prior situation we've found ourselves in." Miharu reluctantly but inevitably agreed, easily noting the situation that her patient has found herself in, so it only made sense in a pragmatic sensibility to postpone any future appointments with the hefty harlequin until this matter was ultimately resolved. And with that, you and Harley assisted the medical duo in gathering up the necessary documents before heading back to Coney Island. Luckily, it only took a few brief minutes to gather them up, as Miharu stored them in a secure binder for later examination. And as the four of you proceeded towards the exit of the Brookdale University Hospital, you and Harley prepared to say farewell to the medical duo from Japan, as Harley (Surprisingly enough) gave Takumi her personal phone number, obviously becoming rather fond of the pink-haired nurse as a friend.
1553322223322223232223222222133121112111.title: Harley Quinn, Gotham's Most Wanted

choices: From there, Ivy got the hypnotized man to talk.
Then, Ivy momentarily stood up to look over Harley.
Actually, something else happened instead...
1553322223322223232223222222133121112111.content:
And as you went your separate ways, you and Harley trekked back towards the refuge that was the apartment complex on Coney Island, with Harley putting her slightly plump bleach white hands behind the back of her head in a casually relaxed manner, to which she whimsically quipped, "...Y'know, Puddin'? I think I'm gonna like seein' those two, don'cha think so?"

"Glad to see you have a good opinion of them, Harl..." You retorted, obviously glad to see that Dr. Miharu Endo and Nurse Takumi Hara left quite the positive impression on the heavyset clown girl, just noting how the pigtailed woman was absentmindedly whistling to herself while she was at it. Of course, your mind returned to the current problem at hand:

The prospect that the Penguin, Black Mask, and any other criminal from the infamous Gotham City now had their sights set on turning in that bounty on Harley Quinn's head.

Yeah. This won't be easy, that's for sure!

So, as the two of you neared the apartment complex, you continued speaking towards Harley, with your concern on full display, as you then answered, "...Though, to be honest, I'm actually a little concerned as to who else will have the gusto to go after that bounty on your head, Harl. I mean, first Penguin, now we gotta worry about Black Mask gunning for us as well. I mean no disrespect, but even if we have your Gang of Harleys and Ivy on our side, we're still probably outmanned and outgunned."

"...I'm aware a' that, sweetie. Which is why we're headin' back ta our place an' cook up a plan." She retorted, noting your reasonable points for concern regarding the current state of affairs. Then again, this was something she seemed to be quite accustomed to, most likely due to the numerous turf wars between the main factions in Gotham's underworld, whether it came from the gangs led by the likes of The Joker, Black Mask, Two-Face, Penguin, or even "The Old Guard" of Gotham City's centuries-long history of organized crime, such as the Falcone Crime Family or the Maroni Crime Family. Needless to say, despite the city being watched over by the mysterious vigilante known only as The Batman (along with his numerous allies), Gotham City would always bear the stigma of being a metropolis drenched in the blackened oil that is organized crime.

And yet, as the apartment complex was beginning to come into clear view, you knew that the two of you had an ace in the hole:

Poison Ivy

Sure, she wasn't outright intimidating in the slightest due to her seductive wiles. However, like the old adage, "Every Rose Has It's Thorns", Ivy is considered a powerhouse in DC Comics, with her powerful ability to control plant life like the Pied Piper charming a swarm of rats with a mere tune. Hell, even the male criminals of Gotham knew not to get on the Human-Plant hybrid's bad side, especially given her tremendous power over plants with lethal force. Though, aside from her precious "Babies", the only other living thing to be so close to Pamela Isley's heart was the very same quarter-ton, pale-skinned harlequin that is your girlfriend in this reality.

Suffice to say, "Hell hath no fury like a woman's scorn".

However, as soon as the building's main entrance came into clear view, the melancholy of the day was gouged out in the form of a man outfitted in a ski mask and body armor, screaming as he fell hard upon the spiked metal fence with a fleshy *CRUNCH!!* in the process. Of course, the scene was made all the more gruesome and gory when the man's body split in two from being impaled and ruptured by the cold hard metallic spikes adorning the fence. Obviously, the handful of tourists ran away in panicked droves at the sight, whilst you and Harley were nonchalant at the situation, just as the heavyset harlequin soon looked up and quickly noticed a large vine slithering back inside the building, a cheeky grin appearing on her face as she quipped, " Looks like Ivy's been havin' fun without us!"

Figuring that Ivy was most likely fighting off some armed men, you quickly rushed inside the apartment, with Harley in hot pursuit as well, despite the contradiction that is her overall weight and girth. Once inside, you leapt over and under some of the tenants, whilst all of them instinctively moved out of the way when Harley made her way through as well. Although you didn't have some nifty superpowers like X-Ray Vision and such, your mind painted a clear enough picture of what was occurring on the top floor, just as the two of you rushed up the final flight of stairs, finally reaching the double-door entrance to Harley's condo. After all, she IS the Landlady of this establishment, so the tenants kinda expected crazy shit to happen given Harley's track record for such shenanigans to occur.

However, once you opened the doors, handgun drawn as a precaution, you slowly sweeped the area, checking if there were any stragglers, or rather...what was left of them.

Various vines strewn about the place, violently restraining the incapacitated cronies against the walls, akin to something straight out of an Aliens movie, minus the Facehuggers and Xenomorphs. Doing a head count, you counted a total of sixteen thugs out for the count, making the masked thug whose entrails were dangling from the fence outside number seventeen. Of course, Harley on the other hand, couldn't help but be bewildered and amazed at her gal pal's murderously botanical handiwork, a chuckle coming from her mouth as she quipped, "*whistle* Talk about pest control! Hey, Pammy! Ya in 'ere?"

"...I'm in the Greenhouse!" Her voice echoed, confirming her current status to you and the rotund Harley, which sounded like she was a few rooms away from where you and Harley were at. In response, Harley cheekily skipped on over to where her favorite Human-Plant hybrid was currently located, which caused her flabby heavyset physique to wobble and jiggle from such movement, with her ballooned buttocks, bulbous belly, and hefty breasts being the most jiggly. Meanwhile, you followed close behind your eccentric girlfriend, holstering your pistol in the process. Though, you figured that when Ivy meant "Greenhouse", she was obviously referring to the large room filled with several fully grown trees planted in the area, especially since it was where Harley's little furry companions reside.

Eventually, after seeing much of what had gone down while you and Harley were at the hospital, the two of you soon reached the Greenhouse Room, seeing what you can call "The Epicenter" of the plant-based carnage that the famed Poison Ivy had unleashed upon her attackers, as you and Harley soon glimpsed upon the infamous Pamela Isley, who was currently toying with her now captured prey, tied down by an orchestra of Amazonian vines.

However, upon closer inspection, the man wearing the ski-mask looked as if he was in a complete trance, most likely due to one of Poison Ivy's unique abilities; The ability to secrete a specialized pheromone that seduces practically anyone who gets a whiff of such invisible fumes, which was one of the reasons why Ivy personally gave Harley a special herb that rendered the clown girl immune to Ivy's pheromones, along with giving her the added benefit of having near-superhuman agility.

choices: A playing card with an attached microchip and a note.

1553322223322223232223222222133121112111.content:
"I wouldn't recommend coming any closer, (Name), unless you want to end up being under my influence as well." Ivy calmly snapped, with her concentration currently focused on meticulously altering her captive's brain chemistry to make him more easily susceptible to her pheromones, which was going quite smoothly. Of course, taking her word for granted, you stayed where you currently stood, whilst Harley casually waddled her way over to her favorite gal pal, planting a kiss on the hybrid's green-skinned cheek and cheerfully quipped, "Heya, Red! Hope ya didn't have too much fun without us."

"*giggle* Don't worry, Harleen. You didn't miss much, fortunately." Ivy retorted, enjoying some of the plush softness that Harley now had on her overall physique, feeling how Harley's much heftier breasts and prominent apron belly press and smoosh against her own tightly smooth back and perky behind. A few moments later, the heavyset harlequin then reluctantly ended the loving embrace to allow Ivy to work her botanical magic on the pinned down thug, who almost looked like he was in a moronic stupor, complete with a sliver of drool on his lips. Suffice to say, you honestly weren't sure if this was an adverse side effect from someone being under the influence of Ivy's pheromones, or if said pheromones were killing enough of his brain cells to make him have a much lower IQ.

Either way, you've seen enough Batman media to know when to not get in Ivy's way, just as the red-haired hybrid began to work her botanical charms upon the heavily restrained gunman, to which she whispered seductive words into the man's ear and flirted, "Now then, my big, strong, man~. Would you be kind enough to tell me who I should thank for the visit by you lovely boys~?"

Obviously, you figured that she was attempting to lull the crony into a deep hypnotic trance, whilst you instinctively covered both your nose and mouth with one hand as to avert inhaling the hypnotic pheromones yourself. Of course, due to the herbs that Ivy gave her long ago, Harley was essentially immune to the pheromones, taking in a nonchalant whiff of the fumes through her nostrils, and then exhaling it through her mouth, to which she cheekily joked, "Mmm! Smells like strawberries!"

"...Uuuugh...*drunk chuckle*...Sure, seeexy...why...why not..." The man drunkenly answered to Ivy, the pheromones making his speech patterns more akin to a royally plastered drunkard, his head moving and bobbing about in a slurred manner. In response, Ivy's lips contoured into a smugly cathartic grin, seeing how her alluring pheromones were still quite effective as ever, seeing the invisible fumes taking it's toll on the hardened man's psyche. And much like a stereotypical femme fatale, Ivy then used her seductive womanly charm and wiles to lull him even more into a false sense of security, just as the man then drunkenly elaborated, "...*drunk hiccup*...*drunk chuckle*...Thish...Thish guy...*drunk hiccup*...shent me an'...the boys...*drunk hiccup*...callsh himshelf...Mad Hatter..."

"Are ya serious?! Tetchie's afta me too?!" Harley gasped, as you noted how surprised the hefty harlequin was upon hearing such information. Fortunately, due to playing both Arkham City and Arkham Origins, you instantly knew who they were referring to:

Jervis Tetch, The Mad Hatter.

For the uninitiated, Mad Hatter was one of the most enduring villains of Batman's Rogues Gallery, not to mention one of the more delusional psychos of Gotham City. In fact, Tetch actually believes he is the living incarnation of the Mad Hatter character from Lewis Carroll's most famous literary work, Alice's Adventures In Wonderland, some depictions going as far as to have him being diagnosed with schizophrenia, such as with the Arkham series. But aside from his self-inflated delusions, what made the Mad Hatter so dangerous was his expertise as a scientist, using a mix of technological mind-control devices and psychoactive drugs in order to influence and manipulate the minds of his victims, sometimes getting them to think they're characters from Alice In Wonderland, with kidnapped girls often being forced into the role of the titular character, Alice. And yet, he was one of the least physically threatening criminals in the Dark Knight's Rogues Gallery, often being portrayed as a man standing in at a diminutive 4 feet 11 inches, with an abnormally large cranium and unusually large teeth.

But in a few brief milliseconds, your mind had relapsed in order for you to get you caught up to speed on this version of Jervis Tetch, complete with giving you a small nosebleed from the faux brain hemorrhage in the aftermath. Instinctively, you looked back towards Ivy and the heavyset Harley, with a notably concerned tone in your voice and questioned, "Wait, isn't he that little person who thinks he's a character from Alice In Wonderland?"

"He is, except...he doesn't hire meatheads like Bozo over 'ere." Harley retorted, about as confused as you were, given that she attended one or two appointments with Jervis Tetch when she was still a psychiatrist working at Arkham Asylum, to which it was Ivy's turn to speak as she quipped, "In fact, he's more likely to just drug and mind control those men."

Upon hearing what the two Gotham City Sirens just explained to you, the gears in your brain spun on overdrive, to which you then calmly answered, "...Check under his ski mask."

In response, both Ivy and Harley briefly eyed at one another in realization, where the Human-Plant hybrid then swiftly commanded a vine to snap the gunman's neck, thus killing him in the process. And just to add an R Rating to the situation, said vine violently ripped off the deceased crony's head with sickening effect. And with that, the plant presented the crudely decapitated head to it's mistress, to which Ivy then pulled off the ski mask from the head.

In turn, this revealed something that thickens the plot by a good few inches...
1553322223322223232223222222133121112111.title: A Hypnotic Remedy

1553322223322223232223222222133121112111.content:
Upon removing the ski mask from the man's decapitated head, the very first thing that stood out the most was a strange playing card held in place by the man's left upper earlobe. From there, Ivy plucked the card from the merc's head, personally expecting it to see if it was the genuine article, only to then see the bloodied microchip attached to the card. Ironically, the playing card was a Queen of Hearts, obviously symbolizing the insanely mad Red Queen from Alice In Wonderland. Now realizing it was indeed the real deal, Ivy spoke up towards you and Harley as she answered, "...Yep, this is Tetch's handiwork alright. He always was obsessed with that delusion of his."

"*annoyed sigh* So I'm guessin' he wants ta do somethin' kinky wit' me?" Harley groaned, lightly tugging at her iconic pigtails in annoyance with her chubby bleach white hands, eyes darting up towards the ceiling in some semblance of frustration. However, that would only be the least of her concerns, as you soon quickly noticed something put inside the ski mask, to which you then spoke toward Ivy and quipped, "Let me see that ski mask."

Just like that, Ivy commanded a vine to hand you the discarded ski mask, to which you shoved your hand inside the accessory, feeling a flat smooth substance embedded on the inside of the mask. With a swift series of hand movements, you inevitably pulled out a sheet of paper. Sure, it was slightly wrinkled and somewhat moist from the sweat, but it was still readable by most people. But after briefly reading a few sentences from the note, that feeling in your gut told you that this was bad news, to which you handed it over towards Harley whilst you sternly said, "Harley, you need to read this."

From there, shortly after letting go of her pigtails, Harley voluntarily grabbed the note from you, icking her tongue out in mild disgust from the soiled sheet of paper, only to then read the penmanship as it disclosed the following:

"Oh Frabjous Day, Callooh Callay! Our Harley Quinn's here, it's time to play! Hope you not forgot about moi, Big and Beautiful? For I have a treat for you! A special extravaganza, just for you! Should you decline, a precious member of yours will have quite the tumble! Come to Queen's Dockyards, for you're late! Late! For a very important date!"

"Sincerely,
Jervis Tetch"

Upon reading the entirety of the message, Harley had this expression of solid frustration and mild annoyance, as one of her lower eyelids twitched in an unnerved manner. Though, you couldn't exactly blame her for the irritability she was experiencing. After all, women who were currently pregnant tend to have more high-strung mood swings, and it definitely seemed more apt when it came to Harley, given her known state of mental health throughout the comics and other media. From there, she quickly turned the message over to see it's back, only to soon realize what the Mad Hatter meant by "A precious member of her's will have quite the tumble":

A photograph of Sy Borgman's great-niece, Hannah Borgman AKA Hanuquinn, currently bound and gagged in a distressed state.

"DAMMIT!! He's got Sy's niece!" Harley lashed out, jumping up and violently stomping her full quarter-ton weight down upon one of the deceased thugs in obvious frustration, causing the body to implode with several sickening noises in the process. However, Ivy was quick enough to repriman Harley's temper as she quipped, "Temper, Harleen."

"Oh hush! How was I supposed ta know Tetchie wants a piece a' me as well?!" The heavyset harlequin snapped, exhaling a deep breath to calm herself down a little. However, it showed how peeved she was at Jervis Tetch for such a low blow as this, let alone involving the kidnapping of a member of her Gang of Harleys. Though, you had a sneaking suspicion that this wasn't the case, as you spoke up toward the rotund clown girl and answered, "With all due respect, sweetie, I don't think he seems to be interested in the bounty on your head."

"...He's got a point. From what little time we've spent with him back at the Asylum, we both know he doesn't seem like the type to be interested in making a profit." Ivy acknowledged, agreeing with you on Jervis Tetch's modus operandi, given what little time they've spent interacting with the diminutive man back in Arkham Asylum. But as your eyes noted how Harley was clenching her plump hands into a tightened pair of fists, almost to the point of drawing blood from her palms, she soon replied back towards you and Ivy, only retorting, "I know. But right now, Tetchie's made things REALLY personal!"

"I'm guessing you're going to just waltz right into where he's at, even though it could be a trap?" You questioned, figuring that Harley wasn't in the mood for concocting a decent plan at the moment. Of course, that was only a moot point by now, as you and Ivy witness the heavyset harlequin rummage through one of the weapon lockers, her abundantly large chalk-white buttcheeks looking just a tad more prominent underneath her current choice of attire, which was now her preferred ensemble of red and black polyester booty shorts, an almost ill-fitting red and black corset, a set of red and black fingerless gloves, and a pair of red and black converse sneakers with white soles and shoelaces. Currently, she was straddling her signature two-handed mallet upon her rounded shoulders, with an equally effective baseball bat and one of her comically designed handguns holstered on her thickly meaty left leg, looking just about ready to crack some skulls in the process as she chirped, "Ya read my mind, Puddin'!"
1553322223322223232223222222133121112111.title: Frabjous Day, Callooh Callay

1553322223322223232223222222133121112111.content:
== McKinley Dockyards ==
== Terrace Bay, Queens Borough ==
== New York, New York ==
== 10:23 pm EST ==

Night had already fallen on the proclaimed "City That Never Sleeps", as Harley lumbered across the vacant alleyways of the McKinley Dockyards, mallet slung over her plump shoulders, whilst she whistled a brief tune to stave off her own boredom.

However, due to the current situation at hand involving the kidnapped Hanuquinn, you weren't exactly content with sitting on the sidelines and, as Harley put it "Letting The Bad Guys Sort This Out", so you've decided to ghost her as your vigilante persona, Crosshairs. Although she'll be crossed with you when this blows over, you figured Harley will thank you for this later when she felt like doing so.

And yet, underneath the body armor and bullet-resistant helmet, you couldn't help but experience the tell-tale goosebumps. Then again, you couldn't blame your body for behaving in such a manner. After all, this was the first time that you would consciously confront a member of Batman's Rogues Gallery, so it was undoubtedly a big deal. Sure, you were tortured by Harley's ex-boyfriend, The Joker, but that was merely a pre-fabricated memory to coincide with your existence in the DC Universe. But as you covertly perched yourself on a nearby warehouse rooftop, with a definitively clear view of Harley from above, you soon heard Ivy's voice over the internal comms installed in your helmet, as she voiced her concerns and said, "Do you even realize who you're going up against?"

"...Yes, I'm well aware of who I'm confronting, Ivy. But I'm not gonna sit and watch as Mad Hatter does God-knows-what to Harley. You should know that by now." You answered, the voice changer equipped around your neck altering your voice enough to make you more intimidating. Your eyes were currently fixated on Harley, and not just on her rather obvious adipose-filled assets and ta-tas, as her abundant buttcheeks bounced and buoyed within the near skin-tight confines of her smooth red and black booty shorts. In a casual gesture, she casually kicked a small can with one of her converse sneakers, obviously in some form of maintaining the stimuli in her brain, where you soon overheard her talking to herself thanks to the helmet's internal software, to which she muttered, "...Where are ya, Tetchie?"

However, her question was soon answered rather quickly when she turned the corner of one of the warehouses, only to soon gaze upon the main entrance of the adjacent building, complete with a distinctive sight:

A small mob of 28 people all dressed up like denizens of the fictional Wonderland, most likely under the control of the Mad Hatter. The guys had those fancy rabbit masks covering their heads, while all of the women of the group were dressed up as the Red Queen's Card Soldiers. And like said aforementioned soldiers, the costumed women stood in attention, each holding a phony spear, with the spearheads in the shape of Spades, Diamonds, and upside down Hearts.

However, the moment that Harley stood before the entrance to such an obvious trap, the entourage of Wonderland-themed individuals soon began to perform a stiffly choreographed dance, which didn't seem to faze Harley all that much, since she knew how much Jervis wanted to put on a show, to which the female Card Soldiers began to sing in unison as they sung, "You are very cordially - cordially - cordially - You are very cordially - invited to a party!"

From there, the hypnotized men in the rabbit masks soon joined in on the unwilling chorus, only singing, "And it will be a grand affair - grand affair - grand affair - And it will be a grand affair - hosted by the Hatter!"

And then, in an underwhelming finale to the involuntary performance, the female Card Soldiers soon had their turn, topping off the unwary sight before the hefty harlequin as they sang, "We do hope that you can come - you can come - you can come - We do hope that you can come - our beloved Queen of Hearts!"

"*sigh* ...Well, at least Tetchie knows how ta put on a good show." Harley said to herself, as she noticed two of the female Card Soldiers stiffly opened the industrial sliding doors leading into the warehouse, akin to welcoming an important guest of the hour. Meanwhile, back on the rooftop, you watched as Harley calmly waddled her way inside the seemingly derelict building, to which you responded back to Ivy over the comms as you stated, "She's gone through the front entrance. I'm gonna find a way inside and give her some backup."

"Understood. Just...be careful, (Name). Tetch might not look imposing, but it doesn't mean he'll have a few tricks up his coat sleeves." The Human-Plant hybrid explained, obviously as a fair warning to you on what the Mad Hatter was capable of, as you fired up your jetpack and launched yourself toward the warehouse rooftop whilst you answered, "Noted."

=======

Meanwhile, within the depths of the decrepit warehouse, Harley calmly strolled her hefty self deeper into the bowels of the warehouse, behaving so nonchalantly, especially when it came to confronting someone she had some familiarity with. Of course, you stayed out of sight once you've snuck inside via a loose roof hatch, balancing yourself upon the rafters, hoping they were still sturdy enough to support your weight.

But like a theatrical play on Broadway, a series of floodlights started to turn on one by one, which soon revealed a rather peculiar sight, which came in the form of what looked like a crude representation of the interior of the Red Queen's palace, with another group of women dressed up as Card Soldiers, as if they awaited the arrival of the Queen of Hearts. And the centerpiece of the display? Hanuquinn bound and gagged on a scrappy-looking throne, forcibly dressed up as the titular character Alice, dress and blonde wig included. Sy's great-niece violently struggled against her restraints, hoping she'd be able to warn her blubbery boss before it was too late.

In response, Harley sashayed her way towards the captured Hanuquinn, removing the duct tape from the woman's mouth whilst she quipped, "Easy there. I got ya."

From there, shortly after upchucking out a sock from her mouth, Hanuquinn impulsively exclaimed, "It's a trap, boss!!"

And just like that, the moment Hanuquinn spoke, it caused some sort of simultaneous trigger on the hypnotized costumed women to soon slowly surround the two women, brandishing their card-themed spears whilst they cheerfully chanted, "Our Queen - Our Queen - Our Queen has arrived! She's late - She's late - For a very important date! She's not even dressed - for - the - occasion!"

"Oh I'm aware, Hanuquinn." Harley nonchalantly remarked, as she quickly freed her underling with a pocket knife she hid in her bountiful cleavage, while the dozen female Card Soldiers encircled the two of them, until four of them swiftly grabbed Harley by the hem of her red and black booty shorts, yanking the heavyset harlequin away from the costumed Hanuquinn, with the woman helplessly watching as the dozen or so costumed women drag Harley away, to which she could only exclaim, "Boss!"

"I'll be fine! Just get the hell outta 'ere! Go!!" Harley yelled, telling Hanuquinn to worry about herself for the time being, just as one of the Card Soldiers promptly drugged Harley with a handkerchief dipped in chloroform so she'd fall unconscious. Now freed from her confines, Hanuquinn tried to rush off to rescue her boss, only to be hindered by some of the rabbit mask-wearing men in the process, who sang an eerie tune as they sang, "You are not invited - invited - invited - You are not invited - to the Hatter's party!"

Seeing that now was a perfect time to intervene, you leapt from the rafters and administered a downward kick against the hypnotized man closest to Hanuquinn, violently knocking him to the floor. From there, you stood before the rabbit masked men, dual pistols in hand, with a boot firmly placed on the KO'd man's sternum, you then did your best intimidating voice, with the voice changer amplifying the effect as you growled, "Not tonight, dipshits."
1553322223322223232223222222133121112111.title: A Prelude To A Grand Affair

choices: "Yeah. I think they took her through that door."
"Sorry. I was too busy beating their asses."
Meanwhile, back with Harley, her situation was getting tense...
1553322223322223232223222222133121112111.content:
Meanwhile, whilst you and Hanuquinn were currently preoccupied with taking down the entranced Wonderland-themed underlings, Harley on the other hand, was currently dealing with her own set of problems at the moment...

Eventually, the chloroform slowly but surely began to wear off, as Harley began to regain consciousness. However, instead of seeing her beloved and Hanuquinn, her slowly dilating vision soon revealed a long table decorated with various tea sets, with her being accompanied by less than a dozen hypnotized "guests", as Jervis Tetch would politely call them.

And speaking of the diminutive criminal mastermind, sitting on the opposite end of the table, with a large floodlight illuminating his silhouette, there sat the man known as Jervis Tetch, better known as the Mad Hatter. Currently, much like his fictional counterpart, he was sipping on a cup of tea he brewed in his spare time, seemingly unaware of the awakened Harley Quinn.

The first instinct that came to mind was to check her surroundings, as Harley soon noticed how her previous outfit was replaced with a massive elegant-looking black and red dress that would fit perfectly on the circus fat lady. "*sigh* Figured Tetchie would dress me as da Red Queen." She mentally noted, as she tried to dismount herself from the chair, only to soon realize her wrists were bound to the armrests via an absurd amount of duct tape.

Though, she instantly ceased all movement the moment she heard the Hatter's voice, a voice befitting of the man's short stature, where he whimsically quipped, "...More tea, My Queen?"

"Tetchie... What's goin' on?" She questioned, obviously a little confused. Though, it was certainly an understandable feeling, considering how much progress Tetch made in getting this elaborate trap all set up in such a short period of time. However, noticing the current behavior and mannerisms the short-statured man had adopted, Harley could already tell that his Mad Hatter delusions are in control of the once-timid individual. Of course, the Hatter soon spoke back towards the dressed harlequin and chirped, "*chuckle* What a question. Isn't it obvious, My Queen? We're having a tea party!"

"Doesn't feel like one ta me, Tetchie..." Harley muttered to herself, to which her delusional captor soon whimsically spoke to his entranced attendees and cheerfully quipped, "Oh, she's so confused, maybe I should..."

"...Well, it's simple really. I planted a teeny tiny little idea in your head. A sort of remote hypnotic suggestion. Very complicated stuff, my dear. I'm sure you wouldn't understand but as you can see, it worked." He continued, just as Harley soon felt something gently attached to the side of her cranium, hence the feeling like her brain was swimming in a bad mix of gravy and honey. And as he exhaled a giddy chuckle, Tetch couldn't help but brag, to which he randomly hopped up onto the table to announce his proclamation whilst he whimsically boasted, "Well, you're mine now. You're mine and there's nothing that Cobblepot can do about it!"

And yet, despite being well accustomed to being in proximity to maddened egos like Joker and Mad Hatter, Harley couldn't help but feel a little unnerved at how Tetch was behaving for the time being. In turn, she mentally hoped, "(Name), where da hell are ya? Now's a good time ta be a Knight in Shinin' Arma'!"

== Meanwhile... ==

Back over in the abandoned lobby of the warehouse, you and Hanuquinn had just finished up with giving the costumed underlings the ever-loving shit beaten out of them, as you violently judo throw one of the rabbit mask-wearing men right into an old oil drum, sending it clanging to the concrete floor in the process.

With the immediate threats taken care of, you looked back towards Hanuquinn, who had just finally finished annihilating one of the attackers with a rusty steel pipe, using it akin to a makeshift war club. Suffice to say, you don't blame her for such overkill, since she was involuntarily kidnapped by the Mad Hatter's hypnotized underlings. Being fairly concerned for the girl's mental state, you spoke up toward Hanuquinn, your real voice distorted by the voice changer whilst you asked, "Hey, Hanuquinn. You good?"

"*huff* *huff* *huff* ...What the fuck do you think, asshole?" She growled, gazing at you with a crazed look in her eyes, which seemed to be dying down somewhat. In a brief surge of anger, she violently threw the pipe overhead like a throwing axe in frustration, which ultimately landed on the far end of the warehouse. Of course, you don't fault her for her current mood, as you defused the tension and answered, "...Fair enough. Did you see where those weirdos took your boss?"

And after taking a deep breath or two, Hanuquinn straightened herself out and answered...
1553322223322223232223222222133121112111.title: Tea Time With A Mad Hatter

15533222233222232322232222221331212.content:
You briefly wondered if you were going to be looking at someone else’s face and body in the mirror considering that you had been apparently dropped into a living comic book. Those thoughts turned out to be unfounded though as you ended up seeing your own reflection. You were always a bit heavier due to an overactive sweet tooth as well as a general lack of energy to work the weight off. The reflection showed that you were actually a bit heavier than you were before; breasts were a bit fuller and softer now, hips were a tad wider, and your stomach was a smidgen more rounded. The thick crimson locks spilling from your head were a little longer than before as well, now reaching to roughly your mid-back.

Some concern grew as you started to notice the scars scattered around your body, most were on the small side except for a rather notable one going partway around your neck. Reaching up and tentatively touching the mark on your neck brought forth a smattering of disjointed images and sensations, much more vivid than you had experienced before. There was a lot of pain as well as blood in those fragmented pieces, as well as a recurring sound of wild and insane laughter. You roughly shook your head, clearing the horrible wisps away, though you had to brace yourself against the wall before you totally recovered.

Shortly after you had finished splashing some water in your face to help clear your head, Harley’s voice came floating in through the door, “Wazzup, buttercup? Ya fall in in there or somethin’?”

“Yeah, fruitcakes here still needs to put her face on,” Bernie chimed in.

“I’m fine. I’m…fine…” your voice trailing off, it even sounded like a lie to your own ears though.

Far quicker than her size should have suggested, the bloated Harley appeared in the doorway.

“You remembering that day, weren’cha?”

You briefly considered reiterating that you were fine, maybe a bit more convincingly, but the look of obvious concern painted across that cherubic face made you think again.

155332222332222323222322222213322.content:
Another year has flown by, as another year comes into fruition... Or at least, That's what you believe, anyway. You celebrated the final moments of the year of 2017, as the ball in Times Square slowly dwindled down from the pole, counting down the final ten seconds of 2017. However, when you returned to your spacious apartment condo in Midtown for some shut eye, little did you know that your life would be drastically changed forever...

When you inevitably awoke from your slumber, you oddly felt something soft and doughy pressed against your side, which prompted you to sit up and figure out what exactly you were feeling as you groggily muttered, "*Yawn*...What...What the hell?" You rubbed the sleep from your eyes, which cleared up your vision enough to see what, or rather who, was sleeping in bed with you: A woman.

In appearance, the woman appeared to be Caucasian, sporting blonde hair that grazed her shoulders. However, what out the most about this woman aside from her hair and beauty, was undoubtedly her blubbery girth. In appearance, the woman sported a pair of round plump facial cheeks, complimented by a chubby double chin and thick neck. Looking below her head and neck, the woman had a bountiful pair of Double F-Cup breasts, which were constrained by a straining green bra. And just below that, you could easily see one of the largest physical features of this woman: Her large and blubbery apron belly. Easily the size of a spare truck tire, the woman's voluminous stomach jutted out almost two feet from her body, as it pooched downward some and covered a good portion of her lap, while also giving her some well-defined love handles, as they mildly oozed out just above her green panties.

And speaking of panties... Underneath such lingerie, the sleeping woman had quite the blubbery pair of hips and buttcheeks, as her hips were easily four and a half feet in diameter, while each of her buttcheeks were approximately the size of a beach ball. And finally, you noticed how thick, chubby, and doughy both her legs and arms were, as each leg was about as thick as a pillow, while her arms were half as doughy. Overall, if you had to wager a guess, you had to estimate that the woman's weight had to at least be around 500 to 600 pounds.

And yet, despite your estimations, your mind still pondered over several reasonable questions, such as "Who was this woman?", "How did she get here?", "Why was she sleeping with you?", and "Why was she so fat?" After all, you don't remember having a girlfriend, let alone one who weighed 500 to 600 pounds. However, you need to get some answers as to what exactly was going on here, so you decided to...
155332222332222323222322222213322.title: Sleeping With An Enchantress

choices: Check out your apartment condo some more.
Head back into the bedroom and wake up June.
Before you could decide, you were attacked by a squad of Spec Ops soldiers.
1553322223322223232223222222133221.content:
Figuring that the rotund woman sleeping in bed with you won't exactly be giving you some decent answers anytime soon, you decided to dismount from your bed and investigate your apartment condo, just to see if anything else had changed besides you sleeping in bed with a very fat woman. After all, you didn't want to provoke a woman trying to get some beauty sleep.

Shortly after carefully slipping yourself out of bed, you cautiously made your way toward the door that led out into the main apartment condo, which were now a pair of double doors, possibly so this woman could easily get in and out without getting her fat blubbery ass wedged in the doorway.

However, once you stealthily exited the bedroom, you could easily see that everything looked the same as you remembered before you went to sleep.... Well, somewhat...

What stayed the same in your spacious apartment condo, there was your 108 inch Flatscreen TV and entertainment center, complete with your PlayStation 4 Pro, as well as your trove of PS4 video games neatly organized within said entertainment center. However, instead of seeing two leather reclining chairs standing opposite of the entertainment center, you saw what appeared to be a large red love seat with a coffee table in front of it, both of which you distinctly remembering not buying or having in your possession whatsoever. Glancing around further, you then noticed that there were a few framed pictures placed upon the coffee table. Of course, your curiosity piqued, where you then picked up the largest framed picture of the bunch with both hands.

In the photograph, you could clearly both yourself and the large woman, as the framed photo featured yoyy and the unknown woman posing for the camera. In the photo, the two of you were holding onto each other in a loving yet romantic embrace, with the blonde woman wrapping a doughy arm around your neck, while you had an arm barely wrapped around her bulky and padded waist. Obviously, you were both leaning into each other in a loving manner, where the woman sported a shy yet awkward smile whilst displaying a profound blush on her chubby cheeks, while you displayed a confident, pleased grin. Overall, the sight showed a pleasant yet absolutely cute moment between you and the rotund blonde woman. But then, you soon noticed some writing on the bottom of the photo that said:

"(Your Name) + June Moone = Star-Crossred Lovers. 3rd Anniversary--Together since 2015."

In response to such a revelation, you exhaled a deep breath of relief. "...Well, at least I've gotten some sort of answer." You thought to yourself, as you soon noticed that you now had a golden ring on your left ring finger, which symbolized marriage, catching you somewhat off-guard. So, you and this... "June Moone", have been together for a total of three years, which would make this the year 2018. At least time seemed to be moving normally. And yet, this still didn't exactly fully explain what was going on around here, as you then took a look at the other pictures shortly after setting the first photo back down on the coffee table.

In these photos, almost all of them consisted of you and June together doing different things, such as watching fireworks, attending a movie premiere, visiting the Coney Island Amusement Park, the list went on. The one thing you did notice however, was that June seemed thinner in a lot of those pictures. Sure she was still big, but it seemed like if you looked at the photos, you could clearly see some sort of timeline of her getting bigger and fatter.

"Whoa..." You muttered out loud, taking in all of this information. Judging from the photo time lapse, you could see that she progressed from being kinda big (Maybe around 180 to 200 pounds, if you had to wager a guess) to the 500 pound plus woman she is now, nearly three years later. It was actually somewhat impressive, if you were being honest. Also, it seemed that both you and June appeared to be in a good relationship, as every picture you saw displayed you two being quite happy. And yet, the woman's name, June Moone, seemed very familiar to you, but you couldn't exactly put your finger on it. But still, it kind of made you wonder if you should head back into your bedroom sand wake her up. After all, maybe you could ask her everything you two did last night, get a bit more inddight on the situation.

Either that, or check out your apartment some more. Eventually, you decided to...
1553322223322223232223222222133221.title: Finding Answers

choices: Were now suspended in the air, surrounded by a mystical green aura.
Had completely disappeared, with their clothes being the only remaining remnants
Actually, something else had happened to the Russian soldiers...
15533222233222232322232222221332213.content:
But suddenly, before you could even come to a definitive decision, you then were abruptly but violently knocked off your feet by an exploding Flashbang Grenade, which flung you off your feet and skidding across the hardwood floor for about four and a half feet. You clenched back some on the floor, as your vision was mildly blurred while your ears rang uncomfortably, where you instinctively ran for cover, which came in the form of a wooden Island in the Kitchen.

Fortunately, you didn't have to wait long to figure out what was going on, as you soon heard several sets of footsteps rush their way inside the apartment condo. Of course, you took a quick peek from behind the Island, only to soon realize what exactly was going on:

Your home was under siege.

Though, as for who exactly was sieging into your home, they appeared to be a squad of five soldiers, all geared up in Spec Ops outfits and equipment, armed with assault rifles and plenty of ammunition to boot. Judging from their speech, they appeared to be Russian Special Forces. But...Why were they in your home? "Alright, fan out and search the perimeter. She has to be around here somewhere." One of the soldiers said, speaking to his comrades with a thick Russian accent, where the other soldiers soon cautiously and deliberately began to search your apartment condo for...whoever they were searching for.

However, putting two and two together, your eyes went wide with realization that these Russian Spec Ops guys were most likely here for June Moone! But...Why? Why were these Russian soldiers after her? The questions kept piling on to your already established confusion. However, something snapped inside your mind and subconscious, as you began to stealthily and quietly pull out a few steak knives from one of the Island's drawers closest to your current position, brandishing the knives in your hands, ready to strike the nearest Russian soldier who approaches you.

Seconds later, just as one of the Russian soldiers was just around the corner from spotting you, you swiftly lunged at the soldier, stabbing him in the shoulder, and pinning him on his back. From there, you quickly delivered a violent punch to his masked face, knocking the soldier out cold in the process. Unfortunately, your actions didn't go unnoticed, as a female Russian soldier soon spotted you and yelled, "Contact!"

Soon, she began to open fire on you, but not before you quickly grabbed the assault rifle from the unconscious injured Russian soldier, dive rolling away from the stream of bullets aimed squarely at you. Fortunately, yo managed to find cover, which essentially came in the form of the aforementioned love seat, firing back blindly whilst avoiding getting yourself shot in the process, as bullets whizzed past by only mere inches away from you.

The fighting and barrage of gunshots from both parties continued to echo throughout the apartment condo for almost six full minutes, until suddenly... The squad of Russian soldiers have stopped firing upon you. It was strange, but against your better judgement considering the situation, you slowly poked your head out from behind the bullet hole-riddled love seat, only to see that the Russian soldiers...
15533222233222232322232222221332213.title: Under Siege

choices: Interrogate them. Find out why they're after June Moone & Enchantress.
Let Enchantress have some "fun" with the soldiers.

155332222332222323222322222213322131.content:
However, much to your surprise, instead of seeing multiple Russian soldiers simply reloading their firearms, they were apparently now suspended in mid-air. Judging from the situation alone, the soldiers were held aloft yet heavily restrained by a mystical green aura which surrounded their individual bodies. You noticed that you obviously weren't the one who was doing this, as you thought to yourself, "...What the? Who's doing this?"

"My, my. It seems we have some rude, uninvited guests." An ethereal voice rang out from behind you, which strangely sounded like two different women speaking in unison, accompanied by what sounded like a mix between mild chiming noises and low murmuring humming sounds. Suffice to say, this was getting stranger and stranger by the second.
However, knowing that you were eventually going to find out who was restraining the Russian soldiers, you slowly turned around to see what or who was behind you, only to see someone completely unexpected:

The mystical sorceress of DC Comics, known only...as Enchantress!

But then, you suddenly realized something, as you soon remembered who June Moone actually was: She was the Enchantress! Or rather, the hostess to the spirit of a god-like witch called Enchantress. Though, judging from her appearance, she was just as fat and rotund as June Moone was when you saw her in bed, as Enchantress seductively sashayed her way out of the bedroom, her hands exhibiting the exact same mystical green aura that restrained the squad of Russian soldiers, where you noticed that Enchantress's outfit was ss mix between her costume from DC Rebirth and her outfit from Injustice 2, which consisted of a one piece green leotard, gray and green hooded cloak, and knee-high brown heeled boots, which easily showed off her thick, fat, doughy thunder thighs and legs.

From there, Enchantress momentarily looked at you with her luminescent green eyes, as if she was checking to see if you were unharmed, which seemed uncharacteristic for the character considering that Enchantress wasn't exactly portrayed as a heroic protagonist in the Suicide Squad comics. "Did they harm you, lover boy?" She asked, which seemed to surprise you a little, considering that the spirit of Enchantress didn't give a damn about June Moone's well-being nor her relationship with anyone. So, in response, you calmly stood up and quickly retorted "...Yeah. Aside from bejjng hit by an exploding Flashbang, I'm fine, Enchantress."

Shortly after looking at the magically restrained squad of Russian soldiers, you looked back at the rotund Enchantress, who channeled her magic into restraining the soldiers with little to no effort, where you then spoke toward her and said, "...So, what gave away the fact that I was in trouble?" "...The obvious sounds of gunfire." Enchantress coyly retorted, speaking to you in that ethereal voice of hers, who couldn't help but let out an almost sadistic chuckle as she replied, "To think their little toy guns and bullets would ever stand an inkling of a chance against the power of magic!"

Of course, Enchantress couldn't help but boast a little, especially since she highly regarded that magic would always be superior to technology, as you both then heard one of the restrained soldiers began to shout obscenities at you and Enchantress as he spoke in a thick Russian accent and growled, "Let us down, you bloated bitch!" Obviously unamused by the soldier's vulgar tongue, Enchantress used her magic to grab the cursing soldier, where she then violently flung her pillowy arm to the left, thus sending the restrained soldier flying into the wall at breakneck speeds, possibly fracturing some of the man's bones on impact. Then, she flicked her doughy left arm up and down in a violent manner, which of course, sent the soldier being smacked violently against both the ceiling and floor at breakneck yet pain-inducing speeds. The scene itself seemed very reminiscent of a certain scene in Star Wars: The Last Jedi, where Supreme Leader Snoke repeatedly smacked General Hux against the interior of the Star Destroyer bridge by using the Force. Suffice to say, it was entertaining...in a dark comedjjc way, of course.

After two full minutes of violently bouncing the vulgar soldier against the ceiling and floor like a pinball in a pinball machine, Enchantress finally ceased her sadistic mystical beatdown on the soldier who called her "a bloated bitch", where she then placed the bloodied soldier back alongside his restrained comrades. "Anyone else would like to contribute to this conversation?!" Enchantress yelled, raising her eerily calm ethereal voice to a threatening eldritch roar, which definitely rendered the remaining Russian soldiers to involuntarily shut themselves up, considering that they don't want to invoke the wrath of the Enchantress any further than their friend and squadmate has.

A short moment later, Enchantress took that soldiers' unanimous collective silence as a solid "No", where she then retorted, "Nothing? Good." From there, she crossed her pillowy arms while still channeling her magic, where she thought out loud and said, "Now... What to do with you, you sniveling worms. Sending you all to a dark dimension? No, way too easy. Ten thousand hours of unrelenting torment? Pfft! Child's play..." Seeing as how she seemed indecisive on what to do with the Russian soldiers, Enchantress soon turned to face you and coyly asked, "(Name), darling... What do you think should be the fate of such crude guests? After all, you're the wounded party in all of this."

Although, despite you were luckily not heavily injured, Enchantress did raise a fair valid point, even though the soldiers' original intent was to capture June Moone before she could even transform into Enchantress. Eventually, after a few moments of contemplating on what to do with the restrained soldiers, you eventually decided to...
155332222332222323222322222213322131.title: Enchantress, Enchantress, Enchantress

choices: Capture the Enchantress, & make her a part of Russia's own Suicide Squad.
Assassinate the Enchantress, since she posed a threat to Russia's security.

1553322223322223232223222222133221311.content:
Although, as much as you personally wanted to see those Russian soldiers get their asses completely fried by Enchantress, you knew that such a bloody and violent solution probably won't be giving you some decent answers, as you soon looked back at the corpulent Enchantress and sternly answered, "...Right now, I want some goddamn answers from them. These bastards better have a damn good reason why they just rushed into our condo, guns blazing."

Of course, in response to such an answer, the Enchantress expressed a somewhat disappointed look on her chubby face, where she spoke toward you with her ethereal voice and replied, "Aww! Really? I so wanted to turn two or three of these sniveling worms into newts." "Maybe another time. But right now, we need some answers as to why they're after you and June." You firmly retorted, crossing your arms in the process. At first, Enchantress seemed reluctant for the two of you to interrogate individuals whom she compared to mere insignificant worms, but eventually she saw the reasoning behind your decision, shrugging her plump shoulders in response then said, "Hmm... Fair enough, I suppose, lover boy."

From there, both you and Enchantress simultaneously approached the mystically restrained Russian soldiers, stopping only a few feet away from them, where you then spoke toward the levitating restrained soldiers, hands behind your back, and sternly said, "Alright, you sacks of shit! Here's how this is going down. You Siberian jarheads are going to tell us who sent you here, and why you're after my girl June."

"...And if we do not give you such answers?" One of the Russian soldiers scoffed, whom you assumed to be the leader of the squad, obviously not intimidated by your idle demands. However, that wasn't going to end well for him, as he soon felt his throat suddenly becoming clogged up by an unseen mystical force, which of course, was caused by none other than the obese Enchantress herself, who pressed her slightly chubby thumb against her mildly plump index and middle fingers on her left hand, all whilst her hands glowed a mystical green aura. Of course, she displayed a sadistic grin on her smooth but cherubic face, as she casually spoke toward the suffocating soldier with her ethereal voice and smugly remarked, "...Then I get to take my sweet time slowly unraveling your organs from the inside out, then ultimately devour your soul. Is that any more clear for your primitive mind, worm?"

Obviously, in response to one of his captors slowly strangling him, the leading Russian soldier quickly nodded his head yes in confirmation, hoping that Enchantress would be merciful enough to let him breathe again. Fortunately for him, Enchantress was feeling generous enough to allow him to breathe, as she undid the spell she placed inside his throat with just a flick of her right hand and wrist, causing the Russian soldier to gasp for air, then inhale and exhale several shallow breaths, so he could get some oxygen flowing through his lungs once more.

"Thank you, Enchantress." You said, thanking her for getting the point across to the stubborn Russian soldiers. Of course, Enchantress couldn't help herself but display a prideful grin on her chubby face and slightly plump lips upon hearing such a compliment from you, where she then spoke toward you with a flirtatious tone in her ethereal voice as she replied, "*chuckle* Well, I aim to appease, lover boy."

In response, you smiled back at the corpulent Enchantress, where you then focused back onto the restrained Russian soldiers, your tone now a stern one, as you spoke toward the leader of the squad of soldiers and firmly asked, "Now then, "comrade"... Who sent you?" "*scoffs* As if we'll ever talk to the likes of you, American!" One of the male soldiers exclaimed, being mighty stubborn on confessing the necessary answers you need. However, his crude response wasn't exactly received well by his peers, as the squad leader growled, "Shut it, Krinkov!"

"Yes, "Krinkov". You should really listen to your superiors. After all, you and your fellow soldiers aren't exactly in the best situation to back-talk us." Enchantress smugly retorted, noticing the slowly expanding schism between Krinkov and his squadmates. Once more, you spoke toward the restrained Russian soldiers and sternly said, "I'll ask again: Who. Sent. YOU?!" Obviously knowing that they have little to no choice in the matter at hand, the soldiers began to disclose the objective of their mission, which was to...

15533222233222232322232222221332213111.content:
At first, the Russian soldiers didn't say a thing. However, their commander eventually spoke up and answered, "...We...We were assigned by the higher-ups in the Ministry of Foreign Affairs. That's all you need to- GAH!!" But as the squad commander was about to finish that comment, Enchantress swiftly used her magic to violently twist his left arm in a way where it's not supposed to actually bend, painfully dislodging his arm in the process.

From there, Enchantress casually wagged a chubby right index finger from side to side, as if she was joyfully taunting the injured squad commander while she spoke toward him with a mocking tone in her ethereal voice as she said, "Uh uh uh! Sniveling worms like you shouldn't be back-talking!" "Stop, please! Leave Sergey alone!" The female soldier yelped, begging for Enchantress not to harm the squad commander, Sergey, any further than she already has. Of course, such a pleading outburst easily caught the obese Enchantress's attention, where she calmly sashayed her way over toward the restrained female soldier, which made her wide bulky hips sway from left to right with each sashaying step she made.

Once she reached her, Enchantress casually stroked the female soldier's lithe face, all while she spoke toward the female soldier with an amused yet coyly condescending tone as she said, "...You are quite brave for a worm, little girl! I think I will kill you last." Obviously, such a twisted comment coming from the rotund Enchantress had rendered the hardened female soldier to give herself a severe case of cold feet, which made her extremely unnerved by Enchantress's presence.

Moments later, Enchantress returned to your side, where you then spoke toward Sergey and questioned, "Okay, so you and your squad were hired by Russia's Ministry of Foreign Affairs. However, what I want to know, "Sergey", is the reason why they sent you all the way out here for in the first place. Care to enlighten me?" Knowing that he had little choice on the matter considering his current predicament, Sergey exhaled a heavily frustrated sigh, where he inevitably spoke toward you and explained, "...Our primary objective was to obtain and capture Mrs. June Moone, better known as Enchantress, then escort her back to the homeland. However, you were a secondary objective, Jack-Knife."

"So, you WERE attempting to kidnap June! And let me wager a guess: Russia is trying to create it's own Suicide Squad?" You said, confirming what you had previously expected when the Russian soldiers first broke into your apartment condo, while also suspecting the reason why the Russian Ministry of Foreign Affairs was after Enchantress in the first place. And yet, the squad commander called you by such an unexpected alias an antihero deserves, Jack-Knife, you could only guess that this was your alias in this world. Judging from the name, you could only guess that in this new world you're very proficient at using knives, much like how Captain Boomerang is proficient with boomerangs.

Of course, in response to your speculation, Sergey let out a dry morbid chuckle and answered, "...What? Did you really think that Amanda Waller's pet project was America's best kept secret? The nations of the world have been scrambling to assemble their own Task Force X to combat Meta-Human terrorism, with varying degrees of success. After all, China was ballsy enough to create their own version of the Justice League, for Christ sakes!" Upon keenly listening to every word spewing from Sergey's mouth, you slowly but surely began to realize something, as your mind dawned upon a startling revelation:

You were now in the DC Universe! More specifically, the DC Rebirth Universe!

Fortunately, you managed to keep yourself calm and collected, despite just learning that you were now within the DC Universe as a whole. "Feeling satisfied with such trivial answers, lover boy?" Enchantress queried, speaking toward you with her ethereal voice, asking you if you were now satisfied with getting the necessary answers from your "guests". Of course, you definitely seemed sufficiently satisfied in your endeavor, where you then spoke toward the corpulent Enchantress and calmly answered, "*sigh*...Yeah, I think I got enough answers to figure out why they're here, Enchantress. You can do whatever you want to them."

"Oh, lover boy! Those are the exact words I've been hoping for you to say sooner." Enchantress gleefully chirped, quickly rubbing her somewhat plump hands together with a semblance of eager yet sadistic anticipation, all whilst she expressed an almost sadistic grin on her cherubic face, as if she was going to enjoy every little second of their torment. However, just as she was about to commence her mystical handiwork upon the restrained squad of Russian soldiers, you quickly spoke toward Enchantress and said, "Oh! And please: Would you keep the blood and gore down to a minimum? You know how much a pain in the ass it is to clean bloodstains off the floor."

Obviously, this seemed to have made Enchantress somewhat frustrated but disappointed at your comment, exhaling a heavy sigh in response, where she then looked at you, placing her slightly chubby hands on her padded hips, speaking toward you with her ethereal voice and asked, "Oh? And how would you want us to deal with such sniveling worms then, lover boy?" From there, you calmly approached the rotund Enchantress, where you then began to whisper into her ear about what you had in mind. However, what you were whispering into her ear seemed to have piqued her interest, causing Enchantress to slowly but surely form a sadistic grin on her cherubic face, where she gleefully retorted, "...Ooooh!! I absolutely love the sound of that, lover boy!" And what you had in mind for the fate of the five Russian soldiers, as Enchantress...

Oh, so you have chosen Dr. Barbara Ann Minerva, better known as the Wonder Woman villainess, "Cheetah". Cursed by the ancient plant god Urzkartaga due to a botched ritual because of her not being a virgin, Dr. Minerva was cursed to take on the Cheetah persona, which made her experience severe amounts of pain when she's in her Human Form, while enduring a sense of euphoric yet bloodthirsty ferocity when she transforms into the Cheetah.

Besides the Greek God of War, Ares, Cheetah is one of Wonder Woman's more well-known enemies, due to the fact that Barbara Ann Minerva was good friends with Wonder Woman prior to being cursed and transformed into the Cheetah, which makes things all the more tragic when Wonder Woman is forced to confront her cursed friend, much to the Amazon superheroine's dismay.

Anyway, you didn't come here for a history lesson! You came for an obese Cheetah.
