15533222233222232322232222221333312.content:
"Whatever is done for love always occurs beyond good and evil..." -Friedrich Nietzsche, Philosopher

=====

Wise men would say that life can take some unexpected turns when one least anticipates them. Unbeknownst to you, such phrasing couldn't be farther from the truth.

In reality, you were never really that much of a popular person, as you slowly drug yourself back onto your bed within your one-person apartment, feeling quite disillusioned after being "Friend-Zoned" by your date only hours prior. Why? Well, turns out she's one of those self-proclaimed "Man-Hating Feminists" you've heard about all across the internet and social media.

Needless to say, her dissing you with such rudeness didn't do favors for your self-esteem, as you tossed aside your suit coat, necktie, dress shirt, pants, and shoes and socks onto the floor, collapsing onto your bed in defeat in the process. And yet, as the veil of slumber inevitably drowned your consciousness, little were you aware of your upcoming change in fortune and luck the next time you awoke...

== 9 Hours Later... ==

Even in the dreaming world, you couldn't ignore this gnawing weird feeling that something was amiss, unaware of a certain distinguished entity from the Fifth Dimension rewriting and rearranging your current perceptions of reality, as you sluggishly albeit inevitably arouse from slumber. Your vision initially blurry, but it soon sharpened in contrast and definition, as you eventually gazed upon the sunlit expanse of your new environs.

At first, you thought nothing seemed different, but you then felt the newly invigorated cushioning underneath you, as your left hand sunk into the softened surface momentarily. From there, your eyes soon wandered off, quickly taking note of your bed's newfound size and shape. Instead of a one-person mattress bed, what was left is now a downright massive Double King-Sized circular mattress bed, complete with silky fleece bedsheets and fluffed out pillows.

However, much like the bed, the room itself seemed more..."Expansive" at best, adorned with several pieces of bedroom furniture, as well as having a few archaeological artifacts displayed on the adjacent walls. Some had originated from undoubtedly Greek mythology, others from variously contrasting foreign lands.

And yet, apart from such distinctive details, the most striking of them all were the almost quiet breathing noises emanating just beside you. Instinctively, your odd sense of curiosity took hold, where you cautiously redirected your gaze to your left, with intent to discover the source. But by doing so, you soon laid your eyes upon the most peculiar spectacle:

An opulently obese anthropomorphic Cheetah-person.

Surprisingly, much to your own sanity, you didn't initially flee from the entity, obtaining a better look upon your bedside partner. Upon closer inspection, you can easily see that this Human-Cheetah hybrid was without a shred of doubt female, especially if the bloated fleshy orbs the size of medicine balls that were unmistakably breasts, equally padded hips, and entire absence of male genitalia were anything to go by with your observations.

Aside from all the golden yellow feline fur with black spots scattered across her corpulent form, the most notable feature she had in regards to fur or hair was the somewhat yet supple amount of fiery crimson hair adorned upon the Cheetah-Woman's chubby feline head, which looked messy as a result of unconsciously tossing about in bed.

Of course, besides what appeared to be a pink collar with a large heart-shaped medallion adorned upon it, the more obvious features were her sheer weight and girth, with thick meaty arms and legs, fattened paw-like hands and fingers, an unsubtle posterior with a feline tail slowly twitching about, and a rather prominent flabby apron of a stomach, all of which were completely unrestrained by any form of clothing save for her birthday suit. If you had to gamble on a guess, you theorized that this beastly beauty had to have weigh in at about over five hundred to six hundred pounds, possibly even a little more than that, given how much space she would take up on the lavishly large bed.

And yet, as you watched her fat blubbery gut slowly inflate and deflate with each slumbering breath from her feline snout, you uncharacteristically began to develop a crimson-hued blush upon your cheeks, as your hand unconsciously placed itself upon the uppermost curve of the feline woman's mammoth gut, feeling the silky soft tufts of fur run through your fingertips, as you soon began to slowly rub the surface of her abdomen in large, calm, and soothing circles.

Strangely, it was quite therapeutic for you, only to then hear a most distinct noise to exhale from the slumbering beastwoman:

Purring.

Soft. Gentle. Peaceful. Purring.

It felt so foreign and contradicting, compared to the black feline claws that subtly adorned her thick fatty pawed fingers that she could easily use to claw out your throat if she wanted to. And yet, judging from all the sleeping mewling and purring she was creating, it seemed you found her metaphorical weak spot.
15533222233222232322232222221333312.title: The Cheetah's Corpulence

15533222233222232322232222221333332.title: Katherine Kane AKA Batwoman.

choices: You're a young, thin woman. Looking good!
You're a fit, muscular woman. So...how did you end up with big Batwoman?
You're a chubby, but still adorable woman. Awww...
You're a woman about as big as Batwoman. Well, birds of a feather...
155332222332222323222322222213333322.content:
You wake up feeling refreshed, incredibly refreshed...in fact, it's probably the best sleep you've ever had in a while. As you wake up more, you realize the reason for that: you're sleeping on one of the most comfortable beds you've ever seen. Who designed it, angels? But, a new thought settles in: this isn't your bed. This isn't even your house.

You're not going to deny it, you'd love to stay in a place like this. It's an incredibly posh bedroom that must belong to a rather large house, a mansion really. This place really is outfitted with some of the fanciest furniture you've ever seen, and it looks like there are all kinds of gadgets and gizmos to control it all. You didn't know you needed seven different switches to change the ambient lighting. What did you do last night, hook up with Bruce Wayne?

Play time's over though. You've had your fun. Whatever happened last night was a pretty nice break, and you hope whoever it was that took you to their place last night will be a lasting thing. Hard to pass up a lifestyle like this. All the same, you do have to kind of figure out who they are, or at least where you are. Gazing out of the enormous windows, you can see a city skyline just on the horizon, but it's not any kind of a city you recognize. You shrug. What do you know anyway? You're in some mansion outside of the city, of course you don't know which city it is looking at it from that far away.

You slowly put back on your clothes and traipse out to the living room. You were right: this is some kind of mansion. You've never seen a room this big before. It's like someone could hold a whole party in here, and it's probably likely that a socialite of this caliber probably has. You feel so out of place here. Plain, ordinary you somehow scored it big with someone.

Curiosity takes hold, and you start to look around more. There's lots of fancy, and probably expensive, art decorating the corners of the room, and you really don't understand any of it. That's rich people art for you. A gigantic fireplace roars with a warm glow at one end of the room with an equally large television above. You're afraid to sit on the furniture because it does look so nice, and it looks like someone took a good amount of time making this place spotless.

You jump when you hear a door opening behind you. Maybe you'll finally get to meet this mysterious person. Shock is the best way you can describe your emotions right now. Never, in your wildest dreams, did you expect this.

It's...well it's Batwoman! The Batwoman! You can hardly believe it, but there she is, red and black outfit and pale makeup and all, standing right there before you. Well, that certainly explains the lavish place you woke up in.

But, if that isn't enough of a shock, there's also the fact that Batwoman is enormous! Quite frankly, you're a little surprised someone her size is still able to be up and walking, or in her case waddling. That black leather outfit is really straining to stay stretched over her fat frame. Breasts the size of watermelons have stretched the bat symbol on the front of her uniform until it's barely recognizable. Her gut, which folds neatly into a second roll, surges forward, hanging just above her knees and buries her utility belt in fat. Thinking about the belt, you're surprised to even know they can make a belt that size. Most impressive of all are her wide round hips, which could block a whole hallway if you're not careful. You can't help but stare at them with...arousal?

She smiles at you and starts to take off the long, dark-red wig she wears to cover up her lighter red, and shorter hair. "Yeah, I know I'm late," she says. "You kind of know the drill with night patrols now, and stuff. You didn't already eat breakfast, did you?" She has a pleading look on her face, and you suddenly remember that she always feels bad when she's late for anything that has to do with you. Wait...does that mean you two have been dating for a while now? You're pretty sure you would have remembered that.

"Um, no, I just woke up," you answer quickly, realizing you were getting lost in thought.

She beams. "Perfect, then we can have breakfast together. I'll get out of...work clothes and come out in a sec."

"Yeah, I kinda want to freshen up myself," you say. You're still having trouble processing that you're dating Batwoman.

"Aw, but you always look good," she says, tapping you on the nose before giving you a quick peck. "Okay, I'll tell the cooks the usual, and I'll join you in a bit."

She waddles off towards the kitchens, at least that's what you assume. You head back to the bedroom and scurry into the bathroom. This is ridiculous, you think to yourself. There is no way you of all people can be dating Batwoman, and how the hell did she get so big? These are questions, of course, you can't ask her directly. She seems to think you've always been dating her, which is another weird phenomenon you're going to have to figure out. In the meantime, you figure you'll get ready for a late brunch with her.

You look in the mirror to fix your hair, and you see...
155332222332222323222322222213333322.title: Part of the Bat Family

choices: Suddenly, there's a knock at the door.
There's a loud bang. Someone's broken in!
You and Batwoman go to digest on the couch. Maybe you can learn more about her.
You go back to explaining stats on her last mission.
1553322223322223232223222222133333223.content:
You see yourself, just your plain, old, average self. You're a chubby woman, who's a bit on the short side, at least compared to Batwoman. But, despite your heavier frame, you're still adorable, and you've had your fair share of flings in the past. It's not like you can't attract anyone with your looks. Still, you have always been a little self-conscious about your weight, especially your flabby gut. But, given who you're dating and how big she is, you look pretty good. You decide to finish up quickly and head back out.

You head back towards where you assume the dining room is. Again, you're surprised by the very modern-looking kitchen, with a small island dividing it from the dining room. Batwoman has changed out of her outfit, no longer covered in makeup and the eye-catching wig. She now looks like Kate, her regular self, well, mostly her old self. Those enormous hips fill up two chairs at the table.

She pats the chair next to her, indicating for you to sit. "So, ready to read me the daily stats?" she asks.

"Uh..."

She rolls her eyes. "Of course, you can't function in the morning without that little tablet of yours. Honestly, you lose it all the time; you need to tie that thing to you."

She gets up and returns later with a really advanced tablet and sets it before you. "You left it in the cabinets again," she says. "Doing a little midnight snacking, are we? Alright, now we're ready."

Almost without thinking, you turn it on, tap several buttons, and a holographic map of the city pops up. "Okay, so after analyzing the footage from last night, the reason that landing here..." You pull in a close up of Batwoman jumping from a great height. She makes the landing but hits her knee in the wrong spot, just a hair off from her mark. "Is because this spot in the building is under renovation. Structurally, it isn't a good place to jump off of, not given your measurements."

Where the hell did that come from? You were never great at math in school, and you're not even sure where you know all of this information. Plus, you blush at mentioning Batwoman's size.

She doesn't seem to notice. She's busy examining the diagrams on your tablet. "Wow," she says. "I don't think some of dad's best analysists would have found all that. Good work, my little techie." She kisses you on the cheek.

You're still reeling after all the information you just spouted off, and you're not entirely sure what just happened. But, somehow, you're some kind of tech support to Batwoman, as well as her girlfriend.

Breakfast is shortly served after that, and it's more like a breakfast buffet. You've never seen so much food just for two people. Then again, Batwoman must've developed quite an appetite to get to the size she is and still be able to do all the calorie-burning activities she does on a daily basis.

Yet, your own stomach starts to rumble with a hunger you've never felt before. You've never been one to have an immense appetite before. You just sort of got chubby thanks to genetics and a certain degree of laziness. However, you can't help yourself as you plate a heaping stack of pancakes and drizzle it in more syrup than you probably should put on. You're also not going to pass up on the bacon, and you get a hefty handful of it.

Batwoman laughs. "Okay, okay, breakfast first, and then we can talk more." She begins getting her own helpings, which are twice the size, if not three times the size of yours. She goes for a little bit of everything. After all, she asked for it.

For a little over an hour, there really isn't a lot of talking between the two of you, just eating. You're kind of surprised with yourself, as you didn't realize you could put away a whole meal and then some like that. Still, even after you finish all those pancakes and bacon, you're still craving some of the fresh strawberries and heavily buttered toast. Batwoman already has a stack of plates off to the side that has to be at least a foot tall.

By the time you're both finished, you feel as though another bite would have made you pop. You look over at your girlfriend. She looks stuffed and satisfied, but not distressed in the least by it. Rather, she looks like as if she's only had a morning snack and is just being polite by not asking for more. You, on the other hand, look like a real butterball, stuffed to within an inch of bursting. You really overdid it, and you're not sure how that happened. Maybe Batwoman's habits are rubbing off on you.

She smiles and rubs your extended belly. Yours is more pronounced because you were thinner to begin with. "Haha, you keep that up, and you'll be as big as me in no time."

You feel like you could melt into a puddle right now. In fact, you know you could probably get as big as her easily. She at least goes out and does all kinds of acrobatics. You just sit around on the computer giving her advice. She senses your distress.

"Oh, don't worry about it so much. You know I love my cute, little butterball all the same."

You smile, glad she means that, but still unsure.
1553322223322223232223222222133333223.title: Mutual Affections

choices: You need to go hide, now!
You stay still and try not to make a sound. Maybe they don't know you're here.
Batwoman comes to the rescue! Just in time, too.
The operative breaks down the door. You'll have to fight back, somehow.
15533222233222232322232222221333332232.content:
You jolt at the sound of a bang that sounds more like an explosion coming from the front hall. A few footsteps can be heard, and you hear some hushed whispers. Your heart thunders in your chest. Kate doesn't flinch but grabs a gun from the hidden holster under her shirt. "Hide," she says in a single command.

You don't need to be told twice. You waddle as fast as your legs can carry you in your overfilled state to a guest bedroom down the hall and lock the door tight. You were smart enough to grab your tablet on the way out. At least this way, you can keep an eye on the fight and help your girlfriend if needed.

The hidden cameras in the house come to life, and you select the feed that shows you Kate, who has changed back into her Batwoman costume surprisingly quick. Several thugs dressed in dark robes have broken into the house, and they came armed to the teeth. They must've known who they were going up against. You recognize these figures as being followers of the Religion of Crime, a group Kate has worked hard to uncover and try to put a stop to.

"Well, I see you decided to bring the fight to me," Batwoman says. "Perfect, gave me time to get in a well-balanced breakfast."

She pulls out a second gun and fires from both at the two nearest operatives. You're not too afraid of the blood and gore since you know that she uses rubber bullets. But those will still pack a punch, and hopefully, incapacitate them. One bullet hits its mark on the shoulder of one of the hooded figures. He drops to the ground, crying out in pain. She kicks his dropped weapon out of his reach and has decided to go for him first. He takes a knee straight to the jaw, breaking it, and leaving him down for the rest of the fight.

The second thug dodged the bullet and is coming up from behind. "Behind you!" you yell into the microphone on your tablet.

She strikes him swiftly and smiles up at the camera, and she talks in the mic on her ear. "Thanks, babe, but I think I've got this bunch. Check the rest of the feeds, let me know what I'm working with, put this place on lockdown, and alert the usual authorities. They'll be pretty quick to get to a Gotham socialite's home."

She goes back to fighting the six other attackers in the front hall. You quickly type in all the codes to set the house on a lockdown to prevent others from getting in, if they haven't already. Doing a quick search of the house, you learn that there are at least six more cultists in the house, making for a dozen altogether she needs to take care of. You trust your girlfriend's abilities, especially since it's your life also on the line if she can't handle it.

You also call the authorities, saying that Kate Kane's mansion had been broken into. You don't mention who you are, since you're not sure if you're a known girlfriend to Batwoman or Kate. It's so hard to keep up with all these secret identities, you think. After all, you're going to need someone to come collect the culprits once your girlfriend's done with them.

You go back to the feed with her still fighting the main group in the front hall. It looks like she's taken out two more, leaving her only three to finish off. "Two more heading upstairs, one heading for our bedroom, and three scattered down the west hall. I think they're looking for something."

She punches another operative between the eyes. "Yeah, you. I think this was a hit. They wouldn't get so ballsy to come here on their own without a reason. Stay where you are and don't make a sound. Hide only if you hear something."

You hold your breath, hoping she's able to finish this soon. You've never been in any kind of a high-pressure situation like this before. Or, rather, the old you hasn't. You're not sure how much experience this new you has. You realize, though, that there is something you can be doing.

Batwoman has finished incapacitating the thugs in the hall. She's now gone to the other areas of the house. You, begin a search on the bodies of the operatives laying on the floor. You're not just good at analyzing situations, you're a master hacker as well. You start probing into any devices the thugs may have had on them, in the hopes of learning who specifically from the Religion may have put out the hit. You're only able to find some very basic information: who they were going after (you and Kate, duh), and where to find you both. You're a little curious about that. That really shouldn't be public information. How had the Religion connected Batwoman and Kate Kane? You may have to probe further when you can come out of your hiding spot and can physically take apart their equipment.

But just then, you hear footsteps just outside the door. They're heavy, but not the heavy, plodding footsteps of your girlfriend. They're one of the operative's, and they're just outside the door! You gasp.
15533222233222232322232222221333332232.title: There's a loud bang. Someone's broken in!

choices: From there, Kate decided to divulge on her pregnancy...Wait, What?!
Eventually, you managed to figure out who sent the hit on you & Kate.
Actually, something else happened instead...
155332222332222323222322222213333322323.content:
But then, just as you swiftly (despite your current disposition) hid behind the King-Sized bed, preparing for the inevitable oncoming attack from the thugs of the Religion of Crime, you suddenly heard fighting coming from just beyond the door.

Quickly, you grabbed your tablet, sifting through the various camera feeds to find the correct one that focused on the bedroom door. And within a few brief moments later, you managed to find the correct camera feed, which showed Batwoman knocking the Religion of Crime thug out cold with ease. Despite her ludicrously larger and bulkier physique, Batwoman was still able to move as swiftly as if she weighed 400 pounds less.

"(Name)? You alright in there? The intruders are down." Batwoman said, knocking on the door once or twice, letting you know that it was safe to come out. Of course, you soon approached the door and opened it, seeing Batwoman's handiwork upon the Religion of Crime thugs scattered around several rooms.

Currently, most of them were tied up by Batwoman, as she was in the middle of restraining several more when you exited the bedroom. Kate soon noticed you, as a relieved smile appeared on her chubby face. From there, she stood up to hug you in relief as she asked, "You're not hurt, are you?"

"...I'm fine. It's just my nerves, that's all." You replied, feeling Kate's loving but pudgy embrace, obviously a little unnerved by such a near-death experience. Then again, this does come with the job of working with a vigilante such as Batwoman.

From there, Batwoman refocused on restraining the Religion of Crime thugs before the police arrive to escort these criminals to Blackgate Penitentiary. And within a few minutes later, Batwoman had completed just that, as you managed to take a few of the thugs' cell phones to see if you can gather any additional informnation regarding the Religion of Crime and their recent machinations.

--- 3 Hours Later ---

Eventually, after the police were done detaining the restrained Religion of Crime thugs, you soon got to work on investigating how and why the Religion of Crime had put a hit on both you and Kate, deliberately dismantling some of their equipment for further investigation. Of course, whilst you were probing the thugs' equipment and archiving any and all information you could gather, Kate had secretly got out of her Batwoman costume and back into her civilian clothes, where she currently was drinking a chocolate smoothie as a personal reward to herself.

Of course, Kate couldn't help herself in watching you work, as she casually waddled her way inside your Computer Room, she witnessed you hard at work, tinkering away at the various devices the Religion of Crime thugs used in their failed assassination attempt on both your lives. Suffice to say, Kate undoubtedly admired your persistence.
155332222332222323222322222213333322323.title: In The Nick Of Time

choices: You figured out who called the hit.
You figured out how they connected Kate Kane to Batwoman.
You figured out where their base is. Maybe you can learn more there.
You found a backdoor hack to their own mainframe. Time to really mess with them.
1553322223322223232223222222133333223231.content:
She slides another smoothy towards you. "I can't be the only one who worked up an appetite during all this," she said. "Plus, I feel weird being the only one eating right now. Maybe it's just the pregnancy making me self-conscious.

You nearly spit out the sip you were taking. Did she just say she was pregnant? When did that happen? How did that happen?

"Oh, sweetie, did I forget to tell you?" she asks, completely oblivious. "I meant to tell you that the doctor from the clinic had called to tell me it looked like the insemination took. We're pregnant!"

"I...uh...clinic? Insemination?" You're still not sure where to begin wrapping your head around this one.

She nods. "Now, don't play dumb with me. I know I'm not that forgetful," she chuckles. "You remember? I used some of the family funds to help support a new fertility clinic in Gotham. I wanted to make sure the LGBT community and struggling couples here in the city had access to such a good facility. That...and you and I really wanted to start a family ourselves. So, the effort was somewhat altruistic."

She smiles, stroking her rounded belly, and getting closer to you. "Aren't you excited?"

"Um...it's just that...wow, that's a lot to think about," you stutter. This really is a lot to take in. One minute, you're your single self just enjoying life to the fullest. Now, you've woken up, you're dating someone and not just anyone, but Batwoman, and now you're about to start a family. This is all moving so fast for you.

She hugs you. "Oh, I know, babe, but I think we can handle it. I've already got designers coming in this weekend to start work on the nursery, and I've already signed us up for some birthing classes. We'll be doing everything we can. And, I think you'll make a fine parent."

"But, what about..."

She waves it off. "The superhero thing? I think we'll be fine. I'm careful. I don't do anything that stupid. And besides, you're always watching my patrols, giving me the best advice for how to stay safe. We've got this."

You think it over. This certainly is a big risk. Superheroes having kids always throws a special wrench in things. Plus, you don't know the first thing about being a parent. Kate seems confident, but you're not so sure of yourself. You never were good with kids when you tried babysitting as a teen. And, if you're being totally honest with yourself, you're not really sure how well this pregnancy is going to go with Kate at her current size. Didn't you read something about obesity having an effect on that sort of thing? Forget about what kind of strain superheroing will do to her, what about her health now? Still, you fake a smile. Maybe you'll get used to it.

"Yeah, we got this," you repeat, hugging her back as your plushy bodies squish against each other.

She notices this and gives you a gentle prod. "And it looks like someone's gaining a little sympathy weight with me. I think that's kind of cute."

You blush, not sure what to say about that. Truth be told, you're still hoping you'll get an answer as to how Kate went from the trim, lithe Batwoman you know from the comics to this. And twice now, she's made some remark about liking you a little heavier. Is this a thing for her? You're not yet sure how you feel about that.

"So, uh...do we know if we're having a boy or a girl yet?" you ask.

She laughs. "A little too soon for that, but give it a few weeks, and we'll know then. Are you sure you want to know? You didn't want it to be a surprise?"

"Well, I don't know. Maybe. So, wait, how much planning have you already done?"

"Not too much. I want you to be involved too. But, I'm just getting some essentials out of the way. Trust me, you're the tech savvy one. I'm letting you pick out all the baby monitors and things like that."

She then leans in for a passionate kiss, and you both are swept up in the moment. Your hands take hold of her ample love handles and you start kneading. For a moment, you're pretty sure something's about to happen right here right now. And frankly, you're excited by that. Maybe Kate really has started to grow on you in the first few hours you've known her. Maybe it's your new self's memories that are kicking in, and you're really starting to feel something for her.

She leans over and you're pressed gently against the table. You're ready to just enjoy the moment, but a loud beeping brings you both back to reality. You turn around to the devices you had been hacking for information. It looks like you got a hit on something.

"What is it?" Kate asks.
1553322223322223232223222222133333223231.title: In the Family Way

choices: "It looks like Sinclair hired a professional, in case the thugs didn't succeed."
"It seems they might have connected you to Batwoman."
Actually, your response was entirely different...
1553322223322223232223222222133333223231.content:
She leans over and you're pressed gently against the table. You're ready to just enjoy the moment, but a loud beeping brings you both back to reality. You turn around to the devices you had been hacking for information. It looks like you got a hit on something.

"What is it?" Kate asks.

From there, upon thoroughly sifting through the newly acquired intel, a bunch of dossiers and encrypted messages popped up on the monitors of both your laptop and tablet. Your eyes swiftly scanned through the available information on-hand, as a smug smirk formed upon your mildly plump feminine face as you answered, "...Well, it looks like I hacked through the encryptions those bastards were using. Hmph, very sloppy. They don't even have backup firewalls to protect their accounts from my malware algorithms."

"*chuckle* That's my girl!" Kate retorted, lightly patting you on the shoulders for a job well done, impressed by your handiwork. Then again, this was most likely something from this reality that you've learned, so it came as probably no surprise to you as to how much of a cakewalk this whole hacking thing came to you.

Eventually, after five long minutes have passed, you found something in the acquired information that stuck out like a sore thumb, which came in the form of the Religion of Crime insignia, which had an encoded message on it that read:

"Sinclair,
It appears that your congregation has a Bat infestation. You are fully responsible for the well-being of your flock. Rid of this Bat infestation, and tear off it's wings. Should you fail to exterminate such a nuisance, we will be foirced to take extreme measures.

We are always watching.

Sincerely, Mother Superior"

"...Well, that doesn't sound good." You bluntly said, obviously aware of what this "Mother Superior" meant by Bat infestation:

Batwoman.

"I'll say. Then again, we shouldn't have not expected them to retaliate in some form." Kate retorted, knowing that the Religion of Crime wasn't going to take such actions against them lying down whatsoever.

*sigh* But still, at least we're doing a damn good job on hitting their operations hard enough for them to fight back." Kate retorted once more, as she wrapped her plump arms around your neck and collarbone area in a tender embrace. Either way, both you and Kate knew that after such an attack, it would be best to retaliate in earnest as well, just as the rotund Kate then asked, "Did you find anything else, sweetie?"

"...Well, yes and no, Kate. The good news is that I was able to retrace the stream of messages back to this "Sinclair" person. He leases a shady nightclub in the Otisburg District called "Knocking on Hell's Door"." You explained, using the tablet to upload a map layout of Gotham City, zooming in on the Otisburg District, pinpointing where the nightclub's location was.

"Alright. So... What's the bad news, then?" Kate queried, feeling like she wasn't exactly going to like the aforementioned bad news, as you exhaled a deep breath, then calmly spoke toward the corpulent red-haired woman and answered, "...Though, as for the bad news, Kate... Well, I'm not going to sugarcoat it, but..."
1553322223322223232223222222133333223231.title: The Contract Kill

choices: Batwoman learns more about this Sinclair, and who he's working for.
Batwoman learns where to find this Sinclair. Time for a little spying.
Batwoman learns why Sinclair put out a hit. Someone has it in for her.
Batwoman learns something shocking. They were after you the whole time!
1553322223322223232223222222133333223231.content:
"But it looks like Sinclair hired a professional, in case the thugs didn't succeed," you say, trembling at the thought.

"So, we're not out of the woods yet," she says, biting the side of her lip, thinking. "Means this professional's got to be on our heels as we speak. Can you figure out who?"

Your fingers clack at the keyboard for several minutes. "It's hard to say. I'm having trouble identifying anyone exactly since they're using secret names in their communications, but all of their correspondence is in Russian." That isn't a good sign in your book. "I can try and follow where these bank accounts lead, but I doubt this guy is stupid enough to create an account in his own name."

She's already waddling off towards her closet. Despite the situation, she seems perfectly calm. "I think you're right that that wouldn't be a good use of your time. Pull up the camera feeds around the house. I don't want this one taking us by surprise this time. Ugh, I'm really going to have to let this suit out a bit."

You can hear her slipping into the now skin-tight Batwoman suit. You're inclined to agree. If she's pregnant and continues to grow at this rate, she's going to need a lot more room. In the meantime, you're keeping your eyes on the outside of the house, trying to conceal your own fear. Two attacks in one day are two too many for you.

Kate returns, now fully donned in her ensemble. She kisses you on the cheek. "Okay, well, I'm off," she says matter-of-factly.

"Wait, what? What about the assassin?"

She laughs a little. "I think he's a little smarter than that. The first attack came to me, and it failed miserably. If anything, he's going to lure me out in three...two..."

You both hear the cackling of the police-frequency radio on your desk. "Reported robbery on Second and Jackson. Suspect is armed and has hostages. Requesting backup."

"That would be my cue," she says. "I have a feeling he's waiting for me there. I won't be long."

She leaves, despite your attempts to protest. She knows you like to be concerned for her. Before long, you go back to your usual duties with her, making sure you're fully connected to watch and listen to everything that's going on. Something still doesn't feel right to you.

As Batwoman bursts into the business being robbed, you see a formidable-looking figure standing at the head of a group of cowering civilians. He's wearing dark clothes, and his face is covered by a black and red mask. Still, you can see the cybernetic eye, scanning Batwoman. You're more worried about the large, metal appendage strapped to his arm. It looks like some kind of super weapon. The man laughs as she approaches.

"Batwoman, as I live and breath," he said in a thick Russian accent. "Honestly, I'm a little surprised. The way the Gotham Bat spoke of you, I was picturing something more athletic. I almost feel bad that this isn't a fair fight."

She smirked. "You haven't seen me in action, KGBeast."

You're startled since you hadn't expected this to be the professional assassin. KGBeast was a well-known killer who had some of the best skills and military training the Soviet KGB had to offer. Not to mention, a lot of his skills had been enhanced thanks to cybernetic technology. You really hope Kate knows what she's doing.

He looks like he's limbering up. "Very well, then. Come quietly, and the civilians will live."

She launches a small grappling hook, which winds around his feet. With a quick tug, she yanks him over towards her. The civilians scatter to the nearest exit without him in their way. "I like these things to be a little more intimate," she says. "Now, it's just you and me."

His brow furrows behind the mask, and he pulls up his weapon arm. Batwoman side steps just as the first bullets are fired. This gives him the opportunity to get back to his feet. The mechanism switches into a machine-gun. He begins firing a spray of bullets in her direction. Despite being a bigger target, she's quick enough to duck away and get behind a counter for cover.

"You can't hide forever," he said, his weapon arm switching into a new mechanism. "Come out and face me."

Trying to put your own fear aside, you try looking for a weak spot. But, Batwoman seems to have already come up with her own plan. Just as KGBeast fired a series of micro-rockets at the counter, Batwoman rolled out from behind and shot a few rubber bullets of her own. They pelted the assassin, and certainly took him by surprise, but they hadn't stopped him in the least. He rushed at her, launching another round of rockets.

The battle goes on and on like this, the two exchanging blows back and forth. You try to get a lock on KGBeast, to see if you can analyze how many bullets he has left. But, Batwoman keeps giving him the slip or throwing a few surprises of her own at him. At long last, she spots her opportunity. She throttles him from behind, her enormous weight throwing him off balance and tumbling to the ground. He lays there, being crushed under her immensity. He gags and coughs, trying to get enough air in.

Batwoman smirks. "I think we've finally reached an impass. You're going to tell me some very important information."

choices: Skinny but ravenous (No extra weight beyond the baby/ies)
A respectable amount of fat (500 to 600 pounds)
Actually, she's much fatter than that.
155332222332222323222322222213333332.content: Hmm, so you decided to go with the most famous version of Batgirl, Barbara Gordon? Well, why not. After all, she is certainly a fan favorite. Now then, how big do you want this lovely redhead to be, hmm?
155332222332222323222322222213333332.title: Barbara Gordon AKA Batgirl.

choices: …a young man and a young woman.
…two young women.
*Cosmic reset: alternate version of this scenario.*
1553322223322223232223222222133333322.content:
Was it a knock that had woken you? You laid there in a daze, trying to piece your mind together. It felt like you had just gotten to sleep a few minutes ago, but the clock showed that five hours had passed since you collapsed into bed.

There it was again: that soft noise that had somehow pierced the veil around your head and dragged you back to consciousness. It wasn’t a knock at the door, it sounded like it was coming from within your home instead. It was probably your refrigerator going out. That old jalopy had been on its last legs when you got it, but it was the best you could do at the time.

With a groan, you threw the covers back and forced yourself up. Grinding your hands against your eyes, you tried to focus and adjust to the near absolute darkness. Within a few steps though you had already rammed your shin into something, cursing under your breath, and trying to figure out what you had hit. Feeling around, you couldn’t tell what it was. Whatever the shin breaker was, you didn’t remember it being there when you had come in last night.

You ended up running into several more things in the darkness along the way. You were getting more and more confused; it felt like the whole room had been rearranged while you slept. A thought wormed into your head, maybe it wasn’t the fridge breaking down, maybe one or more of your friends had decided to play a prank on you and were still working on even more. That seemed more likely when you heard a clatter coming from the kitchen.

Confident in what was going on, you grasped around for the door handle and pulled it open. The hallway wasn’t as dark as your bedroom had been, so you ended up as blind as you had been in the dark. Grumbling, you forced your way on, half feeling your way along the wall. With your eyes screwed shut, you missed the photos along the wall, photos that hadn’t been there before, photos that showed…
1553322223322223232223222222133333322.title: Stumbling through the dark

choices: …slender young woman you had been.
…chubby young woman you had been.
…muscular young woman you had been.
15533222233222232322232222221333333222.content:
You staggered down the last little bit till you came to the main part of your apartment. Cracking your eyes the barest amount you could, you couldn’t comprehend why the place looked so different. It wasn’t just rearranged as you had thought before; every last thing within the room was completely changed. Most of the furniture looked lower and sturdier than it had before.

A thud came from the side and you turned towards the little kitchenette area. Again, it looked quite a bit different than it had when you went to sleep. Everything looked much newer and better able to handle larger amounts of food at the same time. There was also the matter of the large pale rump sticking out of the currently open refrigerator. It was quite honestly the largest ass you had ever seen, and it was right there in front of you, wiggling back and forth in a tiny pair of hot pants as the owner dug around in the depths of the ice chest.

Before you could do anything except have your jaw drop to your chest, a hand reached around the open door and pulled it shut. Now you could see the owner, and that butt certainly fit with how large the rest of the woman was. Enormous breasts stretched her t-shirt to its limits, while the size of her stomach meant that a wide swath was still exposed under the lower hem. In truth, she was the furthest from what you would think of as someone breaking and entering could be.

She looked up you from the triple layer chocolate cake in her hands with a smile on her cherubic face, but not even a hint of any surprise. “Hello, beautiful. Sorry about waking you, but you know how hungry I can get after a long night.”

Without waiting for a response, she turned around and set the cake down on the island behind her. This left her prodigious backside completely exposed to you as if she didn’t have a care in the world. Only now did you realize that there was something very familiar about the young woman’s face, but you couldn’t be quite sure where. You were sure that you had never met a woman with such an incredible girth though. The way she talked to you seemed like she knew you, but you didn’t know her except for a vague sense of familiarity. What in the world was going on here?

In a blur, you turned and ran back to the bathroom, shutting the door behind you. All thoughts of sleep were banished from your mind as you flicked the light on and dashed for the sink. Splashing some cold water in your face and then slapping yourself did nothing to dispel whatever was going on. You could still hear her in the kitchen just beyond the wall, and you could see obvious signs of two women living here even here in the bathroom, let alone everywhere else. Feeling on the verge of hyperventilating, you looked up at the mirror, hoping that you weren’t going crazy. At least not everything had changed; your reflection showed that you were still the same…
15533222233222232322232222221333333222.title: A feminine couple

choices: Within lay a secret room filled with gadgets and a familiar suit.
You stepped into a small space that turned out to be a secret elevator.
The redhead stopped you before you stepped into the darkness.
155332222332222323222322222213333332222.content:
Even as wired as you were from whatever was going on, you could see that nothing was different about yourself. Your reflection still showed exactly the same buxom image that you saw every time you looked in the mirror. The same raven locks framed your face, and the same olive hued skin peeked out from under your nightclothes. After seeing the other young woman though, you now seemed downright skinny in comparison.

“You alright in there?” the other woman called out, breaking you out of your thoughts.

“Yeah,” you responded instinctively.

She muttered something else, but you couldn’t make it out. You tried to piece together what happened, but couldn’t figure it out. It had been a pretty normal night: working late and having to run all over to get everything else done afterwards. Then you crashed out on your bed with barely a thought. There wasn’t any time for something like this to happen, certainly not having another woman living and being quite familiar with you.

You weren’t going to figure much out standing around here though, so you straightened your hair as best you could before shutting off the light and slipping back out the door. The fleshy woman had spent much of the time you were away working on the cake. Already half of the dessert was gone leaving only crumbs behind. She showed no sign of restraint either, slicing off another chunk and devouring it in short order. She chased the latest piece with several chugs of milk before starting with the cake again.

Despite yourself, you found “Do you think you should be eating all that?” spilling from your mouth.

Her lips pulled into a tight smile as she said, “Probably not, but you know how my sweet tooth can get. Plus, I needed a little something tasty after having those ration bars you keep giving me. You really can’t get something else with a flavor that isn’t quite so much like cardboard?”

Mentally scrambling, you mumbled and shrugged. She seemed to be satisfied by your non-answer though. She flicked a loose lock of her fiery hair over her round shoulder before turning her attention back to the cake

Wandering away from her, you decided to check out the rest of the darkened apartment. Even with a bit more light than had been in the bedroom, you ended up running into plenty of furniture because of the differences between how it was and now. Your eyebrow arched as you felt yourself get drawn to a bookcase that hadn’t been there before. Looking it over, you recognized a few of the items there: some of the books you had owned before, a sculpture you had picked up at independent art show a couple of years back, and so on.

Your gaze kept returning to one of the many items you didn’t recognize. It was a lump of pale crystal shaped into a rough sphere. You didn’t know why, but you raised your arm and cupped your hand around the top of it. Nothing happened, but then you felt an odd twinge within your mind and you shifted your fingers into a much more awkward grip. That triggered something, because the crystal grew warm in your grasp and there was a muted clank.

Before you could react, the bookcase slid sideways across the floor. Within a few moments, a hidden doorway was revealed. Complete darkness lay beyond, but your feet carried you forwards nevertheless.
155332222332222323222322222213333332222.title: Red and black

choices: Back in the bedroom…
Come the morning, the two of you share a breakfast feast.
You freeze as an alarm starts sounding from one of the computers.
1553322223322223232223222222133333322221.content:
Soft lighting flicked on as soon as you crossed the threshold, and the quiet hum of computers filled the air. A bank of monitors lining one wall all lit up, displaying news feeds, social media sites, and more. A few tables stretched through the middle of the room, their surfaces covered with a wide array of tools and gadgets. The one thing that drew your attention the most though was a floor to ceiling Plexiglas tube. It was obviously made to protect the suit that draped across the form within.

You jaw dropped again as you came closer to the tube and tried to make sense of what you were seeing. There was no denying it though; the suit within was certainly the costume belonging to Batgirl. Or at least a version of the outfit made for a Batgirl much, much fatter than she had usually shown as. Your surprise only deepened as you realized the woman that was just outside could only be Barbara Gordon, the Batgirl, made flesh, quite a lot of flesh too. That was why her face had seemed so familiar to you despite never meeting her.

You stumbled back from the case, backing into one of the tables and catching your hand on one of the batarangs that lay there. You gaped at the little chunk of metal in your grasp before dropping it back where it came from.

Your mind whirled with the thoughts about what was going on. Somehow, you had been brought into another world or Barbara had been brought into yours. In any case, the much fleshier young woman was living with you. Judging from the little bit she said to you as well as how she looked at you, it even seemed that the two of you were a couple in whatever world this was. The more you thought about it, the less this seemed to be a problem. It was weird beyond belief, but maybe you could get used to being in a relationship with such a beautifully bloated version of the brainy redhead.

Blinking your eyes, you realized that you had been staring at a set of screens without taking them in. Now you saw that they displayed a collection of numbers, lines, and graphs. You couldn’t make much sense of it, but from what little you did understand, you got the sense that you were looking at medical data. One pair of numbers stood out though, the first showed 525 next to the words “Current Load”. While the other showed 700 next to “Maximum Safe Load”. You frowned as you tried to figure out what this had to do with what appeared to be medical data filling the rest of this set of screens.

Wait…could it be…? you mused as you believed you figured it out. Is this really Barbara’s current weight? And this bit turning your gaze to the larger number Can she really end up carrying this much?

Interrupting your whirling thoughts was a soft weight pressed against your back, while a pair of wide arms encircled you. You hadn’t even heard her coming into the room, let alone get right behind you.

“Aw…you just had to come in and check up on me? That’s so sweet,” she purred against your neck, her breath warm and tickling against your skin.

You shivered in delight as the warmth from her flesh flowed into yours. Meanwhile your nose filled with a subtle floral scent mingling with a hint of chocolate. Squirming around, you came face to face with her. A wide beaming smile dimpled her rounded cheeks. Squeezing you tighter to get you close enough, she gave you a long lingering kiss that took your breath away.

“I have to tell you, you did wonderful, darling. That upgrade you did to my chip worked like a charm. I’m positive that I was moving even better tonight than I did back before all this.”

“It was my pleasure,” was the first thing that came to your tongue even though you had no idea what she was talking about.

“Hmm…well, when you’re finished here, maybe we’ll share a bit of that pleasure?” she said with a sultry tone.

She then let you go and swept from the room, her rump swaying back and forth, up and down. You couldn’t tear your eyes away from it till she was out of sight. Despite her size, she walked with a casual grace and ease that you weren’t sure could be matched in a woman a fraction her weight. A quick shake of your head, and you realized what she had hinted at. Licking your lips and getting the taste of the cake mixed with her flavor, you spared one last glance at the screens before heading for the door.
1553322223322223232223222222133333322221.title: The secret within the walls

choices: “You’re supposed to be at the clinic today.”
“We were going to check that weird shop out today.”
“We’re supposed to meet my father later.”
1553322223322223232223222222133333322221.content:
Retracing your steps, it felt like your heart might beat out of your chest at any moment. Out of the corner of your eye, you noticed the pictures you missed before, but paid little heed to them. Instead, you kept your focus on the bedroom door and the darkness beyond.

Slipping through the door, you frowned upon seeing no sign of Barbara. Before you could move any further, the door swung shut behind you and you were again all but smothered by the bulging blubber. A slight chuckle reached your ears as her breath teased the back of your neck. Her hands roamed down across your body, one stopping to caress one of your breasts while the other continued a bit further to dig into your stomach.

Reaching back, you managed to dig your own fingers into the vast expanse of her stomach. The soft flesh oozed through your fingers, letting your hands sink deep. A quiet gasp broke from Barbara’s mouth before she started to nibble on your earlobe, rolling the little bud between her teeth.

In a flash, you found yourself turned around facing Barbara again. Before you could react, your shirt was discarded. You could barely see it, but you heard enough that you were sure that the redhead had removed her shirt as well. Sure enough, your blind groping revealed that every square foot of her titanic torso was laid bare. She giggled as your hand glided across her body. As you had been expecting, you soon felt her reaching for and removing your shorts before hers dropped to the floor.

You hadn’t been expecting to suddenly find yourself pinned under the hundreds of pounds of blubber, but that’s exactly what happened. She nuzzled and kissed your neck, while you panted and gasped for breath. The crushing weight was painful, but also pleasurable and stimulating. On the edge of passing out, she gripped you and flipped over so that you were now riding atop the swell of her body. You could feel how her chest heaved with her breath, eager for whatever you might do next.

What followed boggled your mind. It felt like you were operating more on instinct than conscious thought. You immersed yourself in bringing the obese redhead to ever higher plateaus of pleasure. She repaid you in kind, just as earnest as you were. Soon the two of you were slick with sweat and the bedding was everywhere except on the bed.

At the end, Barbara gave you one last loving kiss before she slipped into a much deserved sleep, a light snore slipping forth as she slept. You remained cuddled against her bulk, running your hand across her stomach, feeling how it enveloped your fingers, all but begging to be touched. Despite being completely worn out again, you felt around and tried to cover the two of you the best you could. It wasn’t a perfect job, but it would have to do.

When you woke up the next morning, you had a fleeting memory of some strange dreams. There seemed to be some green-cloaked figure in every last one, always in the distance watching, and hard to focus on and remember anything beyond the barest specifics. Shaking it off, you gave Barbara a quick peck on the cheek. She mumbled something in her sleep; you thought it might have included something about cheese. Slipping out of trashed bed, you couldn’t help by run your fingers across the expanse of her bulging stomach again. You could already feel a bit of heat spreading up your neck as you shuffled along and headed for the bathroom.

After a quick shower, your feet soon carried you to the kitchen. You were feeling a bit puckish, and now that you thought of it, Barbara would likely end up with quite a bit of hunger as well. Again, your body seemed to act more of its own accord and soon you were preparing a veritable feast. You almost jumped out of your skin when Barbara snuck up on you yet again, hugging you tight and resting her flabby chin on your shoulder.

“Hmm…smells wonderful,” she said.

Releasing you, she snagged one of the slices of toast you had prepared. She bit into it, the melted butter starting to leak down her chin, as she took a seat at the kitchen’s island. Turning your attention back to the food, you could feel her eyes boring holes in your back.

“Is…everything alright?” she asked hesitantly. “You…haven’t seemed…like yourself…since last night.”

“What, no, I’m fine, just fine,” you said, trying to keep your voice from betraying you, though you were only somewhat successful.

You tried to cover this up by hurrying to serve up the many breakfast items you had thrown together into a fantastic spread. Anytime you looked at the redhead, it was obvious that she wasn’t quite believing you, but wasn’t willing to push the issue yet either.

Several bites in, and you were impressed with how good everything tasted. You hadn’t quite been able to make much of anything in your old place, between not having the time or the will. Whatever was going on now though seemed to have given you quite a boost in your culinary skills.

“So when do you want to go?” Barbara asked after washing down some of her omelet with a gulp of milk.

“Go?” you asked, furrowing your brow.

“Yes, go, don’t you remember?” her expression turning more towards worry now.
1553322223322223232223222222133333322221.title: Heating things up

choices: Ms. Rosenthal's Whacky Candy Boutique. Time for some investigating!
Ms. Rosenthal's Whacky Candy Boutique. But...it seemed empty.
Actually, something else happened instead...
1553322223322223232223222222133333322221.content:
"So when do you want to go?" Barbara asked after washing down some of her omelet with a gulp of milk.

"Go?" You asked, furrowing your brow.

"Yes, go. Don't you remember?" Her expression turning more towards worry now. But as she casually stood up to put away some of the now-empty dishes and explained, "We were going to check that weird shop out today, Ms. Rosenthal's Whacky Candy Boutique."

With a few audible *clacks* and *clangs*, Barbara put the dishes in the enormous double-door dishwasher, where she then faced you once more and elaborated, "They just opened shop almost a week ago, and several of the girls I know in Burnside went in there and have gone missing since then."

From there, the rotund redhead calmly waddled up to you, placing her plump hands upon your shoulders and questioned, "...Are you sure you're feeling up to it, (Name)?" Somehow, she could see right through your harmless deception. But then again, her father was and still is the Police Commissioner of the GCPD, not to mention being trained by the Dark Knight of all people.

Inevitably, in response, you exhaled a sigh and unconsciously replied, "I'm sorry, Babs. It's just that...I-I am worried that one of us might get caught by whoever kidnapped those girls. I know we have a responsibility to protecting everyone in Burnside, but...*sigh*...It's just that I don't want to see you get hurt again like what Joker did to you."

"I know, sweetie." Barbara answered, planting a longing kiss upon your lips for a minute or two, then severed the kiss and calmly reassured, "...But I am more worried about you than my own well-being. I mean, as much as I prefer you behind the monitors, I'm afraid we have no choice in the matter."

"But how about this, then? After we do a little bit of field recon, why don't we go out on an afternoon date at that Ice Cream parlor you love so much? We could get some of that Couple's Double Strawberry and Chocolate Smoothie~" Barbara quipped, ending that last sentence in a charmingly tempting sing-song tone, which seemed to be quite effective in making you decide.

"*sigh* Alright, alright! You win, Babs. You sure like to temoot my sweet tooth, don't you?" You confessed, where Barbara then giggled a little, then gave you a quick peck on the cheek and retorted, "*giggle* What can I say? I tease because I love, (Name). Now come on, let's get ourselves dressed."

-- 30 Minutes Later... --

After getting yourselves dressed, you and Barbara were currently taking a leisurely stroll along the streets of Burnside. It was official: Somehow, you must've been transported into the DC Universe, because you could easily see Wayne Tower off in the distance, which stood tall amongst Gotham City's skyline.

Currently, you were wearing a pair of skinny jeans that did little to conceal your chubby lower half, as well as a pair of beige flat sneakers, complete with a magenta T-shirt that did little to conceal your cute bump of a chubby belly, along with a leather purse holstered around your right shoulder.

But Barbara on the other hand, her choice of attire did little to disguise her enormity. In appearance, she wore a pair of blue sweatpants, which stretched over her rotund physique, along with bolstering her apron belly underneath it's polyester fabric. On her feet, she wore a pair of well-fitting leisure sneakers over a pair of yellow cotton socks with the Batman symbol sewed onto them. Meanwhile, up on her torso, she wore a purple t-shirt with the words "I'm Large & In Charge! Got A Problem With That?" emblazoned on the front in big bloated letters, which she wore underneath a jacket that was secretly a reverse jacket for her Batgirl costume, just in case for a quick emergency that requires Batgirl. She also carried a decently large but baggy purse with her, which secretly held her Batgirl cowl inside a concealed compartment.

Overall, the two of you certainly looked fabulous together.

Eventually, after 15 Minutes of walking and one or two brief stops at some local food vendors, you and Barbara had reached...
1553322223322223232223222222133333322221.title: Cooperative Investigation

choices: The two of you follow the huge woman and try to get some info from her.
She drags you to the store to try getting some answers inside.
Before you two get too far, someone comes out of the store chasing the woman.
1553322223322223232223222222133333322221.content:
"What in the world…?” Barbara muttered as the two of you turned the last corner.

Two buildings further down across the street, you could make out the bright and colorful sign of Ms. Rosenthal's Whacky Candy Boutique. Despite being the middle of the day however, the inside of the store was dark and the sign in the door was turned over to closed.

“They’re supposed to be open right now,” she said, coming to a stop so quickly that you all but ran into her rump.

“You sure?” you asked, slipping around her and trying to be nonchalant as you looked the store over.

The sunlight streaming in through the plate glass windows illuminated racks upon racks of candies and confections. It was half hidden in the shadows, but you thought you could make out a very creepy looking candy elf figure raised on a stand in the middle of the main room. You felt a shiver pass down your spine as you tried in vain to tear your eyes away from the pinwheel mints that formed the elf’s eyes.

Barbara’s voice tore through whatever was enveloping your mind. “Yes, I’m sure. Look, you can even see the open hours from here.”

Following her pointing finger, you saw that the store was indeed supposed to be open right now. According to the black and white numbers, they should have been opened about three hours ago.

“Well, they’re obviously not open right now, so what do you want to do?” turning back to Barbara, being careful to not look at the elf statue again.

The rotund redhead nibbled on her lip, her head tilting back and forth. As you waited, you had the oddest sensation as if you were being watched, the hairs on the back of your neck rising. A quick glance around showed no sign of anyone paying any particular attention to you. The few people out and about on this street were more focused on Barbara, but it seemed to be more curiosity about her exceptional girth than anything ill willed.

“Here, we’ll make a quick stop at this place and just keep an eye out for right now,” she said after a few more moments.

As the words left her mouth, she grabbed your arm and all but dragged you along. You stumbled but managed to get your feet back under you before you fell flat on your face. Her target turned out to be a little street side café, one with an open air seating area outside the door. It was a perfect place to wait and watch, at least in your opinion.

Several minutes later, you sat down at a table that provided you a good view of the store. You had to make two extra trips to get your own order of a coffee and donut, as well as helping Barbara with hers. Despite the large breakfast earlier and the snacks along the way, the blubbery Batgirl ordered three donuts, two sandwiches, a croissant, and an extra large latte. She dug in with gusto while you picked at your snack and kept an eye on the storefront.

Ten minutes passed, and then twenty without any sign of anything happening at the store. Barbara had long finished off her food and was making good headway on her drink. Even with your lethargic pace, you had also finished off your snack. You were about to ask if she wanted to do something a bit more proactive when someone caught your eye. Your mouth dropped open in surprise. The brunette waddling down the sidewalk put even Barbara to shame with her bulk. She had to be in the neighborhood of seven to eight hundred pounds, yet she could still walk. It was an obvious strain though, her tanned skin was shiny with sweat and her breathing was a constant panting.

“Oh my god…” Barbara muttered.

“I know, how in the world is she still moving around?” you responded.

“No, not that, well yes, there is that…But the main thing I mean is that I’ve seen her before. It was just a couple days ago. She was pudgy yes, but she wasn’t nearly that massive.”

You scoffed, “What, you mean that she ballooned that far within a matter of days?”

Turning back to face Barbara, you saw that she wasn’t joking around, she really meant it. An icy fist gripped your stomach. Turning back to the immense woman, you saw that she had stopped at the candy shop and was trying in vain to get through the locked door.

You then heard the woman shout, “No, no, you can’t be closed! You can’t!”

She hit the unyielding door with a meaty fist one last time before turning around. She looked around in a wide eyed panic for a second before adjusting the hot pink jogging suit that did little cover up her vastness. She then waddled off again, heading back the way she came with a bit more downcast expression.

“Well, that was strange,” you muttered while stroking your chin.

You were about to ask Barbara what she wanted to do when you felt her grab your arm yet again and drag you along just as before.
1553322223322223232223222222133333322221.title: Strange happenings

choices: From there, you & Babs met up with Frankie at an Ice Cream Parlour.
Later on, Barbara went out as Batgirl to investigate the Candy Boutique.
But then, a whole mob of plump girls ran towards the Candy Boutique.
1553322223322223232223222222133333322221.content:
From there, you and Barbara cautiously followed the elephantine brunette, who waddled at a distressed pace, despite her sheer enormity. Fortunately for the two of you, you and Barbara easily kept pace with the large individual, especially since both you and Barbara were noticeably lighter than the exasperated blob of a girl, whilst keeping a good enough distance as to avoid arousing the woman's suspicions.

After following the large girthy brunette for a good thirty minutes, she clumsily waddled into a nearby alleyway, where Barbara soon tugged you along with her into the alleyway. But then, out of surprise, Barbara soon playfully tackled the larger woman against a limestone wall, as if greeting an old friend, where the rotund redhead then said, "Hey there, Denise!"

In response, the 700 to 800 pound brunette clumsily stood back up, turned around upon recognizing Barbara's voice and meekly retorted, "Oh! Um... H-Hi there, Babs. I...I-I didn't expect to bump into y-you out here." "Oh come now, Denise! We attend some of the same classes together at the University." Barbara chuckled, putting on a rather friendly and jovial demeanor, despite her internal feelings of concern for her friend.

"I'm sure you remember my girlfriend, (Name), don't you Denise?" Barbara quipped, gesturing Denise over to you, where she timidly waved at you as if she was experiencing some sort of withdrawal. From there, the rotund redhead soon spoke back toward you in a jovial manner and said, "Sweetie, I'm sure you remember my fellow I.T classmate, Denise Chavez?"

Of course, as Barbara said her words, your mind somehow caught you up to speed with who Denise was and how she knew Barbara Gordon, as if you were a part of this world for quite some time. "Yeah, nice to see you again, Denise." You stated, trying not to sound suspicious in any possible way.

"I-It's nice seeing you two, b-b-but I really need to head somewhere--" Denise hesitantly retorted, behaving as if she was in desperate need of something. But fortunately, Babs had a good grip on her, thus preventing the larger woman from waddling off, as the redhead then replied, "Come on now, Denise! We're all friends here. Well, technically me and (Name) here ate girlfriend and girlfriend, but that's not the point. We haven't seen you for a little while now. I mean, Esme, Frankie, Alysia, and the others haven't seen you for some time now."

But of course, you and Babs could see that twinge of guilt upon Denise's rounded face, as Barbara laid a semi-plump hand upon the heavier brunette's plump shoulder and asked, "...Can you at least tell us what you've been doing all this time?"

For a moment or two, Denise didn't speak a word. But then, out of nervous impulse, she blatantly blared, "Okay, Okay, I give up!! I...I-I've been cheating on my diet, Babs." In response, Barbara appeared to have a mildly surprised expression on her chubby face, as she soon regained her cheery composure, which was now mixed in with a twinge of concern.

"...But why, Denise? What made you want to cheat on your diet? I thought you and Richard were an item." Barbara asked, placing her semi-plump hands upon her wide burgeoning hips and waistline. From there, Denise began to instinctively fidget with her chubby fingers, which was troublesome due to her now elephantine proportions, as the bulky brunette then answered, "W-We st-still are, Red. ...Or at least, I-I still hope we are after my compulsive binging."

"Yeah, I can see that, Denise. I mean, you look like you're a little over a hundred pounds heavier than me. What's your secret?" Babs chortled, trying to sweet talk with the obviously stressed brunette in order to hopefully get some answers. Luckily, it seemed to do the trick, as Denise's demeanor seemed to have almost instantaneously switched from meek and timid to exonerated and jovial, as Denise then joyfully rambled, "Oh, it's because of that new candy shop, Ms. Rosenthal's Whacky Candy Boutique! Have you heard of it? Their candy is absolutely delicious! It's like tasting a slice of Heaven!"

Her face soon displaying a gleefully excited dimpled grin upon her round face upon seeing what she received.

I downloaded their SWEET.TOOTH App from the store's website to get the latest news on what they have in stock. I'm sorry, but I really need to go! Talk to you all later!"

And with that, Denise began to hurriedly waddle off back towards the Ms. Rosenthal's Whacky Candy Boutique from earlier. Or at least, as much as the brunette could handle with so much bulk and girth. Left behind at the alleyway, you and Barbara looked at one another, easily noticing the suspicious coincidence that occurred.

I noticed that look in her eyes just before she, um "waddled" off. She had the dilated eyes of someone addicted to drugs, Barb."

"I noticed too, (Name). She looked as if she was experiencing some sort of withdrawal before she got that notification. I got a hunch that that so-called "Candy Boutique" might be hiding some sinister skeletons in their storage rooms." Barbara replied, using air quotations on the word "Candy Boutique", as if something suspicious was clearly going on with that candy shop.

From there, Barbara soon spoke up toward you and stated, "We better meet up with Frankie and tell her what's going on." "Agreed." You unconsciously confirmed, as if you weren't in control of yourself for a few brief moments. However, you knew there was no backing out of this now.

1553322223322223232223222222133333322221.content:
“So what, Babs, you really think there’s drugs or something in that candy?” Frankie asked with an obvious edge of skepticism.

“Why would I lie about something like this, Frankie?” Barbara responded. Then turning to you, “Come on, tell her you saw it too.”

“It’s true; it really looked like she was going through withdrawal. She was fidgety, her eyes were dilated, the whole nine yards.”

The dark haired woman across the table rolled her head back and forth. “Little Denise definitely wasn’t one to do drugs or anything like that on her own…and Richard wouldn’t have gotten her started on anything like that either, so there’s definitely something up.”

You noticed how Barbara had skipped over the part where in addition to the suspected drugs, the other young woman had also ballooned hundreds of pounds in a matter of days. Not surprising though considering how unbelievable it sounded. You could only just keep a grimace from crossing your face as you also thought Almost as unbelievable as a person waking up in a comic book made real with the main character bloated up hundreds of pounds as well.

“Plus there is the disappearances going on, and it all has something to do with that shop,” Barbara said, stabbing the table with a sausage-like finger.

“Alright, alright, you convinced me,” Frankie said, all the while making a calming motion with her hands. “So what are the two of you going to do about it?”

Rather than answer, Barbara held up a subtle warning finger. Neither you nor Frankie had noticed, but your orders were soon dropped off. Your eyes almost fell out of your head at seeing the ice cream treat dropped before you and Barbara. Despite being glass, what the smoothie came in was something you would consider more akin to a bucket in size. Swirls of red and brown were half hidden beneath a copious amount of whipped cream. Twin straws were punched into the icy mass, each bent to allow easy drinking.

Before you could overcome your shock, Barbara bent forward – her flesh oozing around the table as she did so – and locked her lips around the straw closest to her. She took more than a few gulps, and you could even see the level of the smoothie drop bit by bit.

Sitting back with a sigh, she smacked her lips a few times before saying, “Hmm, I think it’s even better than it was before. Are you going to have any?”

With a start, you realized that she was asking that of you, “Oh, yeah…”

Grabbing your own straw, you gave a tentative suck. The taste was better than you had been expecting, so much so that you drank a number of mouthfuls before you sat back again. Looking up, you saw that Frankie seemed a bit frazzled at seeing the two of you having so much of a sweet treat, especially with Barbara’s rather noticeable size.

Her expression smoothed as quick as it had appeared, and she again asked, this time in a quieter voice, “So what are the two of you going to do about all this?”

Barbara sucked down more of the smoothie before answering.

-- 5:30 PM --
-- 4 & A Half Hours Later --
-- Burnside District, Gotham City --

The sun was already setting upon the bustling borough of Burnside. But as the district's economy switched to the risque nightlife, a certain rotund Caped crime fighter swiftly jumped from rooftop to rooftop with mostly relative ease.

Despite now weighing a bit over a quarter ton, Batgirl sprinted her way across the numerous Burnside rooftops, with her contemporary costume keeping her girth well contained, even though it violently rippled and jiggled like an ocean in a storm whilst she sprinted and parkoured her way amongst the concrete and neon jungle that was Burnside.

After traversing across what could only be 7 blocks from her apartment building, Batgirl used a newly improved and somewhat stronger version of her Grapnel Gun to launch herself up to a nearby rooftop, landing on said rooftop with little difficulty, even with her excess bulk.

Once she perched herself upon the ledge of the building rooftop overlooking Denise's apartment building, Batgirl then pulled out the touch phone Qadir had given her during one of her earliest cases in Burnside, where she dial to an encrypted contact, put the phone before her and said, "Alright, guys. I'm currently overlooking Denise's apartment building."

Frankie replied, communicating with the rotund Batgirl via Bluetooth earpiece laced with heavy security encryptions. While Barbara was out there as Batgirl, you and Frankie were currently back at the apartment, residing within the secret room, where Frankie was sitting at the Main Monitor, keeping tabs on Barb's current whereabouts, while you kept your eyes on the computer screens that monitored Batgirls vitals.

Suffice to say, the three of you were a surprisingly well-oiled machine.

Meanwhile, Batgirl fired her Grapnel Gun at the apartment building, zipping her way onto the fire escape. Fortunately, it had a maximum weight capacity of 1,200 pounds due to it's sturdy construction. From there, the obese Batgirl soon made her way inside Denise's apartment, which was on the third floor. Though luckily for the female crime fighter, despite her rotund girthy frame, she was able to squeeze through the large window to the woman's dwellings with little difficulty, as she quietly stepped onto the hardwood flooring to avoid arousing suspicion from the other tenants.

Almost as if it was expected by this point Denise's apartment was blackened by lack of occupancy. In response to such stygian environs, Batgirl reached for her utility belt and pulled out a small but powerful flashlight, and cautiously aimed in almost every nook and cranny before.

Still in contact with you and Frankie, Batgirl then contacted the two of you and hushly answered, "Frankie, (Name), I'm already inside Denise's place."

"Well? See anything that could help us figure out what's gotten into her?" Frankie queried, as Batgirl calmly yet cautiously made her way around the Hispanic brunette's dwellings, leaving no stone unturned in the process, despite the darkened facade of an apartment.

Soon, after only a few measly minutes of investigating, Batgirl soon came across a noticeable sight...
