1553322223322223232223222222133333333322.content:
Meanwhile, back on street level, you easily notice that for some strange reason Karen wasn't retaliating in force like she usually does. Of course, the subconscious synapses in your mind was blaring out numerous red flags to tell you that something was DEFINITELY wrong, as you watched as Satanna kept bashing at Power Girl with that high-tech hammer.

You figured that Power Girl's submissive state was somehow connected to that hammer Satanna was wielding, which meant that you had to do something and fast. Off to your right, you saw a nearby police officer about to aim his gun at the villainess, so you instinctively rushed toward the officer, yanked the gun out of his grasp, and then fired a shot at Satanna, which grazed the plating of her Leopard-Patterned Power Armor, which easily got Satanna's attention as you yelled, "HEY!! OVER HERE, YOU CRAZY BITCH!!! HOW ABOUT YOU PICK ON SOMEONE WHO HAS A BIGGER EGO THAN YOU!?!?!"

"(Name), what the hell are you doing?!" Karen thought, as she witnessed what you were doing, which seemed to be getting on Satanna's nerves quite easily, where the villainess then looked back the massive Killer Whale Kaiju and growlingly commanded, "Orzul: Keep Power Girl restrained! I have an insolent annoyance to crush."

As if it was a loyal soldier, the giant Killer Whale Kaiju (now known to be called "Orzul") nodded it's Orca head in confirmation, as Satanna then leapt off the creature's elongated arm, falling toward street level with a crater-making KRAKOOM!! in the process.

From there, she stood up from where she landed, wielding the high-tech hammer in her hands, lightly smacking the hammer's head against her Power Armor gauntlet twice or thrice, slowly approaching you in a eerily calm manner as she growled, "...Now, what did you just call me?"

"You heard me, you hammer-wielding psycho: I called you a crazy bitch!" You quipped, raising your arms out to the sides in a taunting manner, where you then continued, "Are you gonna just stand there for posture, or are you going to prove me wrong, you Lex Luthor wannabe!?!"

Good news: You managed to grab Satanna's attention. The bad news, however, is that she wants to bash your brains in with that hammer of her's, as you then began to haul ass into a nearby alleyway, with Satanna hot on your trail, causing loads of collateral damage in her determination to rip you a new one, but at least she isn't focused on Power Girl for the time being.

You bobbed and weaved through the alleyways, avoiding Satanna's attacks to the best of your ability. However, for a brief moment, you lost Satanna for a second or two, only for her to flank you by barreling through a nearby wall, where she then grabbed you by the throat and pinned you against the side of a building.

You struggled somewhat to free yourself, but Satanna tightened her grip, sneering at you as she said, "Not so tough now when you're held by the throat, huh? Now, who are YOU to confront me?"

"*grunt* Name's John Doe, and you can kiss my ass, you psycho!!" You growled, taunting her with a false alias, which Satanna rewarded you by bashing the head of her hammer against your gut, causing you to spit out a bit of blood in response.

"You must think you're quite brave, saving a self-aggrandizing bitch who fancies herself as a so-called "Hero"." Satanna retorted, which only embolden your resolve to help buy Power Girl some time to recover her strength, as you then mocked the villainess some more as you then taunted, "And here I am, being lectured by a woman who's head over heels with a crazed lunatic who transferred his brain into a Gorilla. Face it, Satanna: Power Girl is better than you and that damn dirty ape boyfriend of yours!"

Obviously now more pissed off thanks to your insults, Satanna bashed you with her hammer once more, then violently tossed through another wall, launching you through it, as you then painfully skidded against the street pavement, blood dripping down the side of your face, as you sluggishly stood up onto your own two feet, as Satanna calmly approached you, where you then raised your fists into a combative stance, despite your bloodied and bruised state.

"I can do this all day, you crazy girl. Bring it on!" You muttered under your breath, as you then recklessly rushed at Satanna, futilely delivering several quick jabs against her armored abdomen, bruising your hands a bit more, which Satanna then rewarded you with a Power Armor booted Push Kick to your sternum, violently launching you into a nearby marketplace.

And yet, even through the bruised muscles and broken bones, you knew you had to stall Satanna long enough for Power Girl to recover, as you fought through the pain to stand up once more. However, you soon felt a cold metallic hand grasp around your neck once more, as Satanna now bore a sadistic grin on her face, as gravity increased the pain receptors in your brain from your received injuries, where Satanna then hissed, "...Any more jesterly jabs at before I pulverize you into a bloody smear?"

But then, as you had always hoped, Power Girl then appeared just nine feet behind Satanna, using her Kryptonian Flight to avoid detection. You looked back at Satanna with a smug look on your bruised face, as you then raised a middle finger towards the armored villainess whilst you spoke in Japanese as you replied, "...Yeah... Jigoku ni iki, meinu (Go to Hell, bitch)."

But suddenly, before Satanna could even figure out what you just said to her, Power Girl swiftly unleashed a powerful Right Hook upon the side of Satanna's head, instantly knocking out the villainess in one clean hit, causing Satanna to collapse to the floor in a loud THUD!!, due to the heavy exosuit she wore.

But as you were about to fall once more onto the floor as well, Power Girl swiftly grabbed and held you aloft, bearing a very concerned look on her face, as you looked at her and she said, "You...Idiot. What were you thinking?"

"*bloody cough* Sorry about that. Was trying to buy you some time, Pee-Gee." You apologized, as Power Girl then carefully laid you against a nearby wall, where she then proceeded to easily peel the suit of Power Armor off the unconscious Satanna, balling up the armor and tossing it aside, as you then asked, "...What about Satanna's pet Kaiju? Shouldn't you be *bloody cough* taking...care of it?"

"Don't worry, I managed to give it a nasty concussion while you were busy with Satanna. The JSDF should arrive very soon." Power Girl elaborated, as you slowly but surely began to lose consciousness, most likely from the thrashing Satanna had given you, as you sluggishly replied, "That's...good to...hear....."

Your head slumped to the side some, as you soon fell unconscious, as the very last thing you heard was Power Girl's voice, which beared an extremely worried tone as she exclaimed, "...(Name)? (NAME)!?!"

1553322223322223232223222222133333333322.content:
They say that "Your whole life could flash before your eyes at any given moment".

And for you, well... That couldn't be farther from the truth. The last thing you remember before succumbing to exhaustion was seeing that Karen was alright and intact. That was all you were ever worried about while you kept Satanna distracted.

Suffice to say, you couldn't keep yourself awake long enough to see Power Girl carry you to someplace that can heal your wounds, as your life dangled by a thread due to your extensive injuries.

-- A Few Hours Later... --

You slowly regained consciousness, hearing the faint beeping sounds of a Hospital I.V Monitor. At first, your vision was blurry at best, but it slowly but surely dilated to compensate for the increased brightness. Eventually, you began to regain basic motor functions in your limbs and muscles, only to feel some of the pain you've received from Satanna, clenching your teeth as you carefully propped yourself up in an angled sitting position.

Come to think of it, you noticed that you were now inside what apoeared to be a hospital room. You placed a hand against your forehead, noticing that it was properly bandaged to prevent any further bleeding, where you said aloud, "...Where the hell am I?"

"You're in the Justice League Watchtower." A voice rang out, which had a masculine yet suave tone to it. In response, you quickly turned your gaze toward the source of the voice, which revealed a rather surprising individual standing in the doorway, arms crossed.

In appearance, he was undoubtedly African American, with short black hair, and the left upper hemisphere of his head bearing a cybernetic scalp, brow, and a glowing red cybernetic eye, with the rest of him was covered in a metallic cybernetic form. Of course, you soon realize who you were facing, as you stammered, "Wait, I know you! You're Cyborg! From the Teen Titans!"

In response to your words, he couldn't help but smirk a little upon knowing that you recognize him, as he uncrossed his arms and replied, "*chuckle* Always nice to meet a fan. Glad to see you didn't suffer any extensive brain damage."

"...Brain damage? What're you talking about?" You asked, as Cyborg walked up to your I.V Monitor and had a holographic Heads-Up Display appear on his cybernetic arm, tapping away at it whilst checking your vitals and explained, "...Let me recap: You distracted Satanna, in order to buy Power Girl enough time to recover. Gotta say, you're one crazy S.O.B to do something like that on your own, especially since she was wearing a LexCorp Warsuit."

Of course, what Cyborg just said definitely jogged your memory enough to remember what had happened to you, where you then became more concerned about Karen, as you then queried, "...What about Kar-- Er, I mean, Power Girl? Is she alright?"

"Look to your right." He quipped, where you promptly turned your head to your right, only to see a sleeping Power Girl, still wearing her iconic outfit, as she was on her knees, leaning against the hospital bed in an unconscious state. Seeing her relatively unharmed certainly reassured you of your worries, where Cyborg then retorted, "...Don't worry. I was already well-aware of who she is long before she started dating you, (Name)."

"But...Why did she bring me here instead of a regular hospital, Cyborg?" You asked, wondering why Karen brought you to the Justice League's headquarters instead of one of the handful of hospitals in Tokyo. Of course, Cupyborg smirked a bit from your question, as he then answered, "...Well, for one, the nearest hospital from your location was severely damaged by that Killer Whale Kaiju during the initial stages of it's attack. And second, you were badly injured in numerous places and needed immediate medical attention. We're talking about a fractured sternum, mildly fractured scalp, multiple sprained and torn muscles, and a punctured left lung. You're lucky to even be alive."

From what Cyborg just said to you, it sounded like you were more injured than you previously thought, as you gently caressed Karen's mid-length blonde hair out of self-reassurance. From there, you spoke back toward the cybernetic superhero and said, "...How long was I out?"

"...I'd say about 4 hours, 23 minutes, and 15 seconds. Thankfully, the Watchtower is equipped with the most advanced medical equipment in the world, otherwise you would have died from your injuries. Though, you had to be either very brave or reckless to take on someone wearing a LexCorp Warsuit." Cyborg elaborated, as he was finished with your medical evaluation and said, "Okay, then. Your body's reacting positively towards the nanites that were injected into you. With luck, you should heal up in a few days at best."

Weirdly enough, you weren't in complete shock from learning that they injected nanobots into you. Then again, you had become well-adjusted to this world, so this didn't surprise you whatsoever these days. From there, you saw Cyborg proceed towards the door, whilst he spoke toward you and said, "...I'll Let you know if anything changes."

And with that, you were left alone with a slumbering rotund Power Girl, as you gently stroke her hair with love.

1553322223322223232223222222133333333322.content:
And with that, you were left alone with a slumbering rotund Power Girl, as you gently stroke her hair with love and compassion. Of course, a few moments later, you soon felt Karen slowly but surely stir from her slumber, slowly raising her head to look at you, as you beared a relieved smile upon your face and quipped, "Morning, sleepyhead."

In response, despite her substantially larger physique, Karen quickly shot up from her current position and wrapped her thick arms around you, with her burgeoning belly and voluminous breasts jiggling in the process. From there, she planted a deep passionate kiss upon your lips, then replied, "...You stubborn fool... What were you even thinking?!"

Obviously, you could easily tell that she was undoubtedly upset over your actions some hours ago that left you in your current state, where you then let out a light chuckle and quipped, "What can I say? People do all sorts of crazy things for the ones they love."

But of course, being as blunt as she was in such situations, Karen gave you that famous thousand-mile stare of her's, where you then apologized, "...Sorry for making you so worried, Karen."

Of course, after a moment or two, Karen couldn't stay mad at you for long, wrapping her thick meaty arms around you once more as she replied, "I know... You were only doing what you could to protect me."

"...Karen, um... back at that restaurant, there...there was something I wanted to ask you." You said, which soon caught Karen's attention, as you sluggishly went for your pants, which were laid out on a nearby table, as Karen worriedly replied, "...Hey! Take it easy, (Name). You don't have to overexert yourself."

"I know... But I wanted to confess to you." You retorted, which made the rotund superheroine quite confused, cocking a blond eyebrow at you as she asked, "Confess what?"

As you slowly limped your way back onto the hospital bed, holding some things in your hand, where you then looked at Karen and answered, "*grunt* Back at the restaurant, before Satanna's attack, I, um...I-I wanted to give you...THESE."

And with that, you opened your hand to reveal the two blue Kryptonian engagement rings Clark gave to you to present to Karen. Obviously, Karen had a look of complete surprise on her plump face, putting both of her blue gloved hands in front of her mouth and nose in shock. Then again, there were few things that could legitimately surprise her, given her line of work.

"Th-Those rings... H-How did you get them?!" Karen mildly exclaimed, still getting over the shock of what you were presenting to her. From there, you began to speak with her and confessed, "Karen... We've been through many things for some time now, whether it was moving from New York to Tokyo, to even me risking my own life to buy you enough time to recover. I don't care if you weigh 200 pounds or half a ton, or if you one day turn into some sort of Human-Animal hybrid. All I care about right now...is to spend the rest of my life with you."

Karen took in the romantic words you said to her, still trying to get over the fact that you were now asking her hand in marriage, as you then continued speaking and confessed, "Karen-- No... Kara Zor-El: Will you do me the honor of being your loving wedded husband?"

Suffice to say, despite her initial shock over what was unfolding before her, Karen knew that you were very serious about this when you called her by her Kryptonian name, causing her to shed a tear or two of joy in the process. A brief moment or two later, Karen then swiftly wrapped her bulky arms around you, squeezing you a bit tighter, but not enough to reopen your wounds, then giving you a passionate kiss as well.

"...I'll take that as a yes, then?" You asked, where you then felt Karen firmly nod in response, where the two of you were in each other's arms for a few long hours, not wanting to let one another go.

1553322223322223232223222222222.content: With a groan, you sat up and tossed the covers back. Something seemed odd about your room, but you had another pressing concern: staggering off to the bathroom. The ever-present streetlight outside your window provided almost enough light for you to avoid cracking your shin or running into anything. Finished with your mid night restroom run, you teetered back into your bedroom. You paused at the door, your sleep addled mind not making sense of what you were seeing in the dim light of your room. Your bed was much wider than it should have been and there was a large bulge taking up most of the space. You could see where you had been laying along the one edge. Still not totally awake, you wandered over to the other side, wondering was going on. Grabbing the top of the cover, you pulled it back, jumping back when you saw that there was a woman lying in your bed.
1553322223322223232223222222222.title: Your “new” housemate

choices: The next morning, you awake alone.
She’s still wrapped around you when you wake up.
Something wakes the two of you up again in the night.
15533222233222232322232222222221.content:
The mysterious woman lying in the bed was so oddly colored: green skin with dark green – almost black – hair. It took you more than a few seconds to realize that this had to be Jennifer Walters, the She-Hulk in the flesh and in your bed. And there was so much flesh to be in, which may have helped contribute to why it took you so long to recognize her. Depending on the artist, she had usually been slender to somewhat muscular, but the version sleeping soundly before you was buried in a thick layer of flabby blubber.

Her pretty face was now cherubic in appearance with plump lips sinking partway into rounded cheeks that flowed into the hefty chin that crowed her thicker neck. Her torpedo like breasts were far beyond any that you had ever seen her with, though her stomach was far larger still, easily more than large enough that it looked like it was holding a full grown person within. Her legs were thick slabs of flesh with thighs that looked like it would take quite a wide footing in order to prevent them from meeting most of the ways to her knees and rounded calves that bunched up against her feet. Even her toes were delightfully plump on those feet. Her arms weren’t spared either, rounded meat that oozed into her elbow both above and below the joint with similarly sausage-like fingers upon her hands. So much of her body was displayed as well, wearing only teeny lacy bra that strained against her mammoth breasts, along with matching panties, though you were only able to see them along the upper curve of her hips due to her stomach pooling in front.

Only after spending more than a little bit visually exploring the mountainous woman that had mysteriously appeared in your bed did you realize that one of her eyes was open and that luminous green eye was looking directly at you. You gulped loudly, so much so that you were sure that she had to have heard it. You started to open your mouth to asking about what was going on, but the words caught in your throat as she propped herself up on one arm. Her extremely long hair was sleep tousled, but still looked gorgeous flowing down about her form.

“Something the matter, darlin’?” she asked sleepily. “What are you doing out of bed at this time of night?” Then she seemed to realize that the covers were pulled back, exposing much of her body. “Hmm…just had to take another look at your beautiful wife, eh?” She giggled lightly, giving you even more of a thrill.

With everything else, it took your mind a bit longer than it should have to realize what she just said. I’m married to She-Hulk!? you mentally screamed. Before you could even begin to fully process that, the bloated green woman grabbed a hold of your hand and pulled you across her rotund form. You felt her pillow soft body beneath you as you were effortlessly pulled back into bed. She giggled again before she give you a sensual kiss, holding you close as she moved the covers back over the both of you. Try as you might, even her light grasp wouldn’t budge and she was already obviously drifting off to sleep again, her breathing going low and slow. You were obviously not going to get any information now, so the only option you had was to submit to the sleep that was already pulling at your mind. You felt a smile curling your lips as you resumed your previously interrupted slumber.
15533222233222232322232222222221.title: Your green giant

choices: Your home is now a luxury penthouse apartment.
The two of you live in a wonderful suburban home.
You still live in your old place, but with a few changes to suit your wife.
155332222332222323222322222222211.content:
The bright sunlight leaking through your window woke you up, and for a moment you thought that having that impossible woman in your bed had been just a dream. After all, the first thing you saw upon opening your eyes was a bed empty of anyone except you. However, as you pushed yourself up, you could see that the bed was still much wider than it should have been with obvious signs of another person sharing it with you. Turing your attention even further away, you could see how your room wasn’t how you remembered from when you went to sleep at the beginning of last night. The room was larger than before and had furniture to suit having two people rather than just yourself.

A noise made you turn your head; it was coming from your bathroom. Hopping out of the bed, you crept over to the door. Opening just enough to peek through, you saw indisputable proof that you really had She-Hulk living with you: her obese body completely bared in the shower. A portion of your mind pointed out that the bathroom was different as well; much more lavish looking including a step-in shower and adjacent whirlpool tub, but most of your focus was understandably centered on the spectacle within the shower. Through the door, you could see her jade flesh gleaming from the water as she lathered her lengthy hair. As she turned around, you briefly saw the twin mounds of her butt cheeks pressed against the glass.

Your trance was only broken when she suddenly said, “I know you’re out there, honey. Glad you’re up though ‘cause I’m getting hungry.” As if to illustrate her point, you heard a loud grumbling roar that could only be her stomach. She giggled again before continuing, “See what I mean? Better run off and get started on breakfast.”

You momentarily thought about ignoring her request and instead joining her, but decided against it, there would apparently be time for that later. Somewhat regretfully, you turned away but not before one last lingering look at the bloated woman that had just popped into your life. This would also give you a chance to see if and how the rest of your home was similarly changed.
155332222332222323222322222222211.title: A moon in the morning

choices: Your pleasantly feminine form was a little bit plumper.
Your handsome masculine body was a bit more muscular.
You’re not in your own body, you’re in someone famous, like really famous.
1553322223322223232223222222222111.content:
Stepping out your bedroom door, you instantly saw that your house had indeed been changed; before you would have been standing in a short hallway the led directly to the kitchen/dining room/living room/entrance for your relatively cramped apartment. Now you were in a much longer and wider hall with numerous other doors along its length. Walking along, you checked out some of the other rooms and found rooms like a couple guest bedrooms, guest baths, a swanky office, and a personal gym, among others. One door – near what must have been the center of the layout – was locked and nothing you did would budge the door. You were more than a little curious about what lay beyond, but shoved those thoughts aside…for now.

Eventually you came to the living room, itself nearly as large as your old place used to be and worth probably a lot more by just itself from the looks of the furniture and pieces of art. Much of the far wall was a floor to ceiling window overlooking the city skyline outside; something about some of the buildings you could see didn’t feel right, but you couldn’t quite figure out what was wrong though. Now you could see though that the “streetlight” outside your window last night must have been the lights of the cityscape below your rooftop perch instead.

Turning around now, you saw a large dining room with a door that presumably led into the kitchen. You started to walk that way, but your eye caught on a framed picture hanging from the wall. It was obviously a wedding photo, showing a much skinnier (but still undoubtedly chubby) She-Hulk. She looked radiant with that gorgeous smile, the flowing snow-white dress, and an emerald necklace hanging around her throat, accentuating the lovely green of her…well, everything.

You were so caught up in looking over your bride – which still felt weird to you, but less so now – that you almost didn’t pay any attention the person standing beside her. It almost certainly had to be you, but something seemed off, but yet again you couldn’t quite place your finger on it, then it hit you.
1553322223322223232223222222222111.title: Moving up in the world

choices: “The test results came back this morning.”
“Don’t forget that my cousin is coming over at three.”
Before she can say anything else, there’s a loud crash at the front door.
15533222233222232322232222222221111.content:
It surprised you that it took so long for you to notice, in the photo you were definitely a little more plump than usual, but you had to admit that it looked good on you. Puberty hit you like a truck and it arrived early, so you were always more than a bit heavy in the breast and thighs department, but the picture showed that you had a bit of a belly that helped even everything out. You weren’t fat by any means, especially compared to the larger green woman at your side; you were just a bit softer looking now. Turning your eyes elsewhere on the picture, your crimson tresses were artfully arranged and spilling around your face and shoulders, and a wide smile split your face. Looking the picture over, you could easily tell that you were the happiest you had ever been with you and your beautiful blushing bride arm in arm. Your dress was just as white and shaped similarly to Jenny’s, but not exactly the same. You also had a ruby necklace to compliment your hair color, even if it wasn’t as striking as your bride’s emerald. Looking at the bottom of the photo, you saw writing engraved on the lower part of the frame: “Sarah & Jennifer Brooks” with “Together Forever” below your names.

“Well, I least I know I don’t have to call her She-Hulk all the time now,” you murmured to yourself.

Stepping back, only now did you think to look down at yourself. You saw that you had softened a bit further than you had been in the photo. You belly was now just starting to push out from the rest of your body, but it was still mostly hidden between the swell of your somewhat larger breasts above and your meaty thighs below. Running your fingers through your hair, you found that you had also let the locks grow a bit longer now, so that they spilled to about your mid-back.

Turning back to the window, you briefly considered your reflection for several more seconds. Then you turned around one more time and headed through the dining room. The door you had spied before did indeed lead to the kitchen, and it was quite a beaut: no uncomfortably small kitchenette that was practically falling apart for you, no, the room that greeted you now was spacious and packed with plenty of modern conveniences. There was a massive restaurant style refrigerator along with a matching freezer, a large induction cooktop with a pair of high capacity ovens, plenty of free counter space even with all of the other appliances out for easy use, and more ample cabinet space. You were only partially surprised when you found that there was an enormous walk-in pantry through another door in the back of the kitchen.

You leaned against the central island, dumbfounded at this on top of everything else. You had always enjoyed cooking when you were growing up, but had gotten so used to basically only being able to make unevenly cooked ramen noodles, and that was only if your beat-up old microwave decided to work for the day. With this space, you could really let your culinary talents loose. No wonder Jenny is getting so big if I’m cooking in a place like this you idly mused. The thought of Jenny – and her growling stomach – spurred you out of your daze, time was wasting and your wife was likely only getting hungrier.

You leapt into action, quickly getting pans heating, the ovens warming up, and so on before pulling out slabs of bacon, cartons of eggs, a bag of flour and more. It had been so long since you had actually cooked, but once you started mixing things and cutting others, it felt like you had been practicing most of your life. You didn’t even have to think about what you were doing; your body naturally went through the motions so that numerous breakfast items were soon starting to pile up. Pancakes, omelets, muffins, eggs served sunny side up, hash browns, you started to lose track of everything you were whipping up, but the smells mingled and set your own stomach a rumbling.

After wiping up a little smear from the edge of a plate, you stepped back and looked over the vast array of food you had made. It didn’t seem like it had taken that long either, certainly not enough time to make all of what laid before you, but there it all was.

“Mmm…looks and smells good, like usual,” you heard softly purred in your ear as a wall of softness pressed against your back and a pair of flabby arms looped around your torso.

You all but jumped out of your skin at the shock. Still not quite used to her I guess your whirling mind managed to piece together. She either moved a lot quieter than you would have thought possible or you were so focused on the cooking that you hadn’t even heard her coming up behind you, probably a combination of both. Unaware of your thoughts, she giggled lightly before apologizing for frightening you, then slipped around you granting you an excellent view of her bloated body clad in only a skimpy little robe that wouldn’t have fit a woman half her size. It couldn’t even be tied shut in front, the silky fabric flowing along her numerous curves and spread wide by the expanse of her belly. She grabbed a pair of the plates and made to leave, but when she swung around, her mountainous rear bounced into you, knocking you to the floor with an oof. Hearing you hit the ground, she instantly set the plates down and leaned over – briefly giving you the fear (and excitement) of being buried under an avalanche of green flesh – before easily picking you up.

“Sorry about that, darling’. Still not quite used to how much of me there is now and where it’s all moving,” she said with a bit of a blush coloring her cheeks.

You started to open your mouth to speak but the words caught in your throat as you realized that she hadn’t just pulled you back to your feet, she was effortlessly holding you above the floor. It hadn’t really hit you, but now it did: the incredible strength she had in the comic books was obviously intact and still in action judging from now easily she was holding you up as well as being able to effortlessly move her obese body around. She next really scrambled your brains when she pulled you in close and gave you a kiss that lasted for several seconds and yet also seemed to last an eternity. Only when her stomach let out another loud roar did she pull away, but it was more than a little regretfully as her teeth caught your bottom lip and pulled on it slightly. Setting you back down on the floor, you also saw how she was more than a head taller than you, making you feel smaller still compared to her; funny how you hadn’t see such a height different in the wedding photo.

She grabbed the plates she was taking before and set off again, this time being careful not to knock you down again. She did brush past you though, giving you a bit of a thrill again. When you finally got your brain in gear again, you helped her take the plates out to the dining room and the both of you were soon seated. Jenny had already started to eat before you had finished, shoveling vast amounts of the food into her mouth and quickly making room for more.

After a while and careful not to speak with her mouth full, she coyly remarked “You made up an awful lot of food again. It’s almost as if you want me to get even fatter,” finishing with a laugh.

You had to admit that you really did want that, but you didn’t say it out loud, instead, you just gave a coy little smile of your own before the two of you returned to eating. When you finally pushed your plate back, you groaned lightly as you sipped the last of your juice. You had definitely eaten more than you usually did even when you had the chance to eat till full, but the feeling of the pressure in your gut was pleasant. Far more pleasant however was the sight of your wife gulping down mouthful after mouthful, more and more food to add to her rotund frame. Despite how much more she had to eat, Jenny didn’t take much longer to finish off her portion, even going so far as to wipe up every last trace with the last couple of pieces of toast. Sitting back in her chair, you heard the unfortunate piece of furniture groan under the strain, but she looked unconcerned and extremely content as she idly let her fingers rub the engorged stomach.

She opened her mouth as if to speak before stifling a small burp, but then let loose with a massive belch that almost felt like it swept your hair back. She quickly murmured an apology before getting to what she had meant to say before.
15533222233222232322232222222221111.title: Two blushing brides

choices: Before you can do anything else, you get a phone call.
Suddenly, there’s a nearby explosion.
A random person opens the other door and sits down.
155332222332222323222322222222211111.content:
You sat up a little straighter after she said that, it seemed like the right thing to do. You had no idea what you could say though, wishing that you had some idea what she was talking about.

After a moment, you decided to keep it simple, “Oh?”

She nodded before continuing, “Saw the message on my phone before coming out. They still can’t figure out what exactly I was hit with or how to get them out yet. They said they would keep trying but…ehh…” Then a smile spread across her face as she leaned over, took your hand and pulled it so that it rested on her stomach, “So it looks like we’re still stuck with them, and I know how much you hate that,” the last bit said with her voice dripping with sarcasm.

You were wondering what exactly she meant by “them” but then you felt it: a movement beneath the layers of blubber, almost like…and then another and another. There was no doubt in your mind; she was pregnant. And with more than a few too from how it felt in there.

The next thing you knew, you were looking up at the ceiling, but it didn’t feel like you were on the floor, it was too soft for that. You then became aware of a hand caressing your hair before Jenny’s face came into view, but it was upside down and there was obvious concern etched on her face.

“Hey baby, I was worried about you. You passed out for some reason, are you feeling all right?”

You nodded your head, idly thinking Now that I see you, my dear. Out loud you managed to stammer, “How many?”

“How many what? Am I pregnant with?” to which you nodded again. Her worry only seemed to deepen. “Five, you know this. Are you sure you’re all right, you didn’t hit your head that hard, did you?” placing her hand atop your forehead. “It isn’t like it changed since we found out nearly two years ago or anything. You don’t seem to be running a fever or anything, but maybe you need to see a doctor anyways.”

It took some effort, but you managed to convince her that you didn’t need a doctor, you really were fine. Inwardly though, you were more than a little euphoric. The thought of being married to such a beautifully bloated version of the She-Hulk was like a dream come true; the addition of her being apparently permanently pregnant with quints, that was virtually heaven in your book. When you started to sit up, you were a little light headed, but you figured that was to be expected considering everything, and it passed soon enough though it gave you a perfect reason to remain where you were. You soon saw that Jenny had carried you out to the living room and laid you on one of the sofas. With her bulk taking up much of the space though, it meant that your legs had to propped up on one of the arms of the sofa though and your head was nestled into the pillowy soft fat of her hip and rump.

About ten minutes later, her concern seemed to have faded enough so she eased you back to your feet. She again asked if you needed to go see a doctor though, to which you responded that you didn’t. You instead said that you were going to head out, take a quick drive and get some fresh air. She seemed to think that would do you some good before saying that she had to get working anyways. You almost asked where she was going to work, but stopped yourself; it wouldn’t do to worry her any more by asking about something you should have already known. Instead, you fell in behind her, which admittedly did grant you an excellent view of her rump bobbing up and down with each step.

Back in the bedroom, the two of you changed, though you couldn’t help your eye straying to look at her beautiful green curves as she slowly got dressed. You went with something casual, a loose flowing tee with calf length jeans. You were more than a little surprised with Jenny’s choice: business attire with blouse, jacket, and skirt, all sized to suit her flabby body. You were careful not to let your surprise show on your face, though you did recognize the outfit someone as being similar to some of what she had worn when she worked as a lawyer. Another part similar to the comics you mused. You finished well before her, and offered to help, but your wife turned down your assistance. Giving one last look over your shoulder as she valiantly tugged the shirt over her stomach; you turned away and walked to the front door.

Once there, you found multiple sets of keys hanging beside the door, and grabbed one. You’re not sure why you grabbed that specific set, but it felt right somehow. Heading out the door, you found yourself in a small entryway with only the door you exited and the elevator door besides some decorative touches. Taking the elevator down to the garage, you stepped out and realized that you might have a problem: you didn’t know what car was yours. Fortunately you thought about using the key fob and after several minutes of darting back and forth hearing the car chirping, you found it. The gleaming Mustang was nothing like the jalopy you used to drive, so that was yet another good turn.

Pulling up to the exit, the man in the booth gave a brief sideways glance before giving a double take. “Morning Mrs. Brooks, heading out to get everything ready for tonight, huh?” He smiled behind his bushy mustache and gave a slight chuckle. “Guess I would want to make it a special night too if I had a relationship like yours. Have a good day now.”

You gave him a nod and pulled out onto the street as you tried to figure out what he meant about tonight. Jenny didn’t seem to give you any clues about something happening tonight, but maybe you were keeping it a surprise for her. That was really helpful since you didn’t seem to have any memories from this world. Since you hit a traffic jam anyways, you decided to check your phone thinking that maybe you had put a reminder or something. It didn’t take you long to find today’s date with a rather important reminder: your anniversary.
155332222332222323222322222222211111.title: A wonderful surprise

15533222233222232322232222222333312.content:
It had been one heck of a party as you and friends had celebrated the ending of 2017. It just seemed like yesterday that you were celebrating the last hours of 2016 but that was life for you. After the party, your friends had dropped you off at your apartment. You'd would have drove yourself but you had had one too many drinks. When had gone straight to bed, not realizing how much your life was about to change when you awoke the following morning.

As you exited your peaceful slumber, you couldn't help but realize that there was something...off. As you stretched out, easing the stiffness from your body, when you felt two things: one, the bed seemed quite a bit bigger than before and , two, there was this large, soft and warm mass that was gently pressed against you. Even in your barely awake state, that caused you enough alarm to quickly sit up and look over to your side.

You blinked the sleep from your eyes rapidly as you took in the sight next you: a young woman with Caucasian skin and long, black hair that fell down to length of her back. You could barely believe it as you took in her form. She was huge. Her face was rounded but plump cheeks followed by a double chin and thick neck. That led your gaze down towards her body. She had bulbous Double-F breasts that strained at the grey t-shirt that covered them. Underneath that, and the top of which was barely covered by the garment, was her cauldron of a belly. The expanse of pale girth jutted out at least a foot and a half like a fleshy wrecking ball from her body. The sheer volume of flesh caused it sink downwards between her legs, covering her lap and seeped over her black panties in the form of love handles.

That led you to her lower body. Her blubbery hips had to be at least four feet around and beach ball sized butt cheeks that looked like they could crush a small child. Her arms and legs were thick and pillow like in their mass, like elongated marshmallows. Overall, this woman had to be at least 500 pounds or more. But there was another thing that stuck out to you. The young woman's skin was completely without blemish and smooth. Not a trace of stretch marks or cellulite visible. It was almost like she was a doll, if you were being honest with yourself.

But that was the least of your worries. Who was this woman? Where did she come from? Why-why was she so big? You looked away, somewhat frantic. It was then that you noticed that your bedroom seemed different. It was bigger, had more furniture...it just wasn't the same as before.

You had to find out what was going on! You had to do something but what?
15533222233222232322232222222333312.title: One sizable Wolverine, just for you!

choices: You go back to wake Laura up and get the other side of the situation.
You check out the apartment some more...
Before you can decide, you hear some heavy footsteps!
155332222332222323222322222223333121.content:
You couldn't take it anymore. You had to see what all had changed and until you do that, you were not waking whoever was laying next to you. You needed more info and you wouldn't get it laying in bed.

Slowly and carefully, you slid of the bed, watching your unknown bed mate the entire time. Those were some of the longest moments of your life as worried she'd wake up. Luckily, it wasn't to be and you were able to quietly exit your bedroom. You made your way into the living room and sure enough, it was different.

It was bigger, just like the bedroom. There was also a rather large love seat that you knew you never had bought or owned before. Glancing around, you also saw a nice little coffee table with a few pictures. Curiosity peaked, you went over to it examining the pictures. You picked up the largest one that was in the middle of the table. It was framed and featured you and the unknown woman. You and said woman were posing for the camera. The two of you were holding on to each other with the woman's arm around your neck and your own wrapped around her waist. You were both leaning into each other. The woman sported a shy, kind of awkward smile while you sported a pleased grin. It was, overall, a pleasant or even cute picture. You glanced down at the bottom of the picture where it was written:

"(Your Name) + Laura- 2nd anniversary. Together since 2016."

You let out a breath. You actually managed to get something useful. So you and...Laura had been together for about two years according to this. That would also make it 2018. At least, time seemed to be moving. Still, that didn't explain what exactly was going on. You took a look at the other pictures and you set the first down. Almost all of them were of you and Laura together doing different things. Watching fireworks, attending a movie premiere, the list went on. The one thing you did notice was that Laura seemed thinner in a lot of those pictures. She was still quite big but it seemed like if you looked at them you could see a kind of timeline of her getting bigger and fatter.

"Wow..." You breathed out loud. It looked like she went from kind of big when you two started dating (maybe around 180 to 200 pounds, if you had to guess) to the plus 500 she was by the new year nearly two years later. That was kind of impressive, if you were being honest.

Also, if you were being honest, it seemed like you and Laura had a good relationship. Every picture you saw seemed to display you two being happy. It kind of made you wonder if you should go back and wake her up. Maybe you could ask her everything you two did last night, get a little more insight on the situation.

Or maybe you could explore the apartment a little more?

1553322223322223232223222222233331213.content:
However, just before you could even make a decision, you suddenly heard a set of thunderous footsteps approaching you from your left. In response, you slowly turned toward the source of the footsteps, which revealed that Laura was now undoubtedly awake. Sure, she still showed signs of drowsiness, judging from how her eyelids still seemed a little heavy, but she was certainly conscious, no doubt about it.

Judging from her appearance, her silky black hair looked a little frazzled, which resulted in having a case of "Bed-head" hair. From there, Laura instinctively outstretched her doughy arms, opening her mouth real wide, causing her to let out quite the explicit yawn, which lasted for nearly 15 seconds, then she ceased her roar of a yawn, her lips smacking together once or twice to get rid of the morning breath in the process.

Once she was properly awake, Laura soon noticed you, where she then displayed a comforting but bashful smile towards you, as she waddled her way toward you, where she proceeded to wrap her pillowy arms around you in a loving embrace, then administered a kiss upon your lips, which you had to admit, it felt quite blissful. Moments later, she severed the passionate kiss, looking at you and said, "Good morning, my dear (Name)."

"Well, uh...Good morning to you too, Laura." You retorted, not wanting to look suspicious in front of such a woman, despite clearly having no clue as to how you know her. Though, looking at her now, you had to admit she looked rather beautiful with her current physique...in an adorable manner, of course. And yet, in the back of your mind, you couldn't help but feel like Laura looked...familiar to you, but you couldn't put your finger on where exactly.

From there, Laura soon waddled her way toward the kitchen area of the apartment, which made her burgeoning hips sashay from left to right as she approached the refrigerator. She opened the refrigerator door, her green eyes thoroughly scanning through the refrigerator interior for anything to consume. Inevitably, you spoke toward the rotund Laura and said, "I'll, um...I'll be in the shower if you need me, Honey."

"Alright, sweetie." Laura blatantly retorted, currently preoccupied with finding today's breakfast.

Meanwhile, you treated back inside the bedroom, where you then...

1553322223322223232223222222233333322333.content:
Suppressing a grimace, you looked down at your watch. You’d been waiting for almost an hour. She was late. She was never late, at least not without letting you know. Something was wrong. Grabbing your phone, you tried calling her but she didn’t pick up. Flicking over to a news app, you quickly scrolled through, but didn’t immediately see anything in the news that would involve her. Leaving the bench, you headed back to your car. Your desire to hurry was countered by not wanting to attract too much attention.

Once inside, you reached towards the center console. Touching what would appear to anyone else a random series of buttons on the screen, the display switched over to the tracker setting. You frowned a bit as the system displayed the dot close to halfway across the city.

What is she doing all the way over there? you wondered for a moment.

Figuring that you would get the answer to the question when you found her, you pulled out into traffic. The congestion was high as usual, and you had to take numerous detours due to various super activities around the city. First you ran into the Fantastic Four and Doctor Doom having a brawl over several city blocks. Next was a battle between Iron Man and Technovore. You were forced to hurry down another street as their fight started coming towards the police barricade. You almost got caught in the third when Spider-Man was chasing down some purse snatchers before he got ambushed by Venom. The two of them smashed into the car right behind you. All told, it took you most of another hour to even get close to your destination.

Sitting at yet another stoplight, you glanced out the window. Your eyes drifted around before snapping back upon seeing a certain rundown bodega.

Isn’t that…? your mind started, but the light changed and already the person behind you was laying into the horn so you had to speed along.

On you went, your gaze catching on various other buildings and locations that brought forth memories. Sparing a quick glance down at the screen, you recognized where it was now. You still wished she would have told you that she was heading there.

You nearly ended up pulling hair out with how long it took to find parking on top of everything else. Eventually, you dashed down an all but empty sidewalk to your destination. Standing outside the dirty looking tavern, you paused. Stepping over to a grimy plate glass set in the storefront next door, you gave a quick once over. As you stepped up to the door, you passed your hands down across yourself, smoothing out your semi-formal…
1553322223322223232223222222233333322333.title: Tardiness

choices: Out of her line of sight, you felt for the small box within your pocket.
A group of thugs barge through the door, without a doubt looking for trouble.
Date night is derailed by a ball and chain smashing through the wall.
1553322223322223232223222222233333322333.content:
Walking in the door, you stepped to the side to get your bearings. The lighting was dim but didn’t hide the ubiquitous dirt; what tables and chairs there were tended to be broken, partially repaired, and mismatched; and there likely wasn’t a clean glass in the place. Looking around, you saw bloodstains, both new and old, but you gaze was more drawn to those that you could recognize from when you came here a year ago today.

+—+—+


You were dispatched to Binky’s, a small time tavern that mostly only hosted troublesome clients, in order to confirm reports of possible super activity. From the reports, it was maybe a street level super at best though. When you arrived, there was a pair of men – bikers perhaps, judging from their attire – on the sidewalk outside, both unconscious but still breathing and not in any apparent need of immediate medical attention. The one’s arm certainly looked like it would need a cast or something from the way it was twisted the wrong way around though. Radioing in your initial findings, you moved inside, following the noise of an ongoing fight.

Inside, you saw several other men scattered around the main room of Binky’s, other bikers from what you could see. You had to drop to the floor as yet another man went flying through the air, straight out the door you came in, to join the others on the sidewalk. Scrambling back to your feet, you saw the cause of the disturbance: a tall and well muscled woman standing in the middle of the tavern. Your heart skipped a beat as you looked on. You had never seen anything quite as beautiful as her when she broke the chair over the biker’s back. The fact that she did this one handed while lifting another up to the ceiling with her free hand on only his collar made your heart skip a beat.

Flaming red hair cascaded down her back, across the stylish longcoat that draped to her ankles. When she turned around, the open coat revealed a purple blouse cut to highlight her busty physique. Eyes glittering, her expression looked as if it would have fit better on a woman finding an exceptional deal or something, not waist deep in a fight.

Her turn culminated with her tossing the guy in her hand into one of the few unbroken tables left standing before dropping her attention to the guy she broke the chair over. He was trying to crawl away from her, but this was in vain due to her grabbing his ankle and hoisting him up till his fingers were just able to brush the dirty floor.

She was winding up for a punch that likely would have put the man through the wall if she hadn’t noticed that you were now pointing you pistol at her and demanding her to stand down. It surprised you as well, you didn’t even remember drawing it, yet there it was in your hand, rock steady and pointed straight at her. The woman seemed just as surprised by that as you did.

Just as you started to demand that she put the man down, she instead reacted by throwing him at you. The impact drove you against the wall hard enough to knock the wind out of you. It also caused your pistol to discharge, the beam scorching the ceiling where it hit. By the time you recovered, she was already heading out the back door. You saw her briefly stop on the threshold though, turning back and looking at you with her brows furrowed and her blue eyes lingering on you. Before you could disentangle yourself from the groaning biker, she was gone, leaving you to try and figure out what happened.

By the time backup and medical services arrived, you had found the owner of the tavern lying low in a hideaway behind the bar. He explained the bikers had gotten very drunk, and then more than a little rowdy before they tried robbing the place. He had gone for his gun under the bar as usual in such a case, but one of the bikers had been too fast for that despite barely being able to stand. That’s when that mystery woman joined the fray, but he didn’t see much after the first guy went flying out the door.

With only his statement and the state of the bar even before the fight, you weren’t expecting much in finding this woman if she didn’t want to be found. The other officers that showed up agreed, though some of them couldn’t pass up ribbing you over getting taken out so easily. Squaring your shoulders, you let the taunts roll off your back.

Later on, while going home for the night, that mysterious woman dropped into your life again…literally. As you were walking towards the steps leading to the front door of your apartment block, you heard and felt a sudden thump behind you. Before you could react, a very strong arm wrapped around your throat, pulling you up on tiptoes. She demanded to know why you didn’t shoot her when you had the chance, and instead wasted the opening. After several attempted lies she persuaded you to tell the truth through careful squeezing of your throat, so you admitted that you found her extremely attractive. After several tense moments, she purred that if you really felt that way, you would take her out on a date the next night.

+—+—+


Shaking your head to bring yourself back to the present, you found that you had been staring at the backside of a very familiar figure. Flaming red hair cascaded down her back, a back that bore little similarity to how it appeared back then. A figure-hugging dress highlighted her well fleshed shape, especially around her superabundant hips. Hips that know easily took up two of the bar stools and looked to be encroaching on a third. You knew from extensive experience that her superhuman strength wasn’t hindered in the least by her adipose though, her softness disguising the muscles buried deep beneath.


“You could have told me that you were coming here, rather than making me waste a lot of time on the other side of the city,” you muttered after winding your way through the sparse crowd and slipping onto the seat next to the pair she occupied at the chipped and stained bar.

Mary’s only response was a teasing grin fired sideways at you as she continued to devour the plate of nachos before her. It wasn’t the first either judging from the stack of plates off to the other side. With her attention diverted for the moment, you took the chance to cast your eye across what you could see of her blubbery form. You noted with some glee that her already superb breasts seemed to have taken a bit more of her ever increasing weight, the gap between the mounds becoming a deep canyon. The stomach between her breasts and legs was just as impressive. It pulled her dress taut and surged out across her legs and hung down over her knees.

Only now did you realize that she was watching you stare at her with an expression that all but stated that while she enjoyed the attention, she was certainly going to give you some sort of punishment later on in return. With that finished, she turned away and ordered a heaping plate of onion rings.

15533222233222232322232222223232332112.content:
Overwatch. A game that has become extremely popular in the gaming community since 2016. Suffice to say, you were one of those people drawn to such a vibrant yet complex fictional world.

However, as you stir from you slumber after a long-night session playing Overwatch, you slowly but surely noticed something..."odd", regarding your environs. After all, you only lived in a one bedroom apartment, and it looked nothing as fancy as the room you were in, since you passed out on the couch due to you not wanting to drag your feet all the way back to your bed.

And yet... it felt as if you woke up in someone else's home!

The living room was spacious enough to fit your entire apartment in it, complete with a massive Flatscreen TV before you, as you were currently sitting in a couch large and sturdy enough for a cow to lay on.

"What the hell is going on?" You thought to yourself, as you cautiously stood up from the couch to get a better understanding of the abode you found yourself in. Suffice to say, the place itself felt like it could only be bought by millionaires, complete with a massive kitchenette adjacent to the homely living room you woke up in.

Strangely enough, you soon heard what sounded like singing coming from another room, along with the sounds of running water. With curiosity getting the best of you, you cautiously crept your way towards the source of the noise.

"Is that...singing?" You thought, as you got close enough to make out a voice, which was undoubtedly female, as the unknown woman sang:

"Je vois ta porte rouge et je veux la peindre en noir."
"Plus de couleurs, je veux qu'elles deviennent noires."

"J'ai vu passer les filles vetues de leurs vetements d'ete."
"Je dois tourner la tete jusqu'a l'obscurite."

Judging from the woman's tone, the song she sang sounded rather sad, despite not understanding a word she said. But then, as you reached what you assumed to be the bathroom, you carefully opened the wide door to peek at whoever was inside, only to be shocked at who you saw standing within the enormous shower stall:

The seductive female voice. The lingerie spewed about the room. The pale blue skin seen clearly behind the blurry glass walls of the shower stall. You couldn't believe it, but there she was: Amelie LaCroix, better known ass the cold-blooded assassin known as "Widowmaker", stood before you with the shower stall!

Now, you have tried your hand in playing many of the playable characters from Overwatch, yet none of them resonated with you more than the blue-skinned femme fatale that was Widowmaker. Plus, she had one of the most tragic backstories you have ever seen in gaming history.

However, upon further examination of the blue-skinned woman, you soon noticed something obvious about Amelie, and it didn't hit you until now:

Widowmaker now looked like she weighed 500 to 600 pounds!

You couldn't see the finer details, but you could clearly make out an outline of the woman's now bulkier physique. Her arms were chubby and plump, especially on the biceps. Her breasts were equally as large as well, as they were propped up upon a large doughy double belly. Looking down, you could easily see the largest part of Amelie's physique; Her hips, butt, and legs. Her buttcheeks were each the size of beanbag chairs, while her hips jutted out in a 4 and a quarter foot diameter, whilst her behind perfectly dimpled against her equally bulky thighs and legs, which helped in supporting all that weight, thus giving Widowmaker a profound pear shape.

However, you soon were about to get a better look at the larger Widowmaker, as she opened the shower stall, as steam poured out in the process, as her rotund physique was drenched in numerous droplets of water, with her long voluminous dark purple hair downed from being soaked in water. It was there you noticed how chubby her face was, complete with a rounder face and double chin.

https://www.deviantart.com/ray-norr/art/...

Strangely enough, she didn't seem to have noticed you yet, as she went for a downright massive towel hanging from a towel rack. But then, she soon spoke up in a mix of French and English as she remarked, "Je sais que vous etes la (I know you're there), Darling. No need to hide yourself from moi."

Well, it was official: the jig was up. She knows you're here...Wait, did she just call you "Darling"? This just became all the more confusing, as Amelie turned her head a little to look at you, bearing a cute dimpled smile on her cherubic face, as if subtly enticing you to approach her.

And yet, you couldn't resist such lustful temptations, as you soon walked out of the doorway toward her, revealing your...
15533222233222232322232222223232332112.title: A Widened Widowmaker

155332222332222323222322222232323321121.content:
You stood there just a few yards from the wider Widowmaker, your masculine yet athletic form wearing nothing but a short pair of blue boxers, with what you felt was a relieved yet affectionate curve of your lips, as you looked back towards the still nude Amélie, wearing a towel that looked a smidge too small on her bulbous frame.

And yet, as if by some sort of intuitive acknowledgement towards each other, Widowmaker soon lumbered her corpulent self toward the adjacent full-body mirror, her thick meaty legs subtly rubbing against one another, causing the pale blue-skinned assassin to have a slight waddling gait in each graceful step she took, with your eyes unintentionally focused on her ginormous pale blue butt, as each buttcheek lightly bobbed up and down with a sense of rythym to such flab.

Briefly, she gave a quick glance back at you with one of her golden yellow eyes, which were a result from the inhumane experiments and indoctrination TALON had her undergo after the murder of her late husband, Gérard LaCroix, due to his status in Overwatch in their anti-terrorist operations against TALON.

However, it also gave you a splendid view of her intricate and large black widow spider tattoo adorned upon her back, though it looked stretched somewhat due to her newly increased size and newfound girth and ample amounts of adipose.

From there, as if this was normal for her, she unfurled the large towel from her mildly damp yet rotund form and began to calmly dry off her voluminous locks of dark violet hair. However, as if guided by some unknown to be compelling you, you soon spoke toward the rotund Widowmaker and asked, "...You sure you're feeling alright, Amélie?"

"*sigh* ... Pour être honnête, mon amour (To be honest, my love), I...I don't I shall ever être entier (be whole) again." She calmly retorted, her voice having a somewhat sad and somber undertone, considering that even though she was technically brainwashed by TALON, it was still her hands that ultimately killed her late beloved, just as you noticed her slowly wrapping a somewhat plump but still lithe hand around one of her bulky flab-covered biceps in some instinctual way of calming herself.

From what you could see, despite her obvious increase in weight and girth, this was still the tragic character of Amélie LaCroix, as you began to hear her lowly hum to herself, continuing the song from before, only...

"Je vois ta ligne de couleurs ..."
"...And they're all painted black."

...You could clearly understand what she was saying now.

"With flowers and my love, both never to come back."

However, it was there that you recognized the lyrics; She was singing the song "Paint It Black", which had anti-war and anti-drug undertones in the words sung. Ironic yet all the more tragic, considering Amélie's life as the cold-hearted assassin Widowmaker.

And yet, it seemed as if the song was..."calming" her down some, which made you all the more empathetic towards the blue-skinned plus-sized woman, not because of your personal bias, but the sympathy you felt for such an iconic individual. You began to move, this time of your own volition, as you soon approached behind the substantially fatter Widowmaker, where you promptly but slowly wrapped your arms around her in a loving embrace.

At first, the intimacy initially surprised her, but as you lean your head upon her shoulder, she began to lull into an affectionate disposition, where she soon then slowly moved her plump hands upon your own, resting her chubby head along your head in the process.

155332222332222323222322222232323321312.content:
An excessive night in your apartment was drawn well past its close, after a bad session of Overwatch on your PC, full of alcohol, F-Bombs, and teeth grinding. You looked at your black dated alarm clock that and now saw the time was 1:30 am. Your attempts at a constructive session of Competitive, where futile due to either the overall toxicity of the randomly assigned teammates or your internet provider just deciding to put on the brakes to the connection speed. You went to bed to sleep off the frustration and dream of an escape from this world, but you only got a few hours of dreamless sleep before you woke up again.

         “What time is it?” You asked, looking at the white digital alarm clock. “Okay, 5:55 A.M. Wait a minute, that’s not my clock… and this is not my bedroom.”

         Everything was white and clean from the bedsheets to the dresser and nightstands. In fact, everything looked incredibly to have a futuristic look to it. You saw that you were in bed with someone. At first glance, your mysterious bedmate looked like a woman of Indian descent. You recognized her as Satya Vaswani, AKA Symmetra from Overwatch, looking closely as she did in the game. That is with one major exception: she was very fat, roughly somewhere between 550 to 600 lbs. Her belly was a large apron of fat, breasts were the size of bowling balls, and her right arm had a good amount of flab to it. Symmetra’s left prosthetic arm was just as “fat” as her natural right arm. Symmetra’s outline in the sheets implied that her thighs were sized like bulky columns, and that her waistline was generously wide.

         “Mighty fine conundrum some wise guy put ya into (name),” You said to yourself. "But might as well make the most of it."

Somehow, you had the feeling that maybe Symmetra’s new weight wouldn’t be the only change in this new world you have woken up to. As you got yourself out of bed, there was men’s clothes being stored in the nearby tall dresser cabinet that looked like your old dresser in your old apartment. You knew somehow, the contents were yours (because the walk-in closet had extra-large versions of Symmetra’s attires). You got dressed in a white undershirt, a grey T shirt, dark blue jeans, and a pair of light green fingerless leather gloves.

Taking look out of the bedroom, the clean, white, futuristic aesthetic of the new bedroom extended all the way throughout the rest of the 2-bedroom apartment. There was large living area complete an large TV and entertainment center, a hall bathroom, a second room whose function you aren't able to recall at moment. The kitchen wasn't large, but it had excellent storage and high-end appliances. It was as if the kitchen wasn’t the primary eating area in your relationship, specialized for more intimate meals. The logical explanation was since you were apparently in the Overwatch world now, odds are the two of you were now stationed on base somewhere. One last thing you noticed as you made your way to the large living room window was a green stylized longcoat hanging on a wall mounted coat rack.

"Now, where am I?" you asked yourself.

Looking outside the window, you saw your answer as…

1553322223322223232223222222323233213121.content:
The light was coming in fast and bright, causing you to squint and obstruct your vision. Once your eyes came into focus, you could clearly see the rocky cliffs, Mediterranean views, and futuristic military structures and pathways that was Watchpoint Gibraltar, one of the levels in Overwatch. You could see the entrance to the rocket hangar with its doors wide open and the second check point clearly visible below. The walkway looked cleaned up and free of dirt and gravel, and the metal walls of the hangar and towers looked like they had new application of polish. It was as if Symmetra had taken to cleaning up the watchpoint herself.

Taking your view away from the scenic watchpoint, you then noticed on the living room coffee table, a pair of Overwatch Badges and ID cards. The two small badges were placed left and right next to each other. The badges' composition were platinum with gold accents, shaped in the same manner as Overwatch’s logo. The ID cards were laminated plastic, neatly stacked on top of each other, and you could see sensor pads on it, meaning the card used an integrated circuit chip like a smart card. The top card had the photo of Symmetra (her weight was the same as when you saw her in the bedroom) and read, “Overwatch Agent ID: Satya Vaswani. Codename: Symmetra.”

You slid Symmetra’s card shortly to the left to look at the bottom one.

“Overwatch Agent ID: (Name). Codename: Laser-shot.”

Surprisingly, the card had your face as its mugshot. Now you were thrusted from your old life of out-of-control dead ends, and into a new world based off one your favorite video games. Granted, it wasn’t exactly accurate to the source material from the look of things, but still. There were some questions that were unanswered, the top of the list being why is Symmetra working for Overwatch now instead of Vishkar?
1553322223322223232223222222323233213121.title: Watchpoint Gibraltar

1553322223322223232223222222323233213121.content:
That when your new memories “came back” of what happed to Symmetra’s apparently ex-employer, The Vishkar Corporation. It all started when you took on that one job, the one where you and Symmetra first met.

*11 months ago (Overwatch time), O’Hare International Airport*

         Your plane touched down on the runaway. You were done looking out the window

“Ladies and gentlemen, we have landed at the O’Hare International Airport at Chicago, Illinois. Thank you for flying with…”

         As the flight stewardess gave her instructive speech of airplane exiting protocol, you took your attention to an email on your phone. A week ago, you received that email, requesting your services as freelance investigator and bodyguard, from an unknown client. You were eager because this would be your first job outside of the United States and it paid ten times as handsomely than your previous jobs, but you kept those emotions to yourself. The email included a boarding pass for the very plane you’re riding on along with an instruction to meet with some anonymous associates at the airport’s terminal 3. As you got the strap of your carry-on duffel bag containing weeks of clothes, armor, and sundries around your left shoulder, you calmly made your way off the plane, and into the instructed terminal. Once there and not seeing who you were supposed to meet, you looked out the window to see the great metropolis of Chicago, your hometown.

“Home sweet, home. Nice to see the place one more time,” You said, but then you felt the presence of a trio of dignitaries, two humans that looked to be in their mid-40’s and an omnic, holding a banner with your name on it behind you, so you asked, “Can I help you?”

“Your Mr. (Name) I take it?” the middle bronze omnic in a tan business suit asked.

“Just call me Laser-shot,” you replied, and then asked about the banner, “And is little early for that? I haven’t made it out of the states yet.”

“We are here to confirm that you have accepted our employer's mission,” the man on the right answered.

“Wouldn’t it have made sense for you people to have met me back at Tucson?" you asked, "I wasted two hours just getting my armaments cleared by security.”

“We have our reasons for the travel arrangement sir.” The woman on the left answered, “We will tell you more once we take flight.”

         You groaned as you followed the trio of dignitaries to one of the airport gates that seemed to be unusually empty for a rather busy air port. The woman talked with the airport employee behind the desk and before you knew it, the door to the jet bridge was open and the four of you were able to move forward. At the end of the jet bridge, you entered the plane. You noticed the cabin on the plane you were had gold as its primary color scheme with lightly gold walls, yellow gold upholstery on the seat, and gold carpeting. You thought of the interior as an eyesore, but as everyone sat down and got buckled in, one the plane’s crew omnics handed you a black gun case that had your weapons of choice inside and you quickly opened it up, pulling out your primary firearm, the Tommy Laser.

         Modeled after the legendary M1921 Thompson submachine gun, your Tommy Laser was a laser carbine that fired non-lethal but numerous electric laser shots quickly and accurately. Your gun was personally customized with a green color scheme with white accents, and accessorized with a vertical fore grip, a pistol grip stock, and the Tommy Laser’s source of ammo: a large round battery that was size and resembled the ammo drum magazines commonly associated with the tommy guns. You first got the Tommy Laser back when you were assigned to the Chicago SWAT team, the weapon was deemed ideal to suit your unique abilities out in the field. With it, you did your part with flying colors in the SWAT team's numerous busts against violent gangs and drug rings, and dangerous hostage situations. Focusing on the present, you reassembled your firearm and asked, “Now that we’re here, you mind spilling why we’re here?”

“We have intelligence that the terrorist group Talon have been planning to attack and assassinate our employer, who has very recently spoken out against them. Our selection algorithms have chosen you for your combat experience within the last 11 years.” The omnic answered, handing you a set of documents as the plane began to takeoff.

“Out of all the heroes in whole world, you had to pick me,” you replied somewhat cockily, “I wouldn’t say spending 8 years on the Chicago SWAT Team straight out of high school would be qualifying to take on a terrorist group, but I'm flattered. I’ve been spending most of my 3 year freelance career against small timers like Los Muertos and the Deadlock Gangs out in Arizona.”

“That is true in most circumstances,” the Omnic continued, “but your unnatural marksmanship was an outlier in the process.”

“Oh that.” You answered, “Yeah, at around high school, I found out I had developed some power to sense whatever was behind me at rougly… 10 meters. When I joined the police like my parents did, I discovered that the talent extended to shooting things behind me.”

         You decided to show the three your abilities first hand. What caught your attention out of the whole dossier, was a trio of photographs that contained three of Talon’s top agents: Reaper, the black robed killer who has been hunting down Overwatch agents; Widowmaker, Talon sniper and the assassin of Tekhartha Mondatta; and Akane “Doomfist” Ogundimu, One of Talon’s leaders. You threw those photographs to the air behind you. Your reflective vision kicked in, and without turning your neck to look back, you took aim and fired three shots from your Tommy Laser. The laser projectiles ricocheted in airplane cabin three times, not harming the plane. On the third bounce, your laser fire precisely found their mark, leaving gaping holes in Reaper, Widowmaker, and Doomfist’s photos also causing a brief updraft to have the pictures return to your hand.

“Like so.” you demonstrated, handing the hole laden photos back to the dignitaries.

“It is indeed impressive. Our employer at our destination will be pleased to know that.” The woman answered not flinching like the other two at the demonstration, taking the pictures from your hand.

"And where are we going and who am I supposed to guard anyway?" you politely asked.

The man answered, “Wanting to get the point Mr. Laser-shot? Very well, where you’ll be going is…”
1553322223322223232223222222323233213121.title: Flashback time.

choices: The two of you get your first leads right then and there.
