1553322223322223232223222222323233232223.content:
"Life is what happens to us while we are making other plans." -- Allen Saunders

"Mirror... Can you hear me?"

You tossed and turned in your bed, dreaming about what life had in store for you, with it's numerous intertwining weaves and strands criss-crossing with each other in a dizzying manner. And yet, this time however, something felt...

"Do I... Reach you?"

...Different.

"Are you... Even listening?"

It felt...as if something-- No! Someone, was calling out to you. Instinctively, you approached the source of the singing, akin to being entranced by a siren's song. Each step forward brought more clarity to such a hauntingly beautiful melody.

"Can I... Get through?"

Inevitably, you reached the source, only to see a white-haired figure kneeling before you, her posture slumped over in an almost somber state. Only one sentence came forth from your lips, feeling a semblance of...familiarity with this snowy-haired individual, as you knelt down on one knee and calmly asked, "...Who are you?"

But then, without a moment's hesitation, the mysterious person put you in a firm chokehold. You tried to fight and resist, only for it to be a futile dream itself. Your arms falling limp into the abyss as the figure then spoke in a hauntingly mellow tune and asked, "Do you...love...Me?"

====

With a sudden motion, you quickly shot up from your bed, loudly gasping in response to the vivid dreaming you've just experienced. Fortunately, you were able to regain your nerves through several deep breaths.

Inhale, count to three...

Exhale, count to three...

Inhale, count to three...

Exhale, count to three...

It was a steady pace, just enough to put you at ease for the time being.

"Ugh... What the hell was that all about?" You thought, gently grasping your forehead with your left hand, calmly rubbing it in a soothing motion. However, much to your current demeanor, your other hand unintentionally brushed up against something...weighty and soft, which certainly caught you by surprise.

In response, you slowly turned your head toward what or who your hand brushed up against, soon taking notice of a prominent mass erupting from the bedsheets. At first, you thought you were hallucinating, but you soon rubbed the sleep from your eyes to witness what was making such a bulge underneath the blankets:

A rather large heavyset woman.

In appearance, she had this somewhat youthful yet elegant aura to her, brandishing a lengthy mane of snow white hair, just like the person in your dreams.

"...What the hell is going on?" You mentally asked,your eyes soon glancing over the rotund beauty's enlarged form. Gazing upon her face, you can see a vertical scar going down the left side of her plump face. More specifically, by her left eye. From the looks of it, it was a rather old scar, as if the woman had received it in a duel of sorts.

"She tells so...familiar. Have...Have I seen her from somewhere?" You contemplated, your eyes wandering over the rest of her body. Below her rounded face, she had a cute double chin, which perched above a set of plump rounded shoulders and chubby meaty arms. However, you soon took notice of the woman's abundance of cleavage, which had to be a Double or Triple E-Cup, maybe even an F-Cup judging from their volume, as it seemed that her icy blue bra appeared rather snug around the woman's substantial mammaries, bound to snap off with even the sharpest of movement.

From there, your eyes continued gazing downwards, looking upon what you can easily say is one of the biggest parts of this unknown woman: Her belly.

It wasn't a small frail thing either, but rather, it was a humongous blubbery paunch of a thing, as it scrunched up a little into two hefty belly-folds with ease, as the woman laid on her side, thus giving you an ample gaze at her equally plump waistline, hips, legs, and buttocks, with the faint line of a pair of panties covered up in the front by her behemoth of a gut. Overall, if you had to wager a gamble as to her approximate weight, you'd bet it be a little over 500 pounds.

And yet, despite the accumulated adipose upon her physique, you couldn't help but find her to be rather...attractive, in a sense. Though, your mind continued to wonder as you thought, "...Who are you?"

"...She's probably not going to give me any answers soon, so I guess I'll have to find them myself." You contemplated, left with little to no choice but to...
1553322223322223232223222222323233232223.title: This Life Is Yours

1553322223322223232223222222323233232223.content:
"*sigh* ...No use staying here in bed to get some answers." You mentally noted, cautiously unfurling the bedsheets from your person, doubly making sure as to not disturb the obesely dormant woman. However, you didn't notice how different your bed was from what you remember, as it now took the form of a King-Sized four poster canopy bed, which laid perpendicular to one of the walls, dressed with white fitted sheets and a light blue blanket with a pattern of rhombus shapes and black dots, complete with three large white pillows and one small, circular, light blue pillow.

Suffice to say, it looked more like a bed fit for royalty.

"...Okay, I don't remember my room being this...white." You whispered to yourself, slowly circling in place, overlooking what has become of your bedroom. From what you can easily see, the entire room was much more spacious, yet also having this...air of elegance, to it's foundation and construction, consistently bearing a pristine, sterile white on the walls, as well as a snowy white reflective tile floor, with the ceiling forming a series of complex arches, sparsely compensated by golden sconces with blue teardrop beads hanging from them.

Slowly traversing through the room, you can easily see the entrance area just ahead of you, where it was now three steps lower than the rest of the room, equipped with a pair of white armchairs with gold frames next to a glass coffee table laced with a golden frame. Yet, beneath such antiquated furniture, an ornate off-white rug with borders of varying thicknesses laid there, blessed in the following colors of gold, white, gold, blue, and finally gold.

However, nearby sat a fireplace, above which hung a mirror with gold curved, leafy designs adorned on the black frame. But hanging off to the left of the door was a thick blue curtain, pulled to the side by a lighter blue tie. "Wow. This place looks rather...intricate, that's for sure!" You wondered, amazed at how pristinely detailed the place was, akin to a child going to the amusement park for the first time.

And yet, looking towards the back of the room, there stood an enormous window, with equally tall, thick blue curtains pulled aside by lighter blue ties. Sitting adjacent to said window, there stood what appeared to be a simple white desk, where to the right of which hung a portrait of sorts. But as the sun slowly lit up the area as it ascended over the horizon, the room had gained more clarity, to which gave you a more definitive glance at the portrait before you.

Approaching closer, you can make out two figures within the portrait; The first figure you instantly recognized as yourself. However, looking more closely, you can easily see that the second person in the painting was undoubtedly that large woman lying in bed! Only...she looked rather presentable in the portrait, as she looked to be about half the size she was now.

But the longer you looked at the portrait, the more you began to speculate who she could really be. Though, it was not until you noticed a golden plaque adorned on the bottom frame of the portrait, which boldly stated a startling revelation in an elegant John Hancock:

"(Name) & Weiss Schnee. Truly, Love Eternal."

And then, just like that... Such revelations hit you akin to a speeding Bullet Train, as your eyes slowly but surely opened wide with shock and realization, now recognizing who the plaque silently spoke of:

Weiss Schnee.

The youngest daughter of the illustrious Schnee Family, the owners of the Schnee Dust Company.

The wielder of the Multi-Action Dust Rapier weapon known as "Myrtenaster".

Student of Beacon Academy.

Accomplished Huntress.

And...a member of Team RWBY.

You felt like the entire world just froze for only a few fleeting moments, with your own brain wrapping around what you have discovered, your thoughts frantically racing as they weaved, "That...Th-That's not even p-possible!! Weiss Schnee is s-s-supposed to be a fictional character!! A-And she's not supposed to be so...FAT!! What...Wh-What the flying hell is going on here!?!?!"

Suffice to say, you felt like you wanted to instinctively scream at the top of your lungs, unsure if it's with extreme delight or impulsive shock. After all, you've binge-watched the entire RWBY series, and out of the many noteworthy characters on the show, the one that stole your heart was the Ice Princess herself, Weiss Schnee. From her overall design, to the inspiration of her character from Snow White, to the turmoil of her being excommunicated by her manipulative father (whom you've hated with an unbridled passion), to even her personality, Weiss won you over, despite some of the missteps that Rooster Teeth had with the series in later seasons.

And yet, upon closer examination of the chubbier Weiss in the portrait, you can see that her overall outfit was undoubtedly from...

1553322223322223232223222222323233232223.content:
Halloween.

Whether it was the horrific and macabre, or just in it for the costumes and free candy, it was certainly recognized as a rather unique holiday in the autumn of every year.

Currently, you had just returned to your single bedroom apartment, after some late-night partying on All Hallows Eve with some of your friends. And yet, as your mildly drunken stupor was overcome by the call of slumber, little did you realize at that time...your life would be changed in a great many ways...

== Some Hours Later... ==

Your head pounded as if you just swallowed a still-beating heart, as you slowly arose from where you laid, placing a hand upon your throbbing forehead, rubbing it with an index, middle, and ring finger in the process.

"Damn. I had one too many Budweisers." You thought under your breath, your vision soon dilating and refocusing with pristine clarity. And yet, slowly but surely, you felt something was completely...off, regarding as to where you've awoken.

"...What the? I don't remember my place being this dark..." You thought, quickly noticing how everything appeared, as you turned your head and looked upon the bed you fell upon, only to see that you were now sitting on a Gothic-style King-Sized bed, complete with blood red silk bedsheets. You casually held a minute piece of the smooth cloth and continued, "...Let alone having something THIS gothic."

You knew that something felt rather off with this place, as you soon felt the cold smooth black limestone floor beneath the soles of your bare feet, standing up to examine your environs.

"*sigh* I better figure out where the exit is before I get in trouble with whoever lives here." You muttered under your own breath, about to wander your way out of this foreboding environment. However, you soon smelled something peculiar in the breeze. It smelled almost...metallic in odor and texture.

Your curiosity getting the better of you, you began to sought out this metallic odor, to find it's source, and hopefully a way out as well. You grabbed a nearby robe to cover yourself, now aware of your current nudity, as you forcibly pushed open one of the monumentally large iron doors, giving you your first glimpse of where you were now at.

"...Geez. Where the hell am I? This place is huge." You thought, noting how downright massive the place was, with obscenely tall walls and gothic archway rafters high above you. Your eyes shifted left to right to see if there was anyone else besides you.

But then, as you followed the metallic scent, you began to hear these muffled slurping and gulping sounds in the distance as you tread closer to the source of such an odor. And yet, as you approached closer and closer towards the source of the odor, you heard the faint echoes of a voice, undoubtedly male in tone, as the voice elaborated, "...We have managed to cull those troublesome members of their so-called resistance, My Lady. Without the figureheads of this bothersome nuisance, it shall be only a matter of time before they are no more."

Obviously, you clearly weren't sure as to what this person was rambling on about, but when you finally reached the source of the metallic odor, you peered your head from behind the still-open doors of the adjacent room, and what you had witnessed within the room before you had left you in complete shock.

In the room were several yet absurdly massive women, each of them were fattened up to an impossible yet immobile size, looking more akin to deformed human-shaped blobs of blubber and adipose. However, what drew your gaze's attention was the large pale shape perched atop one of the immobile blobs.

At first, you weren't sure what to make of such a sight. However, the pale form soon stood up, indicating that it was undoubtedly humanoid in shape, albeit in a corpulent shape. "...You've only made martyrs out of them, Viceroy. And that will only complicate matters." Another voice rang out, which you soon realized that it originated from the pale form, now confirmed to be female in tone.

But it was when the wide figure turned herself around that you soon realized who the pale figure was. "Th-That...That's Carmilla!" Your thoughts raced, instantly recognizing who she was. From her inhumanely pale white skin, to her sharp cold blue eyes, to her full blood red lips, her sharp angular pointed chin, and lengthy snow white hair, this was, without a shred of doubt, Carmilla from Castlevania. More specifically, from the Netflix animated series of the same name.

And yet, you couldn't help but quickly notice some distinct differences with this version of Carmilla from the show. First off, she wasn't currently wearing her signature black and crimson red ombre dress with the golden shoulder plates and matching golden heeled shoes, as she stood upright in nothing, her pale-skinned and completely nude form drenched somewhat in what you could only assume was blood, which coated her long-nailed fingers, along with her mouth dripping with copious amounts of blood, which oozed down her naked physique.

And second (and the most obvious, of course), was the rather drastic increase in width, size, and girth. Her face had plumped up some, with rounder fuller cheeks, and a developing double chin, though her pointed chin remained intact surprisingly. Looking below her neck, gone was Carmilla's slender and sharply curvy physique, as it had been covered in ludicrous amounts of adipose, giving her a more rotund and rounder curvy body. Her breasts, once a petite C Cup, had ballooned into a bra-busting Triple E-Cup, as such mammaries now rested on an enormous apron belly, which had folded itself into two flabby folds of stomach flesh, which reached down towards her privates.

Meanwhile, her hips, waist, and butt had taken a good brunt of such an expanded physique, as her hips jutted out to a noticeable degree, while her butt was big and fat enough that one could stack an object on it. Her thighs and legs were just as meaty as the rest of her, as her thighs noticeably yet firmly rubbed against each other. Though, as for her arms, they weren't entirely spared from such an obese size, complete with thick rounded biceps and forearms, along with a pair of plump hands and chubby fingers, all whilst still retaining her lethal claw-like fingernails.

Overall, Carmilla had certainly packed on the pounds, for sure, as you watched as Carmilla calmly and casually licked the still fresh blood from her plump lips, savoring the red liquid's taste, since she's a vampire and all. And yet, now realizing that you were probably in Carmilla's castle estate in Styria, Austria, you were still utterly confused as to how and why you even got here in the first place.

However, before you could even formulate a reasonable answer...
1553322223322223232223222222323233232223.title: The Corpulent Carmilla

choices: "...What do you say for a relaxing bath, beloved?"
"...How does sex in bed sound to you, hmm?"

1553322223322223232223222222323233232223.content:
But then, just before you could even formulate a logical explanation to such madness, you soon noticed that Carmilla had disappeared. "Where did she go?" You thought, initially confused as to what you just missed mere seconds ago.

However, your thoughts soon realized where the rotund vampire was now, as you promptly felt a large but soft bump behind you. Your eyes opened the widest you could physically do, feeling like you were sweating lead bullets as to who was now behind you, looming over you like a rounded shadow.

"Oh shit. Ohshitohshitohshit! This is it, I'm dead! She's gonna suck my blood dry!!" Your thoughts raced on overdrive, your fight or flight instincts screaming to run, yet fear pinned you where you stood.

And yet... Instead of feeling the sharp pain of your jugular being punctured by a pair of vampire fangs as you had fearfully predicted, you...you felt a pair of thick meaty pale arms softly wrap themselives around your torso from behind in a...well, a rather affectionate manner.

In turn, this caught you off-guard, yet left you on edge as you thought, "...Don't fall for it! She's trying lull you into a false sense of safety!" You tried to break free, yet your body wasn't responding at all, frozen like a stone statue. But then, as you braced yourself for the inevitable bloodsucking bite from the nude vampire countess, you soon...

...Felt a kiss?

You slowly opened your eyes, expecting to see Carmilla's fangs pierce the side of your neck, only to witness something completely uncharacteristic of this incarnation of Carmilla: She was kissing you. On the neck, no less!

"...What the? Wh-What's going?! I should be dead now!" You impulsively thought, rather confused as to what was occurring before your very eyes, as you witnessed as Carmilla tenderly kissed you, moving from your neck towards your lips, turning you around to face her. And yet, as the corpulent vampire began to lock lips with you, you felt rather...calm, despite being in physical contact with someone who should've turned you into a dried-up husk drained of blood or worse, with your body beginning to become sexually aroused by such tender movements from the obese Carmilla of Styria.

Sure, you were very familiar as to what Castlevania was, but when the Netflix series came about, especially in the second season, you developed a hard crush on Carmilla, even though she was portrayed as a cunning, sadistic manipulator in the show. And yet, here you were, locking lips and intertwining your tongue with the famed vampire countess from Castlevania. Suffice to say, it was like something out of an erotic fanfic.

From there, just as things were about to get rather steamy, Carmilla slowly severed the kiss, looking upon with something unexpected; Instead of her trademark yet cunning "I've got some manipulating to do" expression on her face, she had this uncharacteristic affectionate look on her rounded yet angular face, along with a look in her eyes that showed kindness and romantic affection, devoid of any cunning, deception, and sadism.

"...Good evening, my beloved." She calmly said, her voice it's usual octave and tone, but with a semblance of a loving affectionate undertone to her voice. From there, you could easily tell that she was a good stone taller than you, yet much heavier than you. If you had to wager a guess, you'd guess that Carmilla had to weigh at least a quarter ton to 600 pounds in weight, which was definitely considered overweight for a normal vampire.

And as she administered a quick loving peck on your forehead, you couldn't help but instinctively retorted, "Um, G-Good evening to y-you too, Carmilla." From there, Carmilla looked back upon you with a loving look in her eyes, as you eyed up and down at her overall enormity then (trying to) calmly asked, "...I can see you've been keeping yourself well-fed then."

Obviously noting at how you were staring at her nude, blood-soaked form, Carmilla soon displayed a seductive curve of her plump red lips, licking off some of the fresh blood on her other hand in the process, then trained her cold blue eyes back upon you whilst doing so and elaborated, "*light chuckle* ...Well, you know how it is for yours truly, beloved, especially from the quantity of blood I must drink at times."

From there, as if attempting to arouse and entice you with her nude form, Carmilla slowly circled around you with a seductive jiggling sway in each step befitting of vampire nobility. Though, you had to admit it, it was definitely working, as Carmilla's double-fold belly bobbed some up and down with each rhythmic step she took, where she spoke to you in her signature cold-hearted voice, but now with a aroused seductive undertone as she elaborated, "...But then again, such sloth and gluttony had come from quite a filthy mind."

And with a quick motion of her plump hand and meaty arm, she swiftly grabbed a large portion of her flab and briefly shook it in emphasis, causing her pale flesh to quiver and ripple with gusto for a second or two whilst she continued, "After all, you thought it would have me become more womanly if I indulged with such unbridled gluttony."

And with such explicit bravado, she had ultimately revealed that you were the true cause of her newfound girth, which certainly surprised you. Yet, eerily enough, you seemed relatively calm about all of this, with your thoughts contemplating, "Wow. This certainly explains a lot. Yet...Why am I so nonchalant about this?"

However, noticing your blank expression, Carmilla tilted her head slightly in mild confusion, cocking a sharp snow white eyebrow in response and questioned, "...Is something wrong?"

"Oh! Um...No, not really. Just thinking about our future." You instinctively, talking as if you were a completely different person, much to your internal surprise. Fortunately for you, it seemed to work in evading any suspicion from Carmilla, where the corpulent vampire countess soon displayed a curved smirk on her full plump lips.

From there, she soon put her plump hands into your own, her claw-like fingernails digging a little into your grip, but not enough to draw blood. And after giving you a quick peck on the left cheek, she soon spoke and said, "*light chuckle* Come, beloved. We have a rebellion to crush."

There it was. The cunning and sadistic demeanor you were familiar with when Carmilla spoke, displaying her vampiric fangs with a sadistic grin on her plump face, but for only a brief moment, as she casually guided you down the lengthy gothic hallway hand in hand.

However, she soon showed her romantic affection once more, as she looked at you with a seductively aroused look on her pale-skinned face whilst she quipped, "But first..."
1553322223322223232223222222323233232223.title: Carmilla's Love

choices: From there, Carmilla soon began to make out with you.

1553322223322223232223222222323233232223.content:
"...A Bath? Okay...I can handle that. I mean, what can go wrong?" Your thoughts pulsated, coping with such a minute yet relaxing task, as you quickly spoke towards Carmilla and retorted, "Sure. Why not?"

"Good." She answered, an almost malicious yet still adoring curve of her luscious lips, as she calmly strung you along down the dark limestone hallway, taking a few turns in between. To you, the place felt like a giant gothic-themed labyrinth, and yet, this was (and still is) the home of Carmilla of Styria.

But whilst you were forcefully escorted through the obsidian black pristine halls of the castle, your thoughts momentarily contemplated and recapped on what had occurred within the last few minutes, as you reflected, "...Okay. Today just got a whole lot crazier than I thought. First I blacked out in my apartment, and now, somehow, I ended up hitched with Carmilla from Castlevania. But...this still doesn't make any sense. I thought Carmilla was supposed to be cunning and an opportunist, not someone who wants intimacy."

However, those thoughts woulkd have to take a backseat for the moment, as two vampiric maids opened a set of ebony double doors before you and their pale mistress, thus granting access to what could only be described as "A Lavatory fit for Nobility".

Before you sat an expansive bathroom, with the same dark limestone tile floors as the rest of the castle interior. However, that was where the similarities end, as you could clearly see what was clearly a large, room-sized insignia, which was colored in Carmilla's color template of crimson red, bronze gold, and a ghostly white.
https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/File:Ste...

On first glance, it looked like some sort of coat of arms only found in anything from medieval times, which made you ponder if you were still in the 21st century or not. Aside from the gold-trimmed furniture that associated with restroom decor, two things stood out in your eyes.

First, and the most obvious, was the rightmost wall was replaced with several rows of intricately detailed stain-glass window murals lining said wall with an almost eerie symmetry to them. For a brief glimpse, you could swear that each of the individual murals had a story to tell. Yet, you couldn't stand still long enough to get an accurate description, as the rotund Carmilla calmly guided you towards the second obvious decor: A downright massive golden bathtub, which looked to be about the size of an SUV, complete with this innate metallic sculpture of a snarling lion with bat-like wings protruding from the sides of the beast's golden metal mane.

Of course, it wasn't the golden bathtub figurehead that seemingly unnerved you some. But rather, it was what the enormous tub was filled with....

Blood. Gallons upon copious gallons of pure, unadulterated, and unfiltered blood.

And yet, surprisingly enough...this didn't actually phase you as much as you initially expected, as you mentally noted, "...A Blood Bath? ....Huh. Makes sense, I suppose." Made sense some, indeed. After all, Carmilla IS a vampire after all, so who knows? Maybe she took some beauty advice from Elizabeth Bathory or such.

From there, she let go of your hand and carefully yet calmly inserted herself into the pool of blood, dipping her pale feet in first, then her legs, allowing the thick churning blood slowly encompass her corpulent yet silk smooth physique, leaving only the outermost curve of her upper fold of her double belly, most of her pale voluminous breasts except her nipples, and her breastline, rounded shoulders, chubby arms, and her neck and head the only parts of her bobbing just above the surface of the gallons of blood.

She let out a relieved and almost aroused sigh, as she let her obese self settle in the obtuse pool of blood, with the churning red life liquid calming in assertion. Once she was truly settled in the tub, Carmilla then swiftly snapped her fingers, causing her claw-like nails to make a loud *CLACK!* noise in the process, where you soon felt the two youthful vampire maids promptly enter and strip you of the robe you were wearing.

And like the beautifully haunting Sirens from Greek myth, you felt yourself voluntarily fall under the seductive sway of the rotund vampire countess, who curled her index finger twice and thrice in an alluring gesture, one that called out "You deserve a nice reward" in response.

Suffice to say, this all felt like something out of an erotic wet dream, just as the two vampiric maids bowed before their mistress then promptly took their leave for the time being, while you felt yourself submerging into the thick oozing pool of blood to accompany the opulent yet corpulent Carmilla, who seemed to be enjoying herself quite vividly.
1553322223322223232223222222323233232223.title: Bathed In Blood

info.brief_description: An expansion of RenaGlutton, this time with more pregnant gluttons to choose from.
info.description:
In RenaGlutton, you find yourself awake next to a fat, gluttonous Renamon who was carrying your babies. In THIS interactive, you have a new set of choices. Not just Renamon, but Darkstalkers' Felicia, and several other pregnant gluttons to choose from! And you have an option of how fat they are to start with...

Vore of all three kinds is allowed (oral, anal, unbirth), sex is encouraged, and lesbian sex is allowed as well. No gay male sex, as this is about the lady gluttons, but there are dozens of interactives available for that.
